name: Nudies Cream Blush All-Over-Face Color
about: What it is:A long-wearing, soft, matte, monochromatic nude color for the eyes, cheeks, and lips..What it does:Hot off the runway, and paired with high fashion or bohemian chic looks, All Over Face Color is multitasking and dual-ended with soft color balm on one side and a blending brush on the other end for easy application that will not feather. Just draw on this weather-resistant, non-drying stick directly onto the skin, dabbing softly with fingers, or you can stipple on nude color with the included brush. You delivers custom, all-over face color that leaves your skin with a soft matte or dewy, lightweight, and elegant finish..What it is formulated WITHOUT:.What else you need to know:This product is vegan, hypoallergenic, cruelty-free, and free of gluten and fragrance.
ingredients: Polyglyceryl-2 Triisostearate, Hydrogenatedpolyisobutene, Polybutene, Ceresin, Synthetic Wax, Mica,Octyldodecanol, Microcrystalline Wax, Caprylic/Caprictriglyceride, Dipentaerythritylhexahydroxystearate/Hexastearate/Hexarosinate,Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Sorbitan Sesquioleate,Ethylene/Propylene Copolymer, Euphorbia Cerifera(Candelilla) Wax, Phenoxyethanol, Glyceryl Caprylate,Tocopherol [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491, Ci 77499),Red 28 Lake (Ci 45410), Red 7 (Ci 15850)]....Nudestix formulations are updated from time to time as part of their commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Therefore, ingredient lists or claims shown here may differ from the box of the product depending on time and global region of purchase. ...This shade is approved globally for use on the eye area, except for the USA....The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:..-Swipe Nudies All Over Face Color onto the eyes, cheeks, and lips. ..-Apply color with stick, fingers or brush directly to skin to build and blend...-Blend with a stippling brush or fingers...Tips for applying over foundation:..-Apply a light base directly onto the skin...-If applying over medium-to-full coverage foundation, apply with your fingers and a brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this product because of the universal shade of red and the brush attachment. I only have a few minutes to apply makeup in the morning and this has been greatu2014didnu2019t trigger my eczema. It has a lot of pigment, depending on your application technique you may wear it sheer or build for more pop of color. Note that I only put moisturizer, eye cream, sunscreen under this product. I have normal skin that tends to be very dry in winter and the color has stayed for me through the day. The only downside for me is that the product I was sent has a defective packaging, the cream stick fell out when I removed the capu2014rolled on my shirt to my bed and a little staining never left after trying so many things. I was sent a replacement that had the same problem and actually looked worse than the first one sent. This one had the cream stick sticking on the cap when opened, I had to toss it because I donu2019t have the time to be very careful every time I open it. I was finally refunded instead but I did like this product so I will be repurchasing in-store so I can inspect the packaging.

reviews.review_title: Product does not seem compatible with packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I finally bought my first Nudestix blush (Cherry Blossom Babe - rose flush). I really like other cream blushes, so I wanted to give this one a try. The formula is pretty, but it sadly doesn't seem to be compatible with the packaging. Upon opening my new product, the blush is stuck inside the cap. I have to dab inside the cap with a small makeup brush to use this, otherwise it'd be trashed. Might not purchase any more colors in the stix, simply because this situation isn't a fun makeup experience.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Nudestix and this is my favorite color so far. I have warm tan skin with olive undertones and blue eyes. This shade is a beautiful warm brownish coral so it simultaneously looks bronzing but also colorful yet natural, kind of hard to explain. I will be wearing this shade all summer long. It will look perfect with clothing colors like rust, olive, turquoise, peach, coral, celeste, lilac, black, navy and cream. I'd probably avoid it with dark red, dark purple, fuchsia, mustard, yellows or dark green but never say never! Texture was smooth, easy to blend, and the  brush was really soft, I think it's been upgraded since previous sticks I have bought.

I like the blush but the black u201cpaintu201don the container is peeling off all over my other makeup.  Little black flecks get on my skin and are very difficult to get off without scraping my makeup.   The brush is also very stiff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful, dewy peachy pink blush! Goes on without any streaks. Packaging is very confusing though. I have never used the brush and the metal packaging is unnecessary

When this product arrived, I was first struck by how small it was, and also by the excessive packaging. The blush stick comes in an unecessary metal, lidded box (which I'm sure adds considerably to the already-hefty $35 price tag).   But when I lifted off the cap, I found that the cream blush itself was STUCK to the inside of the cap! It was totally disconnected from the body of the tube. See pic below. Although I can press it back in the tube, it is not firmly seated and will likely fall out again. For the price, that's ridiculous. The Nars multi-stick is larger, and superior in terms of quality. Very disappointing, I do not recommend based on the low quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Super pigmented and very blendable. Canu2019t stress enough: a little goes a longggggg way

reviews.review_title: Maybe not my go to blush but def worth buying
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The main selling point for this blush was the built in brush because I thought it would be great for travel but it's only ok. While the bristles themselves are soft, they're short so you can't really use them to blend the color onto your skin. So I have to use a stippling motion to buff out the color which can turn out a little patchy.  I think you're better off just using your fingers. I chose Nude Buff because I wanted a color that goes with both warm and cool tones and it was a great neutral pick. The packaging was confusing...Nude Buff is listed under the Satin Finish colors but the tube says it's Nudies Matte (FYI, the finish is in between satin and matte). I'm also not a fan of the metal tin because the mirror inside is a little warped and mine came with some white powder residue inside. I'm still alive so I'm going to guess it's face powder but definitely makes me wonder about their quality control.  Packaging - The Nude Buff listed as satin finish but says matte on the tube

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Nudies Matte Blush in Naughty N' Spice is a good option for anyone looking for a natural-looking, buildable blush that's easy to apply and blend. Naughty N' Spice is like a natural, sun-kissed flush. I find the color flattering and easy to wear. The blush is a creamy matte that applies smoothly and blends easily. It's also buildable, so you can sheer it out for a natural look or layer it for more intensity. The stick design is compact and travel-friendly. It also has a built-in blending brush on one end, which is handy for on-the-go application.

Overall would recommend because the colors are great, amazing pigment and it's small enough to fit for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the shade Naughty Nu2019Spice. This is easy to use and highly pigmented yet buildable if you prefer a lighter look. My favorite method of application is to use a brush to pick from the stick and then tap on my face. However, you can also apply directly to face or with fingers or use the brush on the other side of the product and it still looks great.   Compared to other cream blushes Iu2019ve tried, this is longer lasting due to the consistency of the formula.   You can also use this on the lips, and even as a light wash of color on the eyes. Love how multipurpose it is and itu2019s perfect for traveling.   Would recommend this to anyone looking for a long lasting cream blush that can be used for the whole face.   I received this product from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_text: This is the first NUDESTIX product that I've tried, and I'm so glad I did! The Nudies Cream Blush is a really smooth, buildable formula that is suitable for all skin types. I have the shade Naughty n' Spice, which I think is a really beautiful neutral pink that can work for a natural, 'no makeup' makeup look, or for something more glam. I also think it's suitable for a wide range of skin tones - I personally have fair skin, and it works well. You can wear this directly on bare, moisturized skin, or you can apply on top of foundation. The product applies smoothly without feeling sticky or waxy. I also really like the packaging, because the included brush is perfect for blending out the blush. Overall, I am a huge fan of this product and would both repurchase and recommend to a friend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Received this for free in exchange for my review. I know incentivized reviews can sometimes be questionable but I do my best to be as honest and detailed as possible! Iu2019ve been into cream blushes for a while now and have tried quite a few, from liquid to creams, and this one lands somewhere in the top 10. Gorgeous dusty nose nude shade that would work on plenty of skin tones. Can be used as an everyday shade -works with both cool and warm tone looks. I like to apply the cream on my palm, work it in with a brush a little, then apply to my face, so that it doesnu2019t deposit too much product on my cheeks and remains manageable. Formula is creamy but not slippery. Blends out to a soft matte finish. I feel like it could be a touch more blendable if Iu2019m being picky but it is a matte blush so it makes sense. This blush stick is marketed to be used on the eyes, lips, and cheeks however I always thought that concept was silly, mainly use it on my checks and sometimes, in a rush, Iu2019ll throw some on my eyelids for a monochromatic look. It has two ends, one with the blush, one with a mini brush to blend it out. I think itu2019s a little gimmicky to be honest, Iu2019ve tried to use it once but itu2019s just far too small and takes forever to blend, so I prefer to use a full cheek brush. Overall, I really like this product and have always wanted to try Nude Stix and Iu2019m impressed. Not my absolute favorite but beautiful nonetheless!

I like to use it as a cream eyeshadow on occasion. It's very pretty as a eyeshadow too. The blending brush is nice to have as well. I would definitely recommend this blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Nudestix Nudies Matte All Over Face Blush Color in Naughty N' Spice is a truly beautiful formula that provides multi-performance, convenience, & lasting power! In addition, this matte, all-over-face color stick is creamy & hydrating allowing for ease in the blend ability whether it be on the cheeks, lips, or eyes. It is such a joy to have that trouble-free application that always looks great, because it's so user-friendly! The staying power is impressive as well. I was pleasantly surprised to have a creamy, hydrating formula that didn't breakdown or fade away by the end of day. It still looked lovely after several hours. Also, the Naughty N' Spice shade lends the most beautiful & perfect rose coloring to the face! It looks like the color of my cheeks when they're naturally flushed, but somehow even better. For a balm-like formula, the pigmentation is at a level of perfection. It's not too much and it's not too little, but somewhere right in the middle with one swipe. With that being said, I also found it very easy to build upon as well. This optimal performing, innovative formula checks all the boxes and then some! I can't get enough of this product from Nudestix and can't wait to get my hands on more shades!

Versatile and buildable, it can be applied with fingertips or a brush for a sheer tint or a more intense pop of color. Its compact design makes it travel-friendly, while its nourishing ingredients ensure a healthy complexion. Overall, Nudies Cream Blush delivers on its promise of a luminous and youthful glow, earning its place as a staple in any makeup collection.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: [I was provided a free sample of the Nudies Matte Blush in Naughty Nu2019 Spice to review by Nudestix through BzzAgent.]  For context, I have dry combination skin and use the Clinique Even Better Clinical Serum Foundation in the shade CN10 Alabaster.  First impressions for this blush were that it was a little brighter in color than I expected and quite pigmented. The blush was creamy and easy to apply and diffuse. The staying power was good but the intensity of color fades quickly on bare skin without powder. The color is still noticeable but less saturated after ~2 hours, and stays for most of the work day in the office when on top of foundation and set with powder. On my skin tone the color was closer to a coral pink than a rosy pink.  Overall, I thought the product was really nice and convenient, but I wasnu2019t sure if it would work for someone like me since I prefer muted colors and have fairly light skin.  I played around with it and I found that it was really pretty and soft when I layered my setting powder with it (Essence Brighten Up! Banana Powder). The blush and powder played nicely with each other and did not have any weird texture/cakiness even with multiple layers of powder.  My preferred way to apply this blush is to just tap light dots around where I want the center of my blush to be and then use the brush to make light and very short tapping strokes. I find that this helps to spread the blush nicely without moving my foundation although I did not notice the blush moving my foundation even when using longer strokes. I then will sweep a thin layer of setting powder on top of the blush to soften the color and set it. If I want the color to be less saturated and softer, I will layer more powder until I am happy with it.  I also really like the brush on the other end! Itu2019s pretty soft and doesnu2019t scratch my sensitive skin, and the cap keeps the bristles protected and my makeup bag clean. The only concern I have is I am not sure how I am going to clean it.

reviews.review_title: Good in a pinch but could be improved
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm always a bit skeptical about All-over-face-color claims because it's rare that a product will actually do that, but I do think this is a good product for the lips and face. I was provided with Nude Buff which did not have the longevity I was looking for, but the product felt high quality and sturdy, I liked the brush (although not for my eyes, and I'm not sure how easy it will be to clean) and I think this is a good product to have on hand in a pinch, but for the price point I think the longevity should have been MUCH better. Perhaps the other colours last longer?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes
reviews.review_text: I love the colour and the storage for this product. I find it a bit hard to blend and I don't like the attached brush at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this blush, the color is amazing and it blends so easily. I have a medium brown skin and it looks great. It lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product to try for free. I didn't love it. I found the colour pay off weak and the longevity was almost non exhistant. I wanted to love it, but it was not for me. The colour was pretty though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this brand. It makes makeup easy and precise. This stick is convenient and thereu2019s a brush on the other end to help blend the blush after. The texture of the blush stick is good, it glides on smoothly and has a nice colour, very natural and not glittery or shimmery. If youu2019re in search of a natural finish blush, this is spot on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time using a cream blush and I absolutely love it. The shade is perfect and the consistency is perfect too! Iu2019ll definitely be buying one once the is free I got to test is gone.

reviews.review_title: Not bad but pricey for what it is

reviews.review_text: this formula is very creamy and comfortable. I wish it were a bit longer lasting. I find this product is pricey for what it isu2014I bought it back when it was $39 but I donu2019t think Iu2019d buy it at $47 unless Iu2019m really set on another shade! I might try Rusty Rougeu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: A must in my makeup routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Just got into this brand , I donu2019t know why I waited so long to try these blushes. I bought 2, this and in the nude, both are gorgeous. Especially if youu2019re into a no makeup look . This is the blushes to get ! I will be buying more shades for sure

reviews.review_title: Became a staple in my makeup routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been debating on trying this product, and I am so glad I did . I absolutely love it ! It is so beautiful and if you are into a natural look or a no makeup look this is the blush to get ! I will be getting more colors .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product LASTS and the colors are awesome!   A little pricy but I love it!!

reviews.review_title: Radiant Balm,for a flawless glow anytime,anywhere!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the exquisite NudeStix Cream Blush in NudeBuff. Its natural blush, with a touch of pink, enhances my complexion. This fantastic luxe balm, in a compact stick, features a dual-ended blending brush, making it a versatile purse essential for office days and nights out. Packaged in a tin box, its lid doubles as a convenient mirror. Voila! Nudestix has you covered.   #GONUDEBUTBETTER

reviews.review_title: So much fun. A must try
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t typically get too excited about makeup (skincare is more my thing) but I loved this Nudestix Nudies cream blush. I wasnu2019t expecting the color to be so perfect as Iu2019m a hard shade to match but this gave me the perfect subtle flush.  The brush end is amazing to make application easy breezy. The blush is quite smooth and creamy, goes on easy and stays on through the day.  I have sensitive skin that likes to breakout with new and products with junk ingredients. So I had to give this a few weeks to see if my skin would reject it and I was pleasantly surprised I didnu2019t see a hint of a breakout.  I received this item for free in exchange for an honest review which makes it even more surprising that the shade was such a good match. I am not a big blush girl but I am so happy to have this in my arsenal and will be getting another when this one runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love a cream blush, and this one is goes on so beautifully. I appreciate that Nudestix blush has product on one end and a brush on the opposite end to help sheer out the product if I go overboard. Plus you get a ton of product. The packaging is so luxe and I love that the carrying case it comes with has a mirror in it. Would absolutely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is my new favorite! I love the creamy texture. It's easy to apply and feels nice on the skin. It's now part of my essentials.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush stick! The colour is perfect for my fair skin. The little hidden brush on the bottom does a perfect job at spreading and blending the colour after Iu2019ve applied it to my cheeks. Due to it being matte, I donu2019t find it pairs well with my lips as it makes them feel really dry. Very cool that it is versatile and can also be used as eye shadow! This multi-make-up-tool is a must have in my purse! It lasts, and it looks perfectly nude!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing colour! Amazing texture! Pigmented! Really amazing, I used it as eyeshadow, blush and lipstick and all worked really well! I received this product in exchange for review, and no regrets! I will definitely try other colours too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for 2 weeks now and this has quickly became my daily must have. Love the color tones and the depth it provides. Has beautiful coverage !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So, let's talk about Nudestix Nudies Cream Blush in Nude Buff u2013 it's seriously my latest makeup obsession! First off, the shade is the perfect natural flush that gives that I woke up like this vibe u2013 you know what I mean?  And get this: it comes with a brush and mirror, making on-the-go application a breeze! The creamy texture is a dream to work with! It blends so smoothly, and it's not just for cheeks! I've used it on my lips and even a touch on my eyes for a quick evening look, and it's stunningly versatile.  Oh, and can we talk about the staying power? This blush is a trooper. It stays put all day without fading, which is a huge win for me.   I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review, but seriously, I'd buy it in a heartbeat! It's that good!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush! It is exactly what I was looking for. It is easy to apply. You can get an even color without putting tons on, but it is buildable should you want a less subtle look. It does not break down the makeup underneath.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ugh canu2019t say enough about thisu2026 absolutely gorgeous color, blends beautifully, staying power is 10/10. The little brush is a bit useless and pulls at the skin but I didnu2019t buy it for the brush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

On the cheeks it blends really well and doesn't feel 'cakey' and it's fairly long lasting on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product free to try and I am definitely a fan now!  The color goes on beautifully and lasted all day for me.  I also didnu2019t realize one end of the tube is a blending brush, very cool

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is awesome. It goes on very smoothly and looks natural! Will definitely get this again!

reviews.review_title: Works well but is too expensive
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product! The shade is not as dark as I was expecting which is good because I have really pale skin. I really like the packaging too, its fun that there is a brush on one side, and the case it comes in has a mirror on the inside too! I think this is supposed to double as a lip product if you want but personally I really didn't like it on my lips, it looked very cracked on the lips and not very solid in colour. While I really enjoy this product, I think it is way too expensive for what it is and is pretty on par with some drug store alternatives that are so much cheaper. For that reason, I wouldn't buy it again but I will use the one I received. #freeproduct

reviews.review_title: A must have for all beauty lovers.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful nude creamy blush from NUDESTIX!

It does last long time, it is creamy and can be used on eyes, cheeks and lips. Would love to try more of nudestix products in the future! They deserve their fame!:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: A must have if you are blushaholic
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color and pigment of this blush A lot, it melts right away in your skin, and quantity lasts forever

Having tried it in all three ways recommended, this colour just personally doesnu2019t work for my skin tone as blush (except when building a lot of it) or lip colour (at all), but it looks awesome as a simple eye colour so I might honestly end up using it more for that despite the intended main use of it being blush. Given the price Iu2019m not sure that Iu2019d buy this on my own, but I do think the stick swipes on very smoothly and the brush is solid to blend the colour out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: A must-have in your makeup routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product over the past few week I am LOVING it. This product is super versatile. From cheeks to lips to eyes. I received the shade nude buff. This product is now a must have in my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Must-have! This blush is easy to use and blend with your fingers, sponge, or brush. Even when you swipe the product directly on your face it does not disturb any makeup underneath. I've tried 15+ blushes and go back to this one time and time again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free to review, So first off I want to say that I really like how convenient the packaging is. It has a little brush on the other end which is awesome for using it on your cheeks or whenever you want I bit of color. The color that I received to try is probably not the best color for me. It looked like it would be before I put it on my face but when I did, it looked a little to pale for me. The price point in my opinion is great because you can use this as blush and as lip color as well so I will purchase it again in the near future just a different color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product. It goes on easy no mess and the brush blends the cream right in. It has no greasy feeling and my skin has a natural glow. I was always afraid to use a cream blush but I am so happy I did the product is a game changer for me . Easy to carry anywhere, no mess and a natural look. I will definitely use this from now on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this makeup, it was so versatile, you can use it anywhere on your face, including eyes, and lips. The look was really natural, dewy, luminous and soft. It looked really natural so that if I could use this as a quick pick me up get a glowing look. The cream to blush formula is so easy to applied, blends easily. You can use fingertips to blend or the brush that is the opposite end of the tube. No need to carry extra make-up tools. I have tried a few other products like this but this one is the best. Great formula and the color looked great on my slightly olive skin tone. I also like the clean ingredients and that it has antioxidents so it is also good for your skin. This should be a staple in your make-up routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoyed using the Nudestick cream all over face color. It's easy to use. The brush makes it easy to blend, the color stays on the whole day. I love the 2in1 design because it makes it compact and easy to use on the go.  The texture is very easy to blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolute must! Blends so effortlessly and gives me the must beautiful sun kissed glow. I love the little brush it comes with I blend in circular motions. Its pigmented yet creamy without caking. I bring this everywhere with me its perfect for travelling!

reviews.review_title: P I G M E N T
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: GORG color! little goes a very long way. love the little brush on the end - makes applying on the go easy peasy and is soft

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin

This is my first time using using cream blush and i love the results! When they said creamy, it really meant creamy as it glides and blends so smoothly on skin! It has long lasting pigmentation I would totally recommend this if you love to add new touch to your blush collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product it was easy to apply with great pigmentation. The brush on the other end made it easy to blend in. I will for sure buy this product when my sample runs out. The case it comes in is also really handy for travelling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

However, the blush lasted for an hour or two and I had to reapply it often throughout the day.   #freeproduct #buzzagent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very natural color, leaves a very smooth finish. I used it as a blush on my cheeks. It has a very creamy texture, blends well and does not look harsh on the skin. It also comes along with a brush to apply and comes in a beautiful tin box packaging. Super impressive

reviews.review_title: A magic crayon for your face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely adore this tiny magical stick! It gives my skin a pretty, natural glow without being too heavy. The crayon is soft, making it easy to apply on cheeks, eyes, and lips. Convenient to bring along when traveling. It's perfect for making my face look nice with a matte finish without a lot of effort. If seeking a straightforward way to enhance the skin's appearance, this is a great choice.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a free sample from Bzzz agent.I tried Nudestix blushes for the first time after hearing soooo many times about it. I am shook. I am a light skin person. The idea its good, the stick broke after a couple uses but i still like it. Easy to apply and blend. STAY PUT ALL DAY. Whatu2019s going on. I thought powder blushes stay on the longest but this is like top. The most natural looking blush as if itu2019s coming from within but still fully showing the color.  Is not a bad product I just wish it the stick didn't fall into pieces.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice blush and brush, love the colour and the amount/ opacity. It is very expensive though, and it reminds me of summer fridays blush stick as well (which is a bit more sheer and hydrating while this is more matte). I would also check out the sheglam blush sticks as they are cheaper and seem to have a similar finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a perfect neutral colour and the formula blends really well to create a natural shading and blush look. I love it!!! Nudestix always delivers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I like how easy it is to use and it is set to be used on the go as well, you can fit anywhere and comes with the brush, it's perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as part of a promotion and I really like it! I have used a few of Nudestix's products and have enjoyed learning about them. I have fair skin, so I always worry blush is going to stand out too much, but this is perfect, adds just a touch of colour!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks Nudestix for sending me free Nudies Cream Blush All-Over-Face. Packaging is very sleek and the colour is absolutely perfect for my skin tone. Itu2019s very easy to carry in a small purse for touch ups if youu2019re going out. I applied this blush stick in the morning and blended one side with its brush that comes with a stick and the other side of my cheek with my fingertips and honestly it blended more seamlessly and beautifully with the fingers and stayed for good 4 hours. For the brush I felt it faded the colour and itu2019s more suitable for blending the foundation, however, the brush is very soft and great quality. This colour is absolutely gorgeous and the formula makes my skin look dewy and healthy. I would definitely buy this product for myself and would recommend it to my family and friends. Thanks Nudestix for sending me Nudies Cream Blush All-Over-Face for free and letting me try this gorgeous product before I actually buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: i really love the fresh feel of this product. its amazing how it doesnt dry out my skin even after a busy long day. i'm so happy to have received this product cos its definitely changed my make up game for the better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like that the brush is soft and the blush comes in the stick format for on the go convenience. The brush is removable too which is a plus.  However, the colour of the blush has too much of an orange tone once applied onto my face. It does not show on my face as a rosy colour (as shown on the product picture).   If you are interested in this product, probably best to try the colour in person or to prepare that the colour could look different than advertised.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never used a cream blush before so when I received this sample and tried it, I was pleasantly surprised. I was expecting something heavy on the face but it's the opposite. The cream glides onto the skin on my cheeks smoothly and doesn't leave a greasy feeling. The brush was soft and blended the product onto my skin very well. I have heard of NUDESTIX but was never interested in their products as I have powdered blush and the creams I've used didn't feel good on my skin. After this sample and how impressed I am, I will definitely be purchasing products from NUDESTIX in the future.

reviews.review_title: An amazing 3 in 1 - loved for lips + cheeks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin so I'm always looking for cream based products to help me glow. This looks so natural and you don't need much. It blends easily and is best applied by gently patting it. I personally didn't find the brush helpful, however many other reviewers liked the brush. I also LOVED this for my lips, I  wasn't expecting it to be something I would use other than for blush but it seemed to seep into my lips and really made it look like my lip color rather than something on my lips.  Another great product from Nudestix.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love this product it looks so natural on my face and it blends so easily as well. I love blush but i love natural one and i can say who loves natural can totally go for this one

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product a week ago to review and I am really impressed! I have yet to try a cream blush, and this stick glides so smoothly and blends really well.  I love that there is a brush built in, really smart packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this one. The formula blends like butter and leaves a perfect pigment. The brush goes perfect with the blush. Not gonna throw the brush even after the blush finishes. Loved it

reviews.review_title: Color is beautiful, the smell is... weird?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Nudestix cream blushes and have sooo many. I purchased this new one excited for the finish and the color. The color of this is beautiful, a gorgeous rusty brown but the smell... The smell is so off putting upon initial application. It dissipates, but it made me seriously consider returning. I probably would have but I purchased it with my credit card rewards and last time, Sephora didn't refund those. Maybe I got a bad batch or maybe they changed something, either way... it smells bad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nudestix stick blush comes in a compact lipstick type of container and consistency. Rather than rubbing it on my skin I found that gently patting it on gave on a less bold in colour look, which is what I was after. Seems to blend well. I think I still prefer my powder blushes as I feel a have a bit more control of blending them in. I also wish I would have gotten not such a deep pink color and something a bit lighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush appears natural on my skin. I really like the texture that is very easy to mix with the brush. The colour blends very well. This colour is perfect if you like natural like appearance. The packaging is incredible!. I love the box that has mirror inside.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from BzzAgent. I had heard of Nudestix before but never used it. When I received this check blush, I tried it on immediately and was so blown away by the beautiful nude/bronze colour on my cheek and how well it blended. That tiny little bursh on the end is great to buff it up. I love this product so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Im in love with my Nudestix blush. I have quite a few blushes but i love my new cream blush. Its so versatile, easy to use, cute color and its cream (but not too sticky). I also love it can be used all over the face like eyes, lips & cheeks. I like it even more because it has cute little brush. For me i like to use it with lip balm. It is one of my must have makeup product. I highly recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this as a trial item and have been loving it after using for a few days. It is a smooth and buildable formula that blends out nicely and doesnu2019t break me out!

reviews.review_title: Great for Quick make up routines
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product because it's easy to use and comes with its own application tools. The colour is long lasting and comes in many shades. The texture is amazingly creamy and there are no over powering scents like some cream products have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Nudies Cream Blush All-Over-Face in the shade Nude Buff,u201d I did not have a say in the shade. This shade does not complement a wide range of skin tones, I am of deep complexion. The colour is beautiful and I was hopeful but it goes on very pale. I will however use it under my foundation for colour correction. I can say that the creamy texture blends effortlessly onto the skin. The compact, travel-friendly packaging makes it convenient for touch-ups on the go.

reviews.review_title: Just the right blush to perk up the face
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the shade Nude Buff and I love this color for me because it looks natural, and not over done. I love the ease of application, this formula in stick form is so simple to use, easy to blend, and is not at all drying (I prefer it over those overly pigmented liquid blushes that are hard to blend). The brush on the other hand is a tad stiff but still gets the job done. My skin is oily combination and I find it works well for my skin. Got a couple compliments from coworkers and asked what I was wearing. Iu2019m obsessed with it and I will have to pick up a couple more shades because I love the formula. Highly recommend if you want something natural, easy to use, hydrating and to liven up your face.  I have received this product in exchange for a review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a beautiful color. The blush last all day! Such cute packaging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Sooooo beautiful! This pigment is everything. Little goes a long way

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it totally.  It has perfect pigment and finish and I loved how smooth it felt on skin. Also fan of that little brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is so beautiful! Long lasting and easy to blend out with the built in brush to create the perfect rosy glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This nudies cream blush is so convenient to bring around. One stick to work three parts of my face. I can get a subtle eye shadow colour or a blush or some lipstick. I donu2019t need much for the eyeshadow or the cheeks. I just dab enough and blend in to get the natural look I want. The colour on the lips is also natural too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve always loved using powder blushes but decided to give this a try. I do love he colour, but I find it goes on thick and dry making it hard to spread out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This cream blush is the piece of makeup I was missing from my collection! I love the colour on my skin and it blends in so seamlessly and effortlessly. I love the brush on the end because I can actually travel with it which is so convenient! I can sometimes wear this alone without any bronzer which makes me so happy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a sample and I absolutely adore it! I love how versatile it is and that you can use it as blush, eyeshadow, and lipstick. I also love the brush, the tin box, and the mirror that come with this product. I also like how it's vegan and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The NUDESTIX Nudies Cream Blush in Nude Buff is a game-changer. Its neutral warm rose hue adds a natural flush, creating a radiant, effortless look. The creamy texture blends seamlessly, providing a long-lasting, dewy finish. Perfect for a no-makeup makeup day or building up for a more defined glow. The convenient stick format makes application a breeze, and the product's versatility as an all-over face color adds to its charm. A must-have for anyone seeking a fresh, youthful complexion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was in absolute awe when I received this product. The packaging is top knotch and I adore the fact there is a mirror on the inside of the tin lid. The removable bristle brush is also an awesome bonus when it comes to cleaning that old product off. I got the colour nude buff and it is the perfect amount of pigment and I really enjoyed the color. The application is a nice smooth glide and easily applied with the option to build it up if you need more. Although it is an all over face blush stick I didnu2019t love it for my eyes but very pleased with the results as a lip colour and blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love how easy it is to use this blush. I use it for my lips, cheeks, eyes . It blends so well and gives that beauty and glow. Package is so beautiful and l will definitely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my very first time tried blush all over my face (on my lip, cheeks, and eyes). I love it. Iu2019m very impressed it have oil that soft on my dry skin. It do not have an issue. It does cover my poses. It didnu2019t work out fast unless you touch your face. Iu2019m very happy to have that makeup item

reviews.review_title: Prefect for summer and natural look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice colour and very bendable for desired pigment. Loved the packaging and brush tip.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free by BzzAgent in return for an honest review.  My first impression were I love the tin case it comes in and the packaging is great! Having the brush attached to the product makes it perfect for on the go!  The colour is stunning!! and is perfect for someone who is looking for a natural glow, perfect for if you already have pink undertones and don't want to overdue it. The product is creamy and the brush is super soft. I took off one star because I find it is a more buildable product, so you need to re-apply. Some people might prefer that, but that comes down to preference. Overall, highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: OMG!! I love it! It goes on so smooth, blends out great, is an awesome color that I think goes with many skin tones and comes in the cutest packaging. They've thought of everything, brush on one end and mirror in the case.

reviews.review_title: Great for moms on the go
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love using this as a busy mom on the go. I used it on my eyes, cheeks and lips and it is easily spreadable and buildable and feels very soft on the lips. Very convenient that the brush is included in the same compartment.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This color is great. I have fair skin a it is a perfect pop of pinkish red. It' a great blend with my go to BareBack. The matte formula is my favorite and makes the Cherie ideal on lips as well. Wonderful product

reviews.review_title: I really wanted to love it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product as part of a promotion. I really want to love it but itu2019s mid. It has a great creamy texture, but lacks the ability to blend well on skin.  When used as blush it made all these texture imperfections (that I didnu2019t even know existed) look like dark patchy blotches. On the lips it is a nice colour, not moisturizing though so use lip balm/gloss under. On the eyes it blends well, doesnu2019t bleed, and lasts long. The packaging is amazing though, hence why I gave 3 stars. It comes in a cute metal container with a mirror inside, it also has a blending brush on the opposite end of the product. The blending brush did not do its job, just sucked the product right back up off my face. If you use this product make sure you use your own brushes or fingers to blend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: For that instant lit-from-within radiance, just pop on Nudies Cream Blush on the high points of your faceu2014easy peasy. The creamy texture glides on effortlessly, making it a no-brainer for everyday makeup. Whether you're aiming for a subtle glow or a full-on radiant look, this little gem is your ticket to a quick, creamy, and radiant routine ud83cudf1fud83dudc96 The tin packaging is cute and compact, making it the ultimate travel buddy. The best part? One side has the color, and the other features a handy brush for blending u2013 seriously convenient for a laid-back finish. Think of it as your secret weapon for a relaxed, effortlessly fabulous vibe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush application, its really pigmented, smooth and easy to blend out and the colour suits my skin tone now that we're getting into the colder winter months. I love that it gives my usual pale face some life and that the colour is buildable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for over a week and itu2019s amazing. It applies smoothly and the pigment is a nice rosy pink.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Nudies Cream Blush All-Over-Face Color! The texture is incredibly smooth and blends seamlessly into my skin. The color payoff is fantastic, giving my cheeks a natural, healthy flush. What's even better is that it lasts throughout the day, so I don't have to worry about touch-ups. It's become a staple in my makeup routine, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a versatile and long-lasting blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush. The formula is super portable and convenient. Itu2019s creamy, blends easily and is super buildable coverage. I love the nude buff colour too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this product for almost 2 weeks now. I really like the colour since I am fair skinned and it's not an obnoxious colour my face. It's a really nice nude shade that gives me some extra warmth in combination with my bronzer. While it's mean to be a blush, I've actually found it to be a great eyeshadow for days when I am in a rush and don't have a lot of time I can put into my routine. It also doubles as a lip colour. The built in brush is very useful.

reviews.review_title: Returned. Not for Deeper Skin Tones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The pigment wasnu2019t strong enough to appear on Hersheyu2019s Kiss toned skin. The consistency is a lovely velvet but that was not enough to make up for the lack of pigmentation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The NUDESTIX Nudies Cream Blush is a game changer. Easy application with a creamy formula, long lasting pigmentation all day, but very blendable and subtle! This is my first cream blush and I definitely prefer it to powder.

reviews.review_title: One product, multiple ways to use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this in exchange for my honest review. I enjoyed that it had multiple uses and all, but I found the colour to be too much so I made sure to use very little at a time and added as I went along with my makeup application. Not a bad cosmetic product that functions as a more than one purpose.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in the nude buff shade it is the most natural blush. It is creamy and easy to blend and it stays all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received NUDESTIX's Nudies Cream Blush All-Over-Face Color free to try from @buzzagent.  I wear makeup quite regularly and have known of the Nudestix brand but had never tried it before today.  I have used cream blushes in the past. I received the color Nude Buff which is a very charming color and would work for many skin tones. It is a buildable color and blends beautifully. I did wear it with a medium coverage foundation with Serum built in it so I already had a Dewey finish. Even applying Nudestix with the Serum texture on my face, it applied well and the lovely brush on the end did a nice job on blending it without compromising the foundation underneath.  The packaging is cute. I like the brush on the one end. It feels quality. The metal container the Nudestix comes in also has a mirror under the lid which is a really pleasant surprise.

reviews.review_title: Must have product for travel and everyday routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently had the opportunity to try out the Nudies Cream Blush All-Over-Face Color in Nude Buff for Free through the bzzagent sampling program in exchange for my honest review. Im super thankful and after having tried the product, I'm genuinely impressed! The formula is really smooth and blends effortlessly onto the skin, giving a natural finish. The brush that comes with the Blush is really convenient and the bristles are super soft.   The color Nude Buff is versatile and adds a subtle warmth to my complexion without looking overpowering. What I love most is the buildable nature of the product u2013 whether you prefer a subtle hint of color or a more intense flush, this blush allows for easy layering.  The texture is creamy and hydrating, making it a dream to apply. It doesn't cling to dry patches and feels weightless on the skin. The long-lasting formula is a game-changer for me; it stays put throughout the day, maintaining that healthy, dewy glow.  The packaging is also practical and travel-friendly, with a convenient twist-up design. Overall, the Nudies Cream Blush has become a staple in my makeup routine, and I genuinely appreciate the opportunity to experience such a high-quality product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a OMG! product. It glides like a butter on your skin and blends in easily without any effort. The colour Pay off is good. In my opinion it is not very long lasting. It stays for only 3-4 hours on me. This shade looks very natural on the medium skintone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This stick is greatly pigmented and the consistency is very cream. It works great on my medium/deep skin tone. I have cool/neutral undertones and the color adds warmth to my skin. Itu2019s not too overpowering and it blends seamlessly. I like that itu2019s versatile and I use it on my lips as well as eyelids for a neutral warm look. I love that itu2019s compact and that the stick has a brush on the other end. This makes it extremely versatile and easy to use!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in a cute little metal container. The shade is amazing for daily use and the creamy texture is nice on my skin. A must-have in my routine. Definitly recommend this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, it is a beautiful blush and the perfect thing to wear in the summer.  I am shocked that it now costs 50 dollars which is unbelievable and I will not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It's very good for dry skin and gives a natural glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very pigmented with a natural finish, lasts all day and the packaging is perfect for travel but a little difficult to blend/spread because of the dryness of the formula. The shade sun kissed pink looks very natural on my fair skin. I think this product would work well if you have normal-oily skin and prefer a simple/natural makeup look. I donu2019t think it work if you like to wear a full coverage foundation because I think it would take your foundation off while blending.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay I rarely write reviews and it takes a lot for me to live a product. Before this product, I was using Stilau2019s convertible color in Camille. That one was great but hard to blend with a brush or sponge. This one blends like a dream. And the packaging is perfect for touch ups so you donu2019t need to set it. It doesnu2019t smudge or anything! Cannot recommend enough!! I got the rusty rouge color and itu2019s perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Initially I was a big fan of this product. However, two weeks in, I opened the the blush end (as opposed to the applicator end) to find that about half of the top had broken off, jaggedly, and stuck to the cap. Iu2019m really careful with my makeup but assumed I had made a mistake with screwing the stick back down before capping it.   However, today (less than a month into using this product) I opened the cap again to find it completely fallen out of the stick and smashed into the cap. Itu2019s ruined.   I have been storing it normally in a small makeup bag on my bathroom shelf. My apartment is temperature controlled. I have not moved it from my bathroom. Sad to say, but it must be the packaging.   Separately, the applicator brush isnu2019t worth much. I assume itu2019s a means of providing less product relative to the visual length of the tube. I used it only once and the result was just a messy brush (I redid the application at the time with my own sponge).   I enjoyed the product while it lasted, but I need a new blush now, since this product couldnu2019t keep together, and I wonu2019t be repurchasing this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful product with handy brush for travel or on-the-go use. One star knocked off because price for this product has gone up over 22% since February.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first NudeStix product and I need to try everything from this brand now. This blush is so creamy and it's my every day blush I grab for because this shade it so neutral and perfect. The brush lowkey sucks but just rating the blush this product is 5 stars. It has a slight glow to it which just adds to the natural look. The case it comes in is so cute too and brings a mirror.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the blush but the packaging became a nightmare. After a while the package like disintegrates?Black flakes all over my makeup bag, and my hands and face when applying makeup. Really annoying. So now I just leave it at home because I canu2019t take it anywhere without a mess

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought Cherie and hot fire and the colours are really pretty. I was pleasantly surprised it still showed after a long day. Save yourself some money tho and order it off their website direct, $10+ savings for us Canadians.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is beautiful on the cheeks, eyes and lips. Very versatile product. Love Nudestix products!!
Another great product and color from this brand! Perfect for summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The only reason this got 4 stars is because it is pricey but itu2019s amazing and now a staple. I have tan skin and Iu2019ve been looking for a shade like this for a while - so complementary, buildable, smooth, all of that. Itu2019ll look gorgeous on fair to deep skin. Great color if you donu2019t know where to start.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have like 4-5 shades from the Selena Gomez one, I forgot the name. And Iu2019m ready to get rid of them because these are AMAZING. I have fallen in love with this brand. This blush is amazing, I bought other little ones at ulta and they are majestic!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this color! It might seem a little bit too bright when you apply it on your cheeks, but when you blend it itu2019s the perfect colour! It makes you look healthy and glowy and you can also leave it like this without fixing it with a powder blush because itu2019s not sticky at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of my daily staples. Itu2019s a little bit of a learning curve but definitely amazing once you get the hang of it. I love the colour u201cbare backu201d as itu2019s a great neutral tone for everyday use. Packaging is nice and sleek also.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These were my absolutely favourite and I feel like no one new how good they were but all of a sudden the price has gone up drastically :(((( Makes me so sad.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: works well under powder makeup.  I love using it as eye shadow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: why did the price increase dramatically???? yikes. otherwise these are amazing but not sure I can afford t buy new at this price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: favorite blush  but theirs always hair on the blush stick and it gets really dirty except that i love it i would recommend using another brush and not the one that comes with it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a cream blush replacement (had been using one from MAC, ran out, Sephora staffer suggested this instead). I LOVE it. The color I chose happens to be really good for me, which might be very specific. But I really love the fact that it's multi-purpose and I can update my lip and cheek color through the day, which for a pale gal like me makes all the difference. I carry it in my purse and am now buying 2 so I can have one in my main makeup kit too.  They should pay me for all the people I've told about this. I will reapply in front of girlfriends and they gasp like it's a makeover reveal. This might be more about what color does for me, but I really felt like his product did the job. I go from half dead to alive.  My one problem with it is that the smell of the actual product is a little chemically. I didn't have problems with a smell on the brush like I'd seen some reviewers say. And I would love to see Sephora carry the refill -- it's not necessary to buy the full packaging with the tin and brush each time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great blush! The formula is really nice and it applies very smoothly. I really like how thereu2019s a brush attached. It makes application easy.

I set with powder, and the blush stays all day. Without the powder, you get a fresh dewy look. I like this color (fire hot) more than the peach. Despite having fair skin, it's not too intense.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to use, natural looking, and travel friendly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Anything Sofia uses, I use! Itu2019s a beautiful shade and blends really easily! I get the hype lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have many colors and they work great.  Love that it's travel friendly with the brush on one side.  Otherwise, I just use my brush as I find the bristles a little stiff to work with but convenient for travel.  I've had mine products for over a year so they last with daily use.  But, I won't purchase again becz with ANY outdoor temperature increase, the product gets too melty in the packaging and doesn't transfer to skin as well whether I'm using a brush or directly on skin. I'm not talking Costa Rica humidity heat but even just basic elevated spring temperatures change the product consistency.

reviews.review_buyer_description: mediumTan skin tone
reviews.review_text: Love it and reflects such a pretty pink on my tan skin.

reviews.review_title: Out of my cream blushes, this is now my go-to.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Previously, I bought the nudies matte lux in dolce darlin', which is dewier and more creamy. Love that color on me, especially during fall/autumn.  I have been gifted the nudies matte sun-kissed pink from Bzzagent. This is my first review for them.  I honestly do prefer the regular nudies matte formula, i just wish the product was a tad more on the creamy side without the dew. I'm getting older (30), and I don't particularly enjoy the tugging I have to endure to blend it out.  I really dislike the brush attached to the componet. I also dislike the brush from the makeup by mario blush componet, too. I just use the sephora pro blush brush for all my cream blushes.  I never wear pink blushes, but there's just something about the sun-kissed pink shade that flatters me. It's very similar to the natural flush in my cheeks.  I'm tickled pink that I got this gifted to me because I would have never tried this shade out.  When I bought the dolce darlin shade, i was initially upset by the size. I do believe it has around the same amount of product from makeup by mario, just way smaller, which I like. It takes up less space.  I wish instead of the brush they have us more product, also get rid of the tin. The brush and tin have to take up a good chunk of the price. It's unnecessary.  All that said, it's my go-to blushes. Over my fenty and make up by mario. I love them all, don't get me wrong, but I use my nudies more.  Thanks, Bzzagent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: when i received this product i was so excited. i tested it out on my hand first and the blush blends perfectly with the brush. the brush quality is superb also. and the mirror! the tiny mirror is awesome for on-the-go application. next i tried applying it to my cheeks which i accidentally overdid (because it deposits a lot of color), but later learned that it's actually great that i don't have to use much product as it will last me a long time! the outcome is very very pretty natural blush. works great as lipstick also!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Whilst the brush this comes with can be great for travel or on-the-go, I found that using a sponge or a dense brush to buff the colour onto my cheeks works better because the formula is quite dense itself. As a result, the colour payoff can be very intense and long lasting. Building this up would be quite difficult but otherwise, it's a beautiful shade.

reviews.review_title: A perfect natural sun kissed glow!!

This shade gave me the perfect sun kissed glow. The red was a little intimidating at first but it ended up being the perfect shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_title: Not a want but a NEED.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have received this product in exchange for an honest review.  Simply put, this product has dethroned all other cream blushes currently in my collection. It may look intimidating, and is highly pigmented, but it still works great for everyday! I love that it's versatility allows you to experiment or customize your desired level of intensity. This color also truly compliments all skin tones, but looks exceptional on deeper complexions. So if you're on the lookout for the perfect red-toned blush, this is the one!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

I found that the brush removed too much product. When I applied the next day, I blended with my fingers and it worked much better for me. Itu2019s the perfect colour too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from bzzAgent in exchange for my honest review. I have never used cream blush before and always used powder blush so I was looking forward to trying NUDESTIX cream blush stick. I have very dry skin so I feel this is a really good product for me as it doesnu2019t give my skin dehydrated look and since the finish is matte, Iu2019m able to use it with bronzer and not look too shiny. I tried the blush for few days and it stayed for me whole day as blush but had to reapply for lip. Overall I love blush stick and I would definitely like to try other shades. Also after reading more about product, I realized that itu2019s cruelty free and hypoallergenic which adds lots of points for me as I have toddler and having baby soon. Iu2019ll be recommending this product to my friends and family.

reviews.review_title: One of the best blush I have tried!

It is amazing for low maintenance quick makeup days. Also, I absolutely love the packaging, especially the brush. It's a great item to pack for travel.
