I love the idea of a universal u2018blood flowu2019 like flush, but the reality is, it just doesnt suit my olivey tone. Still would recommend to others, just note for my personal skintone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my third nudestix blush and Iu2019m obsessed. The formula is easy to use and the packaging is convenient. This has been my staple shade for the summer and works well on every skin tone! A must have

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First off Iu2019m already a huge fan of nudestix and am in love with their cream blushes so I was so excited to try a new one out. This would not of been a color Iu2019d choose on my own as I am fair skin and it is very bright however a little goes a long way and I love the summery tint it gives me and that I can use it on my lips as well! These have amazing staying power even in hot humid days and are super travel friendly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I dont use much make up but when I do itu2019s for skating shows and let me say how it made my routine easier. The blush is easy to carry and you donu2019t even need any brush since it has its own brush! If you want to carry the little box with you, youu2019re in luck because it has a mirror included inside the lid. It can also be used as a lipstick which is quite fun. Iu2019ve never had blushes in lipstick format before and itu2019s a game changer. I believe that Iu2019d buy one for myself when this one is over. Itu2019s really easy to apply as well. The only down side is that I feel like it doesnu2019t appear enough on my skin and thats a major factor because I believe that make up should be made for everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this item for free courtesy of NUDESTIX and BzzAgent in exchange for an honest review! Iu2019m normally a powder blush kinda girl, but I think Iu2019ll keep coming back to this blush stick! I got it in sun kissed pink, and Iu2019m a fair-light, olive undertone eastern Asian, and it suits me! I normally shy away from pinks since anything too light or bright clashes with how green I am, but I can pat this out until itu2019s a natural, sheer pink. Itu2019s very creamy and buttery, so itu2019s easy to spread out with the warmth of my fingers. I like to u201cstampu201d it on so I donu2019t rush moving my foundation underneath. Great size to keep in my on-the-go makeup bag, or to save space in general! The product did get broken off from the base, but that was probably due to rough shipping, and not because of the productu2019s quality. Still perfectly usable once I squished it back in the tube.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nudies Matte Cream Blush stick in Sunkissed gives a really nice natural flush to my cheeks.  It is very creamy and blends in easily with your fingers or the little brush on the other end of the stick.    It can also be used on the lips and I top it off with a little clear lipgloss.  It gives my lips a little splash of colour.  It's perfect for natural looking makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the most pigmented blushes I've tried. It spreads well and applies evenly. I think a close comparison would be MAC's Hot Pepper blush but I've noticed that their blush gets really weird and dark when you keep using a brush with it. In this case you can apply it directly to your cheeks and either use your fingers or the brush attached. A little really goes a long way and I can see this product lasting for a long time. I'm on the darker side and it's so flattering on me! My first thought was that I was worried that it would look chalky on my skin but it looks natural but you can layer it as well to make it a deeper red. I can definitely see that this blush will last a long time and I'm happy with how it looks on me.

reviews.review_title: My new favourite blush and lip colour!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted Nudestix Nudies Matte All Over Face Blush Color in Sunkissed Pink from @BzzAgent. It is the perfect colour for that blushed glow on your cheeks as well as that beautiful pop to accentuate your pout! I love that it has a blending brush attached which twists off for washing! 100% recommend! #freeproduct

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product. It gave a beautiful flush of color to my cheeks. When I saw the color initially I was a little hesitant whether it would look good on my indian skin tone. But when I applied I was amazed at how it looked so natural. I also love applying this on my eyelid to give it a little pop of color like a no makeup look. It blended really well after applying my foundation. The only con I found was that if I want to clean the brush I would have to be very careful so as I don't get any water on the product on the other side.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This magic blush stick is pretty awesome! The blush stays where you place it then use the attached blending brush to blend it in. When you add to much or in an area you donu2019t want it blend it a bit more! Unlike power blush it will not get everywhere, and best of all you donu2019t have to worry about it breaking or being crumbly like a power! Iu2019m not so good at blending with the brush (maybe some directions for the fancy make up challenged would be helpful?) I used my fingers to blend it and worked well then used the brush to blend where I didnu2019t want it as noticeable. It feels great on the skin, weightless. Itu2019s not sticky or shinny, the matte finish helps to blend well on the skin. I donu2019t wear lipstick normally but I did try it on my lips I liked the feeling and it looked very nice and natural with a beauty boost!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review.   The product has a beautiful colour. I got mine in Hot Fire and while I was a little hesitant about using it on my pale skin it actually blended out really nicely to a more soft pinkish colour. That being said I would be very light handed when using it because it did end up looking a little like I got a sunburn when I used to much.   Was a nice orangey red colour on my lips but pretty patchy and I donu2019t think would work for all day use as lipstick.   My one con is that the size of the stick makes it slightly difficult in controlling how much product is dispensed on the cheek but overall I did like it. I think itu2019ll be super handy especially for travel with the built in brush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am very surprised with this blush. I am not one for blush usually, being pale with sensitive skin. I found this went on nice and thinly. I love the design with the brush inside the make up itself. Anything that makes it so I can carry less is awesome.

reviews.review_title: very pretty, would be nice on all skin tones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colour in the tube is intimidating at first because I am very pale, but on the skin it's so pretty. I think this would look gorgeous on light skin to dark skin, I LOVE the shade of it. I've tried other shades and this one is awesome too, easy to blend, very flattering. It's easy to add too much so start with a little and add more as needed. 10/10, I'd love to try other shades as well

reviews.review_title: The perfect Must Have for everyday makeupu2026
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this amazing multiple use cream blush as a free product for honest review from #bzzagentu2026 i have normal to dry skin and very few makeup products suits my skin but i must say this product is made for meu2026 Nudies Matte Cream Blush in shade Sunkissed Pink works amazinggg for meu2026 i apply it in the morning as my daily makeup and it stays the whole dayu2026 its creamy and gets smoothened onto the skin effortlesslyu2026 and gives instant natural blush looku2026 i loved it more on cheeks than lipsu2026 i would definitely buy it again in the same shade as it suits my skin toneu2026 i highly recommend this miracle product to my friends and family and anyone else looking for perfect blushu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I mostly used this as my eye shadow, lipstick and to make a sunburn blush on bare skin. The application of product is quick and easy to blend. It is long-wearing because it is matte but the shade is too bright for me so I had to put only a little amount on my face. I prefer to blend it using my fingers because the brush strands on the other end is too short.  u2757I received this product for free from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a versatile product, which can be used on the cheeks, eyes and lips. Itu2019s got a fiery red colour, which I absolutely love! You can apply one layer for a subtle look, or build it up for a more bold look. Itu2019s got great lasting power, staying on all day long!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Bzz Agent! This Nudies Matte Cream Blush Stick in Sunkissed Pink is the Perfect companion for summer!  It is easy to apply and you can use your fingers or the brush include in this little gem of a beauty tool! I used it mainly in the morning to add a touch of colour to my cheeks but I can as easily see myself bring it along on a night out with the girls for touch up during the evening of use it on my lips for a natural look. Love the beautiful case and the mirror to simplify the quantity of tools needed to be carried! Want more? With all the different shades to try and the fact itu2019s a vegan product itu2019s a must in the awesome Nudestix line!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect cool toned blush. Retry on its own and is super long lasting. Shade is perfect on cheeks, eyes and dabbed onto lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how this product blends out so beautifully and how it comes with a blending brush which happens to be removable. I especially love the fact Iu2019m able to use it not just as a blush, but on my lips as well! The colouru2019s also very complimenting, natural looking, and buildable. Creme blushu2019s are a new experience for me and this blush currently has won my heart. I would absolutely purchase!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Big thanks to BzzAgent for providing me this product to review. I absolutely love this blush. I've been looking for something to fill the hole in my heart since posietint by benefit was discontinued, and this has been an excellent contender so far! It's not the exact same colour or consistency, but it's close enough that I'm satisfied! My only gripe is that it is patchy with a couple of foundations I own, but it isn't a deal breaker for me since I can just use a different foundation that works well with it. The compact packaging is also travel-friendly, allowing you to achieve a fresh and radiant look wherever you are. As for whether I would buy this product, I would definitely consider repurchasing the Nudestix NUDIES BLUSH STICK - Sunkissed Pink. Its high quality, ease of use, and long-lasting wear make it a worthwhile investment. The shade range offered by Nudestix also provides options for various skin tones and preferences. I tried out this product everyday for 1 week and I was looking to see how easily it went on, how natural the shade looked, and how long it lasted throughout the day. I can honestly say that I applied product this in the morning before work, worked 9 hours, then worked out and still saw that nice rosy flush at the end of the day. What's even more important to me is that I have very sensitive, acne prone skin so I am always looking for products that do not clog my pores and break me out. Nudestix is one of the few brands that fits the bill on this for me and this shade did not disappoint on that front either. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought these blushes with my own money, in Tiger Lily Queen, Cherry Blossom Babe, and Sweet Peach Peony. They're my fave cream blushes, along with the Tower28 blushes. I love the glowy finish and ease of application, and this is one of the few cream formulation blushes that actually doesn't fade--other brands like Rare Beauty's liquid blushes and Mario's stick blushes fade patchy and go unevenly on my face. You lose a little bit of the initial glow of the Nudestix as the day goes on, but otherwise color is remarkably consistent for the most part. I have dry skin, am in my early 30s, and some liquid/cream products really do emphasize texture on me, but this really doesn't. Also the application is quite sanitary; if I use it when I'm sick, I cut off a wee little bit of the top. Also, for clean beauty, it hasn't turned in over 1 year since I've had em, and that's stellar. 10000/10 would rebuy!

I really thought it was just going to be a cream that I had to blend with my fingers, but WOW, a BRUSH??? Amazing. - Cute colour!  Cons: - Maybe itu2019s just my skin, but even with a bunch of setting spray, the pigment didnu2019t last! :(  - A lot of it goes away on the brush once you brush it in, and as someone who LOOOOOVES that blushy peachy look, it felt like I had to apply multiple the product multiple times before getting to that stage. - Looked way better on my cheeks than on my lips, but again, might just be a me thing.  Overall, glad I experienced it, but will not be using it as a daily blush. Back to being a powder blush girl, I guess!

reviews.review_text: This blush is amazing! The brush makes for an easy application. I have been using for over a month and can not find any negatives. I have rather sensitive skin but this has not bothered it at all.  This shade (pretty peach) fits my skin tone perfectly. It comes with a cute container as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to apply, glide on smoothly and long lasting. Colour is subtle but showing beautifully and naturally. No irritation on skin and I like how multi-functional it can be used, from cheeks, eyes to lips. So convenient and fun to play with!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Who doesnu2019t love a dewy quick and easy blush that can be used all over! Another killer product by nudestix

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great but not perfect. Also smells kind of weird. I wouldnu2019t buy it for full price, maybe at 20-30% off. Great shade range and easy to take on the go! Love the brush on the other end.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This all over blush glides on really silky smooth and settles to a powder finish. It feels nice and buttery when putting it on. It has good pigment. This specific colour is a bit on the orange side but if that's what you are looking for it's great. I liked how the brush blends it nicely and is removable so it can be properly cleaned. The tin package it comes in is cool, it has mirror on it, though personally I would rather a lower cost and skip the tin. It works well on eyes and lips too and I actually prefer it as a lip colour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this blush. It is the perfect colour to work as both a blush and bronzer. It adds a lot of warmth to your face while still looking natural. The formula is creamy and blendable. The only con for me is the brush on the end, I found it hard to blend. I recommend using a sponge to blend for a much more natural look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is super pigmented, blends like a dream and gives me a sun kissed look! Love it! I also really like the packaging and actually enjoyed using the built in brush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this blush stick. It had tons of pigment, and blended really well. The colour wasnu2019t my favourite, it was a bit too orange, but other than that, I really liked it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this in exchange for writing a review. I have to say though, it is a wonderful product!   I donu2019t use this when I am bare faced as I have rosacea, however it is the perfect blush otherwise! I wear either BB cream or a tinted sunscreen daily, and I need to bring colour back to my face when I wear these. Despite it being a stick product, this doesnu2019t move my base product, and it blends so well! I love the brush on the other side, it makes it so easy to apply. Itu2019s incredibly soft, and works very well to blend the product! I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been obsessed with cream/stick blushes for a while, so I definitely needed to try this brand. The blushes are highly pigmented (a little goes a long way), and the built-in brush is so convenient, it helps you blend the blush without the need for another brush.  Oh, and the color doesn't fade, it lasts ALL DAY.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a blush girl and have been searching for one that will last on me throughout the day. This one is sooo good. Its super creamy, easy to blend, and lasts soo long. This colour also makes you look sunkissed which is a win-win. Super great for travel too since it has a brush on the other end!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this Nudies Bloom All Over Dewy Color in Juicy Melons. It has a light, blush pink color that is perfect for my lips and cheeks! It provides a natural glow and is super buildable and blendable. The brush is so convenient and is helpful for on-the-go touchups! I love NUDESTIX products already and this one is my new fave! I have been recommending it to my friends and will be investing in other shades. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_title: Not a fan but very beginner friendly
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not really a fan of this product. It says it can be used on bare skin and over makeup but it just removed my makeup. When I did use it on my bare face it looked pretty, made my cheeks look a bit rosy. BUT my product smelled moldy, like it had gone bad. Not sure if thatu2019s the smell for all but mine did not smell good. I usually use powders for blush so this was a bit different for me. I will say I do like the packaging, color and travel case with mirror.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've really been loving this blush. The cream formula is nice and smooth and it gives me such a pretty bit of colour. I find that it does fade a bit over time but gives me a nice healthy glow and can be used on the lips and eyes as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free to review, however this is an honest review. I never liked cream blushes but the coral tone u2018dolce darlingu2019 blew me away! Formulation is great and lasts a decent amount of time, I donu2019t like coral on my lips but this would work for lipstick too. As this is a bit pricey I would look into other cream blushes before making the plunge, but it does what itu2019s supposed to!

reviews.review_title: A Very Flattering Shade On Me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this blush for free in exchange for my honest review from BzzAgent and Nudestix. This is now my favourite blush out of all the ones that I own. I'm really pale and it's hard to find a shade that looks good on me and not unnatural or clown like.  This Nudies Matte Lux Blush in the shade Rosy Posy looks soooo good on me. I'm in love with it! The formula goes on nice and creamy before drying down to powder and this makes it really easy to blend and control the intensity of the colour. You can apply it directly to your face but I like to apply it using my index and middle fingers and tapping it onto my cheeks. I like that it can be used all over the face including the eyes and lips. This is a great lip colour as well but I wish it had a little extra staying power on my lips. It would be great if they made a liquid lipstick in this shade. The little tin it comes in is very smart and ecofriendly; the mirror inside is great for touchups and the tin prevents the blush stick from getting crushed in your purse so you don't have to worry about the product going everywhere if the lid popped off. I love that its made with clean ingredients, vegan and cruelty free. Going forward this is the blush I will be buying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My makeup skills arenu2019t very strong and I am also lazy and like makeup products that are quick and easy to use. Thatu2019s why Iu2019m a big fan of Nudestix products, and their products are regulars in my makeup routine. This blush is very easy to use and user-friendly. I actually tapped it lightly on my cheeks and blended it with the included brush (which I love is included, along with the mirror which is also super cute). I found it a little drying for my lips (Iu2019m not a fan of matte lip products in general), so I will stick to using it as a blush. It blended easily and looks quite natural! I will say that it is more of a rose colour than the coral tone in the stock photo.

reviews.review_title: Love the formula - the shade not so much
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tend to go for cream blushes since the staying power is longer than powder on my skin.  I also love the fact that the blush comes with a built in brush on the other end so it's perfect for traveling. I find that this shade is good for those days when you want to wear very minimal makeup and add some color but not for my everyday makeup. My skin tone/shade is in the medium range and unfortunately, the nude buff doesn't show up well on my face. Also, I find that applying the blush on the back of my hand first to warm it up rather than swiping directly on my face makes the texture so natural. All in all, it's a good natural blush! Maybe best suited for a lighter skin tone though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried Nude Buff over full makeup, as that's how I would apply it since I need foundation/concealer to cover redness on my face, and was pleasantly surprised that it worked really well! It blended quickly and easily and didn't look patchy. It dried down to a light powdery finish and felt weightless on my cheeks. I also tried it on my lips and eyes to bring it all together and it looked nice too, although I think it might lean slightly too warm for me to use on my lips, but that's due to my cool-toned colouring. I actually really like this product and will be reaching for it whenever I want a change from my typical pink/purple/peach powder blushes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The formula of this blush was super creamy and was very easy to apply. It sits on top of my foundation nicely and I didnu2019t have any issues with it removing my makeup underneath or clinging to any dry spots. Colour was also really pretty, fairly pigmented and buildable. Did not love the brush it comes with though. It does not blend out the product that well but it didnu2019t really bother me because I just used my normal blush brush to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use it with my tinted moisturizer and it gives me the perfect flawless no-makeup makeup look. I have dry skin and found this product super comfy on my skin and blends super well with my dry patches. I love the brush on the other side it's super convenient and super soft on the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just love these! Itu2019s so smooth, easy to blend and I like how you can use it for eyes, lips, face. Super versatile. No unpleasant smells and it felt nonexistent on my face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received it to try for free from bzzagent. this color is beautiful and warm. the formula blends easily and smooth and the coverage can be built up as much as you like. I was impressed within the first use. the brush on the other size is perfect and soft. overall saying, I now want all these colors because application I so easy and exactly how I like, it just feels like your own glow from within.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a super easy and convenient product to use. Especially on the go, just throw it in your bag! I love that there's a mirror inside the case for the blush and that on one end of the blush there's a brush that makes it easy to blend. The formula is really nice and blends really easily. It lasts all day and has a good color pay off. Overall, I love using this product and would reccomend trying it out.

reviews.review_title: Love this formula and how easy it is to use.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off I love what this brand stands for. So happy that itu2019s vegan and cruelty free and comes in recyclable packing!!! I find myself reaching for this product on days I want to apply easy and quick makeup. I love that itu2019s so creamy and easy to blend and comes with its own blender brush. Super easy to use and a nice pop of color donu2019t be intimidated by the color if you think they are too bright or too deep.. they are very blend able and have a mistake proof formula. They are very makeup beginner friendly, I would highly recommend. Iu2019m interested in trying out the other shade nude buff now that I have tried out the dolce darlinu2019 shade and am so happy with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this blush in JUICY MELONS and I love it ! The color is beautiful, it blends in effortlessly, stays put and makes my skin visibly smooth. I didn't find any stickiness with this blush either, so I would give 9/10.

reviews.review_title: Nudestix matte all over face blush.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am very impressed with the Nudestix all over blush! Not only is the product extremely creamy and easy to work with. It blends out like a dream and leaves your skin with a soft flush of colour. It's feels like nothing on your skin, no sticky tacky feeling that some cream/stick blushes have. I wear the Dolce Darlin colour..it is a terracotta coral colour with a warm undertone. It gives my face warmth and dimension without feeling heavy or looking greasy. This color works well with my summer tan and brings out my olive undertones.  The packaging is really clever their is a brush that blends out the color really evenly, or you can also use your fingers. It's very easy and user-friendly, also the package comes in a cute tin with a mirror...everything you need to create a great glow is at your fingertips! I will be buying some shades for the colder months when my skin is less tan, such as their pink tones. Definitely need these, so easy to carry in your purse with the included tin. My friends also said my skin looked really healthy and not made up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m obsessed with the new line of blush sticks from Nudestix - so much variety! Iu2019ve always loved the brand/the Sunkissed blush used to be my go-to everyday blush, but Dolce Darlinu2019 is now my new favourite! Very brown girl friendly or can also be used as a contour on lighter skin tones, and the perfect pinky-toned blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this blush itu2019s gives me a very natural flushed look! Itu2019s creamy which is a plus for me because powdered and liquid blushed donu2019t really work for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A little dry I find the texture, I prefer the dewy ones. The colour is pretty on my tan skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the concept of this. Stick product on one end and brush on the other end. Easy to toss in your bag in case you need it on the go. My only issue with this product is its longevity. Cream products tend not to last on my face and that's the only reason I wouldn't buy this product. It's a nice colour and texture and blends nicely, it just doesn't last. It's gone from my face after 30 mins.  I'd recommend this blush to anyone who has had a good experience with cream products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the packaging- the product comes in a sleek black metal tin and the product itself is a cream stick on one side and a dense, flat brush on the other side.  The packaging is absolutely perfect for application and use- slide on some color with the cream stick side then either blend out with your fingers or with the included brush on the other side. For an easier cleaning bonus, the brush is easily detachable so you can wash it without worrying about getting water into the cream blush half. Definitely a 10/10 for the overall packaging and ease of use. Next, I loved the color (Rosy Posy- cool pink), which looked great on the eyelids, cheeks, and lips. The texture goes on creamy but with a matte finish. Overall I really loved the application and initial results using this stick. However, because of the cream base it really doesn't last long unfortunately- it began creasing on my eyelids almost immediately (both with and without using primer first) and began to fade quite quickly on my lips and cheeks as well. The good thing is that the product is so portable so you can easily pop it in your purse for touch-ups throughout the day, however, personally I prefer products with longer lasting color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: absolutely love this product. it's so easy to blend and it comes with its own blender

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great product that comes in a cute black tin container. This product comes with a built in brush that you can easily use instead of using your fingers or another brush. I usually go for a powder blush but this works well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colour of this and how easy it is to use compared to many other liquid/cream blushes I've used. It's amazing on the cheeks. I also used it on my eyelids and its super easy to add a nice pop of colour to your eyes. I didn't like it as much on the lips because of the texture, but the colour was still nice. I wish it worked on my lips because I think having a uniform colour on your blush eyes and lips is so cute! I've found myself reaching for this product super often on days I want to do quick and easy makeup (so most of the time). Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually don't use blush for everyday makeup. But, I gave this Nudestix Matte All Over Blush a try and I must say that I am pretty much satisfied by the results. I also used it as matte lipstick and was good enough. Can be used as eye shadow as well I guess. Overall, good product for multiple uses.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who does not typically use blush products, I thought this was a pretty good product. I generally go for a powder blush on the odd occasion that I do use it, so I was interested in seeing how a stick would measure up. Compared to powder I would say it's definitely more buildable. The pigment is nice but it blends away really quickly when you use the brush attached so I kept having to add more for it to even be visible. I guess if you like a very, very subtle blush it's good otherwise don't blend it to much or build it up and it'll be just fine.   Overall, this is a nice product to have because it's convenient in that I was able to use it in my eyelids and lips and it worked well for both. Obviously the size of the stick is a little too large to use it directly so I had to use a smaller blush to apply it to my lids and lips without making a mess but I loved the convenience of it being a 3 in 1.   For causal blush users, I'd recommend it although I'm not sure if I'd repurchase for myself.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This colour is gorgeous on my cheeks and lips. It's perfect for my summer tan and will look nice in winter when I'm pale. It blends out super easy. I like that the brush is attached. I would definitely purchase other shades after trying this one.

reviews.review_title: A must have in your routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this blush. It's quick and easy to apply and stays on all day long. For a more intense look, blend with a brush and voila. The packaging is also super cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I typically do not use blushes regularly as I find it harsh and not natural looking.  This Nudestix matte lux blush is awesome as you can choose your coverage and the brush allows you to blend and blur it out! I also love using it on my lips for a nice, matte lip colour and have received many compliments when wearing it. I have worn it for daily wear to work and to more formal evening events like weddings, etc.  It works for both types of makeup. The tin is awesome for travel and the included mirror is great as well. Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Nudestix Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blush in Pretty Peachy is very flattering on my skin tone. Super easy to apply with the built in brush, and the creamy formula glides on to skin smoothly. I even tried it on my lips for that pinky monochromatic look, so cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Glides on easily and great colour payoff. Tap with a brush to blend it in for a more intense look or use a damp sponge for a more subtle look. Sleek tube and tin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you apply too much at first, itu2019s very easy to blend and have the colour payoff you prefer. It looks natural and itu2019s not sticky. It also has a mirror in the box and a brush. So itu2019s convenient for when Iu2019m travelling or on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the Nudestix Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blush (in Nude Buff). The shade is a perfect match for my skin tone, and it adds a nice touch to my makeup, without making it seem over the top. I was also impressed with itu2019s long lasting effect, even without using setting spray.   The product goes on smooth, and with a matte yet warm result. I personally prefer a matte blush, and this was just great!  I also like that itu2019s compact, easy to carry and it comes with a removable brush, making this product convenient for when on the go! The cute metal box and mirror are a bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was unsure of the colour at first as itu2019s reddish and I usually want to hide my redness but it looks sun kissed on the skin. I also like the feel and look on the lips. My only con is the longevity of wear and creasing on the eyelids even with primer. However, I do have oily eyelidsu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the second product I have tried from nudestix and Iu2019m very pleasantly surprised. What I love most about this blush stick was that it was Blurring!!! Something I always thought was a gimmick with products that werenu2019t a primer but it actually is! The product application is incredibly forgiving if you overapply or put it in places you didnu2019t mean to. The colour i received is also super flattering and I think would be great for the winter.   I have no cons about this!! Iu2019m so impressed

reviews.review_title: Nudestix Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The lightweight formula of NUDESTIX In rosy posy was actually very surprising. Iu2019ve tried other cream blushes and they were all sticky and very hard to blend, but this formula that nudestix has come out with letu2019s you blend these cream blushes seamlessly! I can even use this as a lip balm and the ingredient list is also safe! Itu2019s very cute for on the go as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the tin packaging,  it's sturdy for travel and the mirror is great quality. The application  of the stick itself  is effortless  with the buttery creamy crayon consistency. I find the brush that comes with the stick takes most of the product off so I just used my fingers to dab it.  The peachy colour is great for spring summer and I can see it transition in the early autumn. It leaves a fresh dewy  finish as a blush and a nice creamy lipstick (almost lipbalm) but I didn't like the application  on the eyelids much.  Overall I love it,  with the beautiful  peachy colour let's your skin look fresh and dewy, almost natural blush look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is gorgeous and super easy to apply. I love how nude stix always takes everything one step further to truly make their products more convenient, I love that the blush contains a brush so it makes it extremely easy to pop into my purse to reapply or if I need a little more u201clifeu201d in my face

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This beautiful creamy blush is absolutely stunning and as described in the name can be used all over the face. I personally like the look of it on my cheeks and lips. The product being vegan and natural is great for me considering I have rosacea. It is very hydrating despite looking matte, which is absolute perfection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is perfect for travel! I took it with me on vacation, as it is a mirror, blush, and brush all in one! It blends beautifully, and the colour is stunning!!!

reviews.review_title: Great duo for blush and eye color
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the blush in the past but wasnu2019t in love. Then I tried it in matte and Iu2019m obsessed. I use the Bare Back color for both blush and on my eyelids for the natural makeup look and love it.  Took off one star because you need to build it up a lot and especially on eyelids use a  primer.

reviews.review_title: Perfect natural flush for pale skin gals
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Nude Buff is the absolutely perfect tone of blush if you want a natural tone that is truly neutral. It leans neither too warm or too cool, nor does it read as a specific colour like pink, orange, purple or red. Rather, it's quite tawny and pairs well with any lip or eye colour, letting those items do the talking. The true bonus is that it lasts all day and dries down to a pleasant, non-tacky finish, which can be difficult to find in the world of cream blushes. 5 stars from me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received it for free and I love the shade and the packaging - the brush and blush together make it perfect for my travel kit. I have only used it a couple of times so I need to try more to see how long it lasts. Its looking good so far - definitely recommend the product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Always wanted to try the Nudestix blush and thrilled to get this to review. It went beautifully on my cheeks and loved the pretty peachy shade. It has a brush on the other end which goes well to apply the blush. Used it on my cheeks and forehead and loved the glow. Will buy another shade soon.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to get to try this product, but was disappointed that it wasn't really matte. I found it felt a bit greasy which made it hard to wear over base products because it smudged when blending in. I definitely preferred the old nudies blush i had over this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for about 2 weeks, I am loving it. I love how creamy it is and how easy it is to blend. I put the product on after foundation and concealer. I also sometimes top it with a powdered blush but you honestly don't need to. The color is there regardless.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely adore the versatility of this product. Recently I used it on my cheeks and eyes for an event and got so many compliments. I love that the texture isnu2019t sticky and the product is super blendable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so happy I got to try this product for free! I am absolutely in love with this product. Primarily because it is so practical, you can take it anywhere, the tone of the Rosy Posy colour is amazing for my fair skin. Super easy to apply and it lasts all day! Would highly recommend this product because of it's durability and easy application, but also because of the colour range that is absolutely amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super produit , tres leger et naturel , ju2019ai adore

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is very nice with a cream to powder formula, buildable, blends easily, and lasts all day. It has a nice natural finish that looks just like skin. I also love the packaging, it comes with a removable brush and mirrored lid which makes it super easy to bring and use anywhere. I would totally recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved how convenient this product is, so versatile, I could use it for my whole make up, cheeks, eyes, lips. Plus, the packaging makes it super easy to bring anywhere, and so easy to travel with. The products textures is really creamy and gives a really pretty finish on my skin. I would totally recommend getting this product. I go the nude buff colour and it worked perfectly on my tan skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nudestix didn't disappoint with their new blush. Cream to powder formula, easy to blend, and multi purpose use. I love taking their products when I travel, it has a cute brush on the other end that helps with blending. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ** Receive this product in exchange for my honest opinion! My skin tone is quite fair, which makes me difficult to find the right blush. I love cream/liquid blush but unfortunately, I look like a clown most of the time. The Nudestix Nudies face blush is such a versatile product! Today I applied this product to my eyes, blush and lips. I got compliments from my friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Firstly, Nudestix packaging is always so great with the reusable metal tin & the mirror is very convenient. The actual blush stick is also very easy to use and the size is just right for the cheeks u2014 not too small. The colour is also very flattering and buildable which is nice for matching how u201cdolled upu201d you want to get for the look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: nude buff is super flattering and looks amazing (esp with lipliner) and feels buttery and comfortable on the lips.  however i found it to be quite sheer on the cheeks. when applying it, i feel like i get more pigment on my brush/finger than my cheeks, and if you pat over it at all with a beauty sponge, the blush is GONE. you really have to build it up to get it to show, but once you do, itu2019s quite pretty and has a bit of blurring effect. definitely on the more subtle side though  i will say though that i enjoyed the packaging, and like that it includes a stipple brush on the other end, which is nice for on the go/travel. it also comes in a tin case with a mirror inside, which is very thoughtful, but probably not something iu2019d make use out of since itu2019s a bit bulky

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite cream blush! Great formulation that is buildable, blends nicely and lasts all day. The packaging is great and I love not having to get my fingers dirty to blend. The color is quite concentrated and does not sheer out very much so a small dot goes a long way. It builds up well so you can always add more. The dense brush included in the product is just right to blend out most of the thick-ish product but I did prefer using my beauty sponge to blend out the edges that were just a bit too stark when I used only the included brush. When I added my powder blush on top, my cheek color lasted all day long. The shade Nude Buff is a beautiful, natural-looking, sun-kissed shade that I would wear every day. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the way this blush sits on makeup and natural skin. The finish is very skin-like which is perfect for my daily makeup routine. I also like the formula as it contains skin care ingredients and reminds me of the formulation and smell of the youthforia primer. The blush lasts all day without any odd separation or fading. The brush included is super soft and perfect for blending on the go. You can use it on your eyes and lips for a monochromatic moment that looks very chic in my opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a versatile and good quality product. I donu2019t usually use multi-function makeup but I was pleasantly surprised. Since I received this item in exchange for (an honest) review, I did not get to select the color. I think this shade was a bit too dark for my complexion so I used it very lightly. I would purchase a different color in the future to try out and see if that makes a difference. I think itu2019s ideal to see a swatch in person for your own skin coloring.

reviews.review_title: Passe le test haut la main!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Je suis une fan de blush en stick, et celui lu00e0 ne m'a pas deu00e7ue! Le format est super pratique, compact et le miroir fournit dans l'etui est pratique pour reappliquer le produit au besoin!   La couleur Juicy melons est un beau rose naturel qui donne un effet bonne mine. La formule est legere et cremeuse et s'etend super bien sur la peau compare u00e0 certains blushs en creme. La brosse au bout est super douce et blend tres bien le produit. C'est un produit super user friendly que je vais definitivement continuer u00e0 utiliser.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful universal peachy shade! Applies great directly on the skin and sheered out with fingers, or using a dense bristled brush to collect product and blend.   Very easy to use and apply, much less intimidating than a liquid blush so very beginner friendly! It sheers out easily so you can have as much or as little impact as you want, thereu2019s a very easy learning curve to this product! It applies very well over a liquid or cream foundation, and can even be used under a powder blush to layer up the depth. 10/10 would recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I received my Rosy Posy Nudestix, I was surprised by the quality and creamyness of the product. Not only was the shade perfect for me but its very creamy and blendable. Buildable too so you can add just a little or add some more for more colour payoff! Great for all over including eyes. The packaging was very cute and practical as well.

reviews.review_title: Great product but not the color for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a free sample to try. It is a fantastic product, goes on the skin nicely, smooth application, blends nicely and lasts all day but sadly just not the color for me. I am very pale and this just didn't compliment my skin tone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Matte All-Over Face Blush provides wonderful colour to the face that looks totally natural. It doesnu2019t cause any troubles on my skin and itu2019s soft and lightweight. The packaging is also beautiful. I highly recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: You can use this blush on only for your cheeks, but also for your lips or even eye shadow. It had a nice pigment and stays on the whole day  Received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. #bzzagent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this as a blush, eye shadow and lipstick with primer and no primer. As a blush it was quick to apply and is more precise than powder; it works with both a brush and fingers but better blending with brush. For the eyes, I used a brush only. It's not a colour I normally use on my eyes and it needs a primer for faster application.  For the lips, it was too drying; I would apply more lip balm beforehand. This works best as a blush.

reviews.review_title: Monochromatic and Minimalist Girls will Love
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stick fills almost all the boxes of someone trying to find a minimalist product for a minimalist look. It blends seamlessly and effortlessly on cheeks and eyes. On the lips, adds a pretty pop of colour to match the cheeks. I like to finish my lips with a gloss to get some hydration, as this is a matte formulation. It does not crease on my lids. However, the shade is not solid enough for my personal preference. I would buy a Nudestix shadow stick in the same shade in case they come up with some. I have already tried them in-store, and they have much more opacity.   I love this stick for quick looks, travel and carrying in my purse. I am obsessed with this Rosy Posy shade. Although the description says it is cool fuchsia pink, on my light-medium complexion, it seems to be more on a neutral side, being a perfect match for any lipstick. In addition, it lasts more than 8 hours on my combination skin, which is a win-win.    I wear this stick on the crease in the photos just for a pop with another powder eyeshadow. I have some lipgloss on in one picture and wear the stick alone in the another.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this blush. At first I was hesitant about the colour as I have brown skin, but it turned out to be the most beautiful shade of nude pink! It looks amazing and so dewy on my skin! Lasted all day and there was no patchiness or anything! Applicator is so cute it comes with a brush on one end! I would definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. This colour is so pretty! The only bad thing about this product is that once you blend it  out it is very pale. it pretty much blends out into nothing. I may be blending it wrong.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this blush.  My new favourite! Doesnu2019t look really matte, just a soft natural finish that is usually impossible to get.  It feels nice on the eyes and lips as well.  It just seems to soak right in and give a nice natural day-at-the-beach healthy glow. Love that it comes in a sturdy tin with a mirror in the lid. Super convenient.  Staying power is good even in extreme heat.  I totally recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this Nudestix All Over Face Blush!! The formula is creamy smooth and the application is quick and easy and perfect for those who donu2019t wear much makeup but also can be built up easily for those that like a more dramatic look since itu2019s very pigmented it is very versatile. I love that it can be used all over the face as well. I wore it on my lips eyes and cheeks and loved the natural monochromatic look that was easy and blended well into my natural skin. without any other makeup products. 10/10 and will purchase another shade as well. The one I received is Dolce Darlinu2019 which is a gorgeous peachy/coral shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous colour, but I find it moves my foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this as my first cream blush! Easy to blend, very buildable pigment, and lasts the whole day. I have combination skin and it holds up with a full day of work. The brush it came with is very convenient although not my favourite to blend with. Great for on the go as they give you a tin with a built-in mirror.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Matte All-Over Face Blush provides wonderful colour to the face that looks totally natural. I tried out u2018Dolce Darlinu2019 and it is a beautiful shade that is a perfect blush colour for autumn. The cream-to-powder pigment blends very well with the included brush in the dual-ended stick. It comes in a super cute travel tin with a small mirror. Looks great on cheeks, eyes, AND lips! So versatile! And like all Nudestix products this blush is vegan, clean ingredients, and cruelty-free. I canu2019t recommend this blush enough, and have been telling everyone this is why I got such a great glow! *I was gifted this product in exchange for my honest opinion*

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nudestix Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blush in Pretty Peachy is such a pretty rosy peach shade! The blushes are super easy to apply, Its easy to control how pigmented you want the look to be! I typically apply using my fingers and gradually build up until I have the perfect shade. Then I use the blush applicator attached to blend out! Since it is a cream product it has a nice natural glow to it. It is also quite multi purpose too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Having never used a cream blush before, I wasn't expecting to adore it as much as I did! I really liked this product because it blended beautifully with my makeup and had a nice color that didn't show out too much. It's long-lasting, quick, and easy to apply, and it doesn't smudge my foundation. After applying the cream to my cheeks, I like to blend it out with my fingertips rather than the supplied brush. Pretty Peachy is excellent for my everyday makeup because it is a natural coral tone. I enjoy applying it as both eyeshadow and blush to achieve a nude makeup effect. The blush comes with a travel case and a mirror which fits into my purse very well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colour and texture of the product. It doesnu2019t cause any troubles on my skin and itu2019s soft and lightweight. The packaging is also beautiful. I highly recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who has never tried a cream blush before, I was surprised at how much I enjoyed this product! The color was lovely and not overpowering and it blended nicely with no separation from my foundation. I did prefer to use my finger over the applicator as it did make it a bit patchy, but that would be the only complaint I would have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Nudestix blushes and this one was no exception. It is quick and easy to apply and long lasting. After I swipe the product on my cheeks, I prefer to blend it out using my fingers rather than the built in brush. Even though application is smooth and creamy, it dries into a matte and long lasting finish.   I'm very happy with the colour Pretty Peachy, it is a natural coral tone suitable for my everyday makeup. On a lazy day, I use it as both my eyeshadow and my blush for a quick monochromatic look. I also love that the blush comes in a carrying case with a mirror which makes it super easy to apply on the go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this product! It doesn't smudge my foundation and blends beautifully. I really like the size and shape it's perfect to just throw it in my purse. I even went to the store to buy another shade and found a cute mini kit and fell in love with this brand !! I've even recommend this product to my friends or family :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Although I usually use powder blush formulas, this cream stick is just awesome! It's very natural looking, easy to blend and quite buildable. You may go from a very subtle tint to a really bright and juicy color! The shade Rosy Posy is just stunning, very youthful and feminine. And the small blending brush on the other side is soooooo cute, it works quite well to blend the product. On top of that, you may use this stick on the eyes and lips as well (I prefer the latter). I am totally obsessed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE cream products, so I was super excited to try this Nudestix blush & it exceeded my expectations! The texture is very creamy & easily blendable both with fingers or the included brush. The finish is super natural, but can be built up as well. I love how easy it is to achieve a cohesive look as the blush can be used not only on the cheeks, but also as a flush of color on the eyes and lips. Can't wait to get it in other colors! Definitely recommended!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased this product in Cherry Blossom Babe after a Sephora employee suggested it in store, and I'm so glad I did. It's the perfect pink for my fair, cool skin-tone, and it really does look like a natural flush. It's very easy to use, and the little brush blends really well. Highly recommend if you want something fresh and dewy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product, I thought I got the wrong shade but it turned out perfect. Smooth and natural

reviews.review_title: Such a summery and fresh shade
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I personally find cream blushes the best multi-taskers, so when @bzzagent sent me a complimentary @nudestix Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blush in the shade Juicy Melons, I couldn't wait to try it out! I have been using it for a week, and lots of people have been asking me which blush I am using because it looks so good. This shade is a nice combination of peachy and pink tones, so beautiful and so pretty on cheeks. Such a summery and fresh shade, and you can achieve kind of a softer look with it. It is very easy to use, and you can apply it in several ways - on the cheeks, eyes, or lips. What I like about this product, comparing to other products, is that it comes with a brush, so you donu2019t have to use fingers all the time. It is so quick and easy to swipe it straight onto the skin, and the texture blends well with your fingers for a natural finish, or you can use the brush it comes with. Also, you can simply pack in it your purse, and the box it comes with has a mirror! So cute! I would definitely recommend it to anyone who likes to invest in a good blush, especially if you are looking for a multi-tasker, and I would definitely buy another packaging when I run out of it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As I've gotten more into wearing blush in the past years, especially thanks to e-girl and alternative trends coming back I struggle to find *the* perfect product that isn't too dry and hard to control or too creamy but doesn't dry down and looks shiny. This Nudestix blush is incredibly effective at what I'm looking for in a blush. It's soft enough and pigmented enough to only require a tiny bit of product to get the effect I want but is controllable enough that one small swipe doesn't turn my entire face into a tomato, the brush attached to it works great and is soft. I even got a colour that I didn't think would suit me (Juicy Melons) and it turned out to be perfect and just wants to make me try the rest of the colours. I always love the packaging Nudestix products come in, it's a reusable tin with a mirror inside which makes it super easy for on-the-go application. Highly HIGHLY recommend this product and will be using it often.   This product was gifted to me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this stick blush; it's easy to apply, blend and layer. it comes in an adorable package (tin can) which can be reused for other items and the feature of it having its own blending brush is an added bonus! it's non-greasy, doesn't affect my pores and when applied with a finishing powder afterwards it stays on all day and night without any smudging or dulling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love products that can be used in multiple ways and this blush is one of them! Itu2019s a really pretty colour that depending on how much you put on, moisturized.  As this is a Nudestix product it comes in the handy tin with a mirror which is great for keeping in your bag!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm pretty lazy when it comes to makeup so love all-over-colour products because they make make-up application so quick and easy because they are super blendable/easy to correct if you use too much. I use these sticks on my eyes, cheeks, and lips and it proves a great overall look. I prefer the matte because don't want to add additional shimmer, so these sticks are perfect.   I got the shade in Dolce Darlin' and I have a light complexion which is light/medium in the summer, and while this shade is blendable and looks great on my tan skin now it would likely be too dark for me in the winter months. Lookd fantastic on darker skin tones!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: An amazing blendable blush worth a buy and the packaging is so sleek and overall so useful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was graciously sent a Nudestix Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blush as part of a promo campaign in the shade Nude Buff. I have never used a cream blush before and was quite excited to give it a try. Let me say, this blush is fool proof. The product glides on seamlessly and has a beautiful matte finish. The colour is a buildable peachy nude and is perfect for those u2018no makeupu2019 makeup looks. What is unique about this product is that it comes with its own blending brush and comes in a metal tin with a mirror, perfect for travel or to just throw in your purse. Will recommend this product to everyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Nudestix Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blush - Juicy Melons. Itu2019s 3 in one, blush, eyeshadow and lipstick. The color is really nice and lasts all day. Also the brush for applying it like blush is super soft. I have sensitive skin and I didnu2019t have any irritation with this product. Definitely recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this blush easy to blend , beautiful color  match well with different kind of skin color , creamy but no oily or greasy, perfect matte effect. Cute package.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this 3 in 1 nudies all over face blush color. I got in shade rosy posy. It is a beautiful shade. The finish is so beautiful.Its matte. I love using this product .It is amazing.    Key features -  Multitasking, ultra-soft cream-to-powder blush balm melts onto skin for naturally blushed cheeks, eyes & lip color  Buttery ultra-soft, lightweight & luxurious natural matte texture with oil absorbing benefits  Cruelty-free  .Silicon or paraben free.  . Fragrance free .   Perfect for eyes, blush and lips too.u2764ufe0f   I received this product as free sample  box. #gifted

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this blush as a #freeproduct and I absolutely love it. This cream blush is extremely pigmented and creamy, making it very easy to blend. The colour is gorgeous and very flattering. I love that it comes with the blending brush already on the other end, this is my go to blush to bring around with me when I go out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect neutral pink, Iu2019m able to use it for a couple different things! Only thing I find is that it does need to be reapplied a couple times throughout the day but itu2019s easy to carry with me and the built in brush is perfect for touch ups.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love it!! I like the fact that this blush comes with the brush. Very convenient to take it everywhere with you. The Pigmentation is not too strong so it gives a very natural look and it has a creamy consistency so it is easy to apply and blend. I recommend 100%

reviews.review_title: Creamy, easy to blend, I'm obsessed!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for my honest review.  Really love Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blush - Nude Buff. I also own Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blush - Naughty n' Spice, Nudies Matte Cream Bronzer - Sunkissed (My favourite cream bronzer that I also use as blush) and Nudies Glow - Illumi-Naughty so I was thrilled to add Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blush - Nude Buff to my collection!   On my skin, it looks very natural and beautiful. It goes perfectly on top of any foundation or tinted moisturizer and blends very easily.   My only complaint was that the product broke off and was stuck on the cap when I opened it. Also, I always found their tin packaging to be wasteful so hoping that the company will change the product packaging in the near future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This blush stick is really nice. It's nicely pigmented, and it stays all day on my normal skin. It applies nicely over top of foundation and the brush on the other end helps it so that its not moving by foundation underneath around because its so densely packed that you can pat it on, or lightly blend it. It blends very easily, and im happy with the pretty pink look that it leaves. The colour is beautiful- not too pink or glittery. I'm very happy that I was chosen to test this out in exchange for my honest review. I would recommend and purchase other colours as well.

reviews.review_title: Easy to use and great multipurpose product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you bzzagent for sending me the Nudestix nudies matte lux all over face blush in the color juicy melons for free to test and exchange for my honest review. First of all, I really like the packaging of this; it comes in a small tin box with a mirror, and the blush stick has a built-in brush on the other end, making it convenient for travel and quick touch-ups. I usually go for full coverage makeup looks, which may be on the drying side, so I decided to use my fingers rather than gliding the stick directly on my face. I swirled my fingers onto the stick and lightly dabbing the colour onto my cheek slowly to avoid rubbing off my matte foundation. I then used the brush to blend it out. I can see that it blended out well on top of my foundation, the formula was quite creamy and pigmented and it gave a nice pink color to my cheeks. I also use it on my lips since it gives it a soft, natural look that goes perfectly with my makeup style. The blush was long-lasting and did not fade throughout the day, even though I wear my mask for the majority of the time I am outside, which is about 8 to 9 hours. Also, I noticed that it didn't transfer onto my mask. This product is great for multipurpose uses on the cheeks, lips, and eyes, and it helps me save a lot of time. I would definitely purchase it again and recommend this to my family and friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very creamy and blends very easily into the my skin, however it doesnu2019t last very long and the colour pay off is very natural and it gets a little oily when applied for few hours as compare to my other blush.Overall Iu2019d recommend this product for someone who is looking for something natural and light during the summer as it gives nice glowy natural skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product. Itu2019s so versatile, I use it in my eyes and cheeks and I love that it already has a brush built in. I have it in two colours and definitely plan on getting more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found that my skintone (for reference, I wear 300 in Fenty) did not show much of the pigment and I needed to use a heavy hand which is not my preferred method of application for a cream blush. I did like that the packaging inherently comes with a buffing brush which makes it very travel friendly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this item in exchange for an honest review. First of all, the product itself is beautiful and easy to apply. I've tried using my fingers as well as a brush and they both work great. Compared to the dewy line they also carry, this one is similar in terms of pigmentation - you can be light-handed or heavy-handed depending on your preference, and it can definitely be built up if needed. It even gives a bit of a blurring effect when applied, which the dewy one does not do. I was worried that this matte one might be drying or tug on my skin but it didn't at all. It blends nicely and is really convenient to bring around, especially due to its convenient packaging. This comes with a brush on one end, and while it's not my favourite brush in the world, it works in a pinch when I'm on the go and my hands are dirty and using my hands isn't an option. The box it comes in also has a mirror, which is great for little touchups.   All that aside, my blush arrived like someone had taken a swipe at it (refer to the photo) and then returned it, except it got sent out to me as a brand new item which is pretty gross. I had to completely disinfect it in order to give a review. Make sure your blush is untouched and unused before using it!

reviews.review_title: Want a natural look? Get this!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was surprised at how much I loved this. This gives the most beautiful blush look. You donu2019t need a lot and it blends easily and the texture of it is not gritty.  I never even had to use the blending brush it came with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush was super great to use and I really enjoy that it is easy to travel with since it comes with a brush and great packaging with a mirror! The product itself was easy to use and was very buildable and blended well. I got the color Pretty Peachy which is a beautiful warm peach color, perfect for summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always been a huge Nudestix fan just for the ease of use, there for when I received this complimentary (#free, #gotitfree) from Bzz Agent I was extremely pleased. I use Nudestix blushes every single day and this matte finish blush is a gorgeous finish for my skin tone especially during the summer season. I have used it over face tint and sunscreen and it help up through out the day. I would definitely recommend this to friends and family and would re-purchase myself as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to try this Nudestix Blush because I like some other Nudestix products and this blush did not disappoint. It is great for a quick a simple makeup look. I love the brush it comes with because it blends the product out well and leaves a nice subtle flush. I think I would choose a different colour next time but this one is still really pretty. I think this blush lasts well and doesn't leave me feeling greasy, so the formula is better than other cream blushes I have tried. Overall I would recommend it for someone looking for an easy and subtle cream blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ever since I got this, I have been wearing it every day and it has replaced my powder blush! This blush is so good and it looks so natural! I got so many compliments on my makeup whenever I wear it! I think itu2019s because it makes it look like I am not wearing that much makeup or foundation!
