It makes it look like you have naturally rosy cheeks! Love it and would buy it again! Actually might even go to try a different color after this color finishes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got the nude shade of blush and it was very good. Colour was very good for my olive skin. What amazed me the most was the ease of the application. I don't wear blush too often and sometimes I struggle with putting on the right amount that gives me a natural flush without looking too obvious or even clown like. The instruction of simply wiping it on and stippling with the supplied brush worked well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised with this product, as I have only used powdered blush up until this point and was a little unsure if I would like this. However, it's great! First of, it comes in a lovely package. It's a nice black tin with a large mirror in the lid which you can use for any sort of little knick knack afterwards, which is great. The product itself is in a slick tube that is comparable to a lipstick tube but thicker. It's really simple to use; just stipple on your cheek and blend with your finger, great for someone who doesn't have much time to spend getting ready. You can also use the fancy brushes if you want, but I didn't. The colour is a clay, red colour which I was worried might be too dark for me, but it went on quite light, so you can definitely make the colour lighter or darker, depending on your preference. Since it's an all over cream, you can use it anywhere on your face. I tried it on my lips, but wasn't crazy about the colour, but it's nice to have the option! It's a nice creamy texture that kind of reminded me of a powdered blush, but with more moisture. Not sticky at all! Great product, would buy again for sure!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this cream blush! Itu2019s super creamy and goes on very easy to my skin. The built in brush on the back is super soft and made blending it out super easy! This shade is the perfect pink for a rosy glow and also looks stunning on my lips too. Would definitely recommend trying this if youu2019re looking for a new cream blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free from bzz agent in exchange for my honest review. Iu2019m literally obsessed with the nudestix line. This blush is versatile, easy to use, long lasting, and comes with a blender brush on the other end of the product for easy application. I usually go for a natural look for my day to day with a hint of glam. This did not disappoint. It comes in a cute little tin that makes it easy to bring with you for trips or quick fixes if needed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The product is very creamy and blends really easily into the skin, however it doesnu2019t last very long and the colour pay off is very natural. Overall Iu2019d recommend this product for someone who is looking for something natural and light during the summer

reviews.review_title: Light and powdery, glides on smooth.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like that the formula is light and powdery, not thick or creamy. This way, you can avoid overdoing it and slicking on too much. It's compatible with my powdery foundation, whereas most other cream or stick blushes are not.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this blush! From the formula to the packaging, everything was well thought out. First off, this is such a beautiful color and the blush blended so easily on my skin. It was smooth like butter. Itu2019s so easy to blend that I think if I have a tanner/browner color, I can easily use it for contouring. I love the packaging. The box is so compact yet there is a mirror for application, and a built in smooth brush to help blend if you donu2019t want to use your fingers. Everythingu2019s right there in the little box. I love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is a great addition to any makeup collection! You can use it on the face, eyes or lips! The formula blurs texture and small blemishes. It blends out so smoothly and stays on all day long. One of the best blushes I have tried in a while!

reviews.review_title: subtle glow and easy to use
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you to Bzzagent for sending me this product, I have previously used blush sticks from different brands and I love them, so I was excited to try more. First of all I love that this has a brush on the other side, to help blend things evenly incase I get a little carried away when I sweep the stick directly on my face. I love this formula. Its clean and gives a nice healthy glow without it being shiny. Long lasting product. and like I said I love blush sticks because they are so easy to travel with, compact and I don't need to worry about packing a blush brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for two weeks and I love it so much, I think I'm going to be a repeat buyer very soon! For everyday usage and for a little sparkle during the evenings, it sits so light on my face. If you're looking for a natural flush glow and not an overtly bright blush, this is absolutely perfect. I used it in conjunction with a primer, foundation and setting spray, and it lasted me hours even during heavy humidity. The brush is easy too, and doesn't annoy my skin. And it absolutely helps that the case is so handy. Can't wait to try the other shades soon too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stick was easy to use. You dab it on then blend it out with the attached brush. I loved the brush - it's super soft and works really well with the product. I wish it were removable so I can use it when I'm done with the blush. The blush had nice colour payoff and is blendable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free to give my honest opinion about it. First off let me mention the packaging since that is what we see first.  I love the case, the color black is perfect.  The case has a mirror inside it which makes everything to applying it better to see what you are doing. The mirror is also great for on the go applying, retouching etc... This Nudestix also has a little brush on the other end of the Stix. This brush also makes it really easy to apply it to what extreme you want it to be. Goes On creamy they feels like powder and soft on your skin I like that you can use this Nudestix all over your face.  I chose to use it on my Cheeks as well as on my lips with some gloss to top my lips off with a shiny glow.  I like this Nudestix better than others that I have tried out there.  There are great colors to choose from.  I want to try more colors to add to my new collection of Nudestix. The color in the picture is Dolce Darlin'  I recommend Nudestix for your beauty needs.  Add it to your beauty collection like I did. Perfect for the purse and on the go !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've used a couple of Nudestix products in the past and they do not disappoint! Similarly, this blush is so good! I'm not a makeup pro, but I do like using it to create a natural look ever so often, and this is great for that! As a plus, this colour is so pretty for a blush and suits me well. Just for context, I have an olive skin tone :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was grateful to try this free product from Butterly! I love a cream blush, and this is a good, natural sunny flush that applies well. However, I don't like the brush, it goes patchy when dragged and hurts to stipple. The blush lasts long, and works great when you tap it in with your fingers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With blush, I am always concerned that it will be unnatural and un-blendable... and I experienced neither of these with this blush. This is a buildable blush, meaning you can go as subtle or as bold with it as you like. In addition, I was not expecting this warm caramel coral to look nice on my cool light skin tone, but it was quite lovely. The brush was also much softer than I remember (when I used their highlighter), which was great for blending my blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Tout simplement geniale! Parfait pour toute occasion , maquillage leger comme un gros maquillage de soiree. Ce blend super bien. Je lu2019ai reu00e7u en cadeau et cu2019est rendu mon most u00e0 avoir je le recommande

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this product and it did not disappoint. Blends effortlessly with the help of the nifty brush attached to opposite end of stick. I had never used a stick blush before, so I was really looking forward to trying this product. I love the packaging and the design of the blush was really neat. I love that thereu2019s a brush attached, i absolutely love this cream blush. It blends perfectly into the skin. I also really like the little brush that comes on the end of it!! This is going to be my new staple, and everyone needs it for that sunkissed summer glow. The consistency of the product is very creamy a little goes a long way. love it highly recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not one to use blush regularly, but this product has changed that! This is a very impressive product that is smooth and velvety in texture and vibrant in colour. You only need a small amount of product to bring warmth to your face. The beautiful effect achieved thanks to the dual end with the blending brush is a huge bonus. A daily staple! Also looks great on my lips. :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First of all love the colour! Its subtle, pink shade and I think it suits all skin tones alike. It has a buttery texture which is easy to apply. Spreads very well with no deposits. Felt like applying tinted lip balm on my lips. Only problem I had was that it deposited on my lip's dead skin, but worked great once I prepped my lips with a lip scrub. Great that it has a brush on the other side and also a mirror on the box, great for travel packing.

reviews.review_title: A fantastic and convenient blush! LOVEEE!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The nudestix all over blush is a pigmented, easy-application blush that can be seamlessly applied to the face anywhere and leaves a healthy, sun-kissed glow. The product applies with a quick swipe or dab and blends easily with a blender or the built in brush. The juicy melon colour is the perfect mix of pink and orange tones. The packaging is sleek, classy and convenient. And the built in brush is removable to allow for it to be washed.   Overall, a well thought out and convenient product. I am in love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loved how buttery and easy it was to apply. It glided on and the u201cNude Buffu201d shade was so flattering on my skin tone. I liked how it had the brush on the other side for easy blending. I will definitely be taking this on my next vacation. I use it on my cheeks, a little on my eyelids and lips and i get this beautiful glowy look. I love the effortless no makeup makeup look so this is perfect for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly underrated Nudestix as a brand before I even tried any of their products but this blush stick has left me absolutely at a loss for words. The formula of this blush stick is not like any other blush stick Iu2019ve used, theyu2019re all usually very hard to apply and blend. This stick however, glided onto my skin beautifully and blended like a dream. Also, I tried this stick on my friend who has a darker complexion and it left us impressed as the shade worked for both of our skin tones. Plus the brush is such a bonus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how smooth it feels. As someone who isn't used to wearing makeup, this color and the feel of the product was truly amazing. I was able to apply it without feeling like I am wearing something heavy on my face + it's definitely lasting.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a beautiful blush! The colour pay-off is really good, and Rosy Posy is a particularly nice colour for tan/brown skin to give the perfect peachy pink colour to your cheeks! I really love the packaging as well, with the built brush on other hand that makes the creamy blush really easy to blend out! It's also perfect for on the go and not having to worry about bringing a brush. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for that perfect matte cream blush!

reviews.review_title: Satin matte finish & easy to blend
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked how the cream to powder formula of this blush stick blended seamlessly into the skin. It didn't look patchy or feel drying. I have combination skin and found that the lasting power is pretty good. I find myself only needing to touch-up near the end of the day. The finish of Rosy Posy is a satin matte. I noticed a tiny bit of sheen, but there is no glitter or shimmer in the formulation. I think the cool toned fuchsia pink wold look great on cool toned light-medium skin tones. I have warm light-medium olive skin tones and thought that this color still looked like a really natural flush on the cheeks and eyes, but it looked a little too icy for the lips. I see myself using this color more in the winter and spring months. The blush stick also comes with a small stippling brush and a mirrored tin case making it easy for touch-ups on the go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently got this as a free gift and I canu2019t stop raving about it, it had replaced all my blush powders. It goes on so creamy and blends effortlessly with the brush that comes with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I personally really enjoyed trying the nudies matte lux stick in shade dolce darlin. Initially I thought the colour would be slightly dark for my lightly tanned skin but it actually mixed very well. I also found the brush that comes with the stick very handy as it blends out the blush. Also no irritation to sensitive skin so thatu2019s a bonus!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this nudestix blush. Its not only great as a blush but also as a lip product as well. The products are creamy and smooth and they blend out beautifully. The pigment on the cheeks and the lips last for hours. I like that the product is also vegan and paraban free. A great multi use product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great cream to powder colour stick. I've tried it on my cheeks, lips, and eyes - so natural and easy to blend! Colour is buildable so you can easily adjust. One of my go-tos when I use a small bag since it's so compact (one side is a soft brush)!

reviews.review_title: Melts like a butter in skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product free in exchange of my honest review. I just love this product because it melts like a dream in my skin. Its not as pigmented as rare beauty blush but lasts as long as rare beauty blush does.  It comes with a mirror, blush and brush for blending on the other side. I am definitely gonna buy this product again because its all you need. I recommend everyone to give it a shot.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall really liked this blush. The colour is buildable so it's easy to have it natural or more intense. I usually wear this one as a natural blush during my work day. The cream dried down and stayed all day so 5 stars from me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to receive this product! I love cream and liquid blushes and I love the creamy formula of this one. It blends and melts into your skin without becoming too sheer, and it lasts most of the day even on super hot days. the stick concept with a brush on the other end makes it compact and handy to use on the go and store in my work bag. The colour was a bit light for my tan medium skin, so I hoped the nude would be dark or more pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this blush. It goes on smooth and gives my cheeks a rosy glow without looking orange. Coverage is buildable and I also like to wear it on my lips as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an awesome beauty item that I didnu2019t know I needed! It glides on and can be used as a blush, eyeshadow, and even on the lips! I really like how pigmented the pink colour is. I also love that the other side of this creamy blush, has a a convenient flat brush to blend in the colour. This stayed put on my face for quite a few hours. Highly recommended.

reviews.review_title: Amazing Product in the Perfect Packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I had the awesome opportunity to try the Nudestix Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blush in the Shade: Juicy Melons and I absolutely love this product.   First of all, it comes in a small case WITH a conveniently located mirror. How awesome is that?  The product itself comes in a perfect tube u2013 the one side is a stick blush and the other side is ANOTHER conveniently located stipple brush which also twists off to wash easily!  The shade I received was Juicy Melons and it is a beautiful shade on my skin. It is also extremely versatile and can be also used as an eyeshadow or a lip colour!   The texture is creamy and extremely easy to blend with the skin. Can be used under or over foundation.  Perfect for a no-makeup look or a very extravagant look.   Overall, I really loved this product -  both for the formula, but also the packing, the convenience of it and the fact that this brand is extremely innovative and continues to put out a lot of great products. Totally recommend!   #freesample #freeproduct #review #BzzAgent #skincare #nudestix #JuicyMelons ##AllOverFaceBlush #Blush #Makeup #GoNudeButBetter

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the creamy texture . The consistency and how light it feels on skin. easy to blend and can be used all over the face

reviews.review_title: Itu2019s great but Not Sure if itu2019s the Best
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very comparable to other stock blushes on the market. Personally I donu2019t like stick makeup products because they are harder to blend out and sometimes forms lines. But when using this product I tried to use it the best I possibly can. I would suggest blending this under your foundation then dabbing some product on top using a sponge to control pigmentation. If you prefer powders and liquids this product will be hard to use at first. I received this as a free product to review so I have only tried this shade and the juicy melons shade. Juicy melons is a very beautiful peachy/pink shade. Dolce darlin is the slightly bit nude/brown. Overall itu2019s a great product but itu2019s pricier compared to the competition.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a gift to review, and it is a good product for the natural makeup on my no foundation days. But it didnu2019t layer well with my current foundations and pulled it up and caused patchy spots. It was convenient to have the brush attached to the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Nudestix all over face blush! It has a great texture and is very buildable. The pretty peachy colour is gorgeous and would suit lots of skin tones! It is my new favourite blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m new to using cream blushes, and relatively new to using any blush at all but since Iu2019ve started Iu2019ve been hooked. This blush blends beautifully and the shades are really nice. The brush is my favourite part I love that you can detach it to clean its small and compact for on the go use and touch ups on the go with the sleek storage tin that has a mirror inside. I also tried it on my lips and it was comfortable and gave great colour Iu2019m just not a fan of colour on my lips but I can definitely see this being a 2 for 1 product for sure. I would definitely purchase the other shades available and recommend to anyone looking for a blush/lip product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted the Blush in the tone Pretty Peachy for review and I was surprised at how much I liked it. I'm not usually one for wearing coral tones (I tend to stick to Rose/Mauves for Blush) but I liked the colour and formula of this Blush! I have fairly oily skin, so I was nervous about the cream formula; however the longevity of it surprised me and it seemed to last all day! It applied very pigmented, but blended out nicely (once I figured out that there was a brush hidden on the other end). All in all it's a great blush and I look forward to buying the other shades for comparison!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for that no makeup makeup look. Super light feeling, goes on easy. Very subtle colour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start by saying the unboxing experience was amazing!!! The blush comes in a little travel friendly tin which has a built in mirror along with a brush on the other end of the stick. It's really an all-in-one and I'm so happy I got to try it! It's so portable and convenient which you don't get in a lot of other products.   Anyways, on to the actual product itself! Dolce Darlin is such a gorgeous colour. It's the perfect coral-y terra cotta colour which is great for the summer! It makes me look sun-kissed and gives a healthy glow. I like that it goes on as a cream and dries as a powder. Pigmented and easy to use. I'm all for functional products and design.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great cream blush. The nude buff shade is even prettier in person. Itu2019s a very wearable and neutral and works well with a variety of makeup looks. The packaging is really great. I rarely if ever use the brushes/applicators that come with makeup products but this brush is surprisingly good quality and works great to blend the product. I also appreciate the mirror included in the case.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven't used many products from this brand but I was so impressed with this blush. First off, I love the packaging. I think the little tin is really handy and I love that it has a built in brush for blending the blush out.  The colour itself is soooooo pretty. It's a super coral peach colour and it has a bit of sparkle to it. It blends out really easily and it lasts all day. Super creamy and pigmented formula too.  Overall, I'd say if you're looking for a cream blush, this is a great option. But if you have something like it already, I'd pass for now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product with a bb cream and on top of my bare face low makeup day. It is excellent for someone with skin that is on the dryer side. It gives a very cute subtle sun-kissed look that I enjoy. the little brush on the other side makes it easy to apply on the go and it's great for travelling!

reviews.review_title: Can't wait to try in other shades
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't expect to love this as much as I do. First off, the fact that it comes with a high-quality, compact stippling brush is a huge win. The blush itself is a bright coral pink. I was a little worried it was too bright at first, but with a little blending, it sits perfectly on my cheeks. I am fair (red undertones) with dark eyes and hair, and this pops beautifully in the most summery way. In terms of formulation, it's creamy, without being oily, but doesn't make a huge mess the way some liquid blushes do. (To note, I have quite dry skin, so I prefer makeup products that are glossy rather than powdery). The cherry on top is that it looks amazing as a cream eyeshadow (though it does slide into my crease a bit, even with primer). I tried it on my lip, but it has a little too much white in it, so I'll be sticking to using it as blush/eyeshadow.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful Coral Pigment - Perfect for summer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how easy this is to apply and how it has an attached brush for blending. I applied to my cheeks and lips. It was so easy to apply and I didn't need a lot of product to get a big colour pay off. The case is super cute and prevents it from rolling around. Was surprised how lovey this colour looks on my skin tone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really great blush to throw in your bag for on-the-go makeup and touch ups.  The texture was smooth and goes on easily. I found it to be blendable and buildable.  I could easily build up colour for a more bold look but could also blend it to a sheer, natural look.  The staying power was pretty impressive, but like most cream products, I didn't get a full day's wear out of it. It's a good thing it's so portable!  It's also convenient that it comes with a brush in the other end for blending. While that's great for on the go, it's not the best brush and found it easier to blend with my fingers.   I only enjoy this for blush - I did not find it to be as great a product for eyes or lips - It smudged off easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first time trying a creamy blush (as opposed to a powder) and I must admit, I think I might have been converted. This blush is buildable so can be used for a light rosy cheek or layered for added colour. I find it easy to blend and the colour is complimentary to my skin tone. I also like the packaging as it makes it easy to travel.  Iu2019d recommend giving it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Upon receiving the Nudestix Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blush in Pretty Peachy, I was honestly amazed at the packaging of the outer metal container as well as the blush itself. I wasn't expecting a brush on the other end of the stick so that was a pleasant surprised especially considering how soft the bristles were. The color was an absolute perfect hue of peach for my complexion and it went on plus blended out really effortlessly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely one of the better stick blushes I've tried in terms of the formula. It truly is a cream-to-powder finish and blends out extremely easily. The colour is buildable and gives a really natural finish. I also really like how there's a brush attached and you can remove it to wash. I would recommend it but it is quite pricey for a blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While the color was not for me, I was quite thrilled that it still managed to blend into my skin so flawlessly. I was most certain that the orange tone would over power my skin color. But it just melted right in. I especially loved the brush on the other side that made it super easy to blend out after using the stick blush. This is beyond user friendly, easy to use. It is vegan and cruelty free. Everything I love in a beauty product. I feel like nudestix completely hit the mark on these. It is so easy to use compared to some of the blushes out on the market these days, I truly believe this is a great bang for your buck and a little goes a long way. I would recommend this to any one looking to try a new blush or find something that works so well! I want them all !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m someone who typically prefers a powder blush, but I have to say I love this cream blush! The formula is super creamy and blends out nice. I would totally recommend to anyone who is looking for a cream blush. It adds the perfect pop of colour to a more natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Always very satisfied with the results :) I love the perfect shade for tanned skin highlighting your natural beauty! It has three uses since apart from being blush, you can also use it as an eye shadow and lipstick. It is smooth and creamy, easy to use thanks to its integrated brush that you can use everywhere since it is easy to carry in your wallet. It has hours of durability leaving a glow and juicy effect on your skin with a matte finish, just love it and I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this all over face blush free from bzzagent. I received pretty peachy, obsessed for a summer shade!  It blends in beautifully, and is easily built up, depending on what kind of look youu2019re going for with your blush.  I love the shade range for these blushes, and I will definitely be purchasing some other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nudestix did it again! Absolutely in love with this blush. It is pigmented while not being too harsh, and it is so easy to blend. It has a natural/dewy finish when you apply and it dries down to a nice matte finish and makes my skin look so healthy. I put it on my cheekbones, temples and on my eye lids and it has been such a game changer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am a longtime fan of Nudestix in general and have several of their products in regular rotation, but I was still excited to use this new formula to see if it stands up to expectations. It does!   The colour, Nude Buff, is a beautiful shade that looks great my light, neutral skin. Itu2019s very flattering and works on day make up, but can easily be amped up for nighttime look. The formula is gorgeous - it goes on smooth and dries down easily. It doesnu2019t budge either, even in the sweaty summer heat.   I will definitely be buying the other colours of this blush, even though I normally donu2019t go for matte looks. Itu2019s such a flexible product and so easy to apply that I canu2019t help myself!   I received this blush in the colour Nude Buff as a free product to review, but my opinion is my own and entirely honest.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything about this blush. It has a good amount of pigment but is also super blendable. Itu2019s a stick so easy to use directly on your skin or I like to pick up some product with my brush and then apply. You can also use on your lips as well. Love this shade itu2019s super pretty for summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the packaging of this product, I like how there is an applicator on one end and the blush on the other. This product is advertised as being good for the eyes, lips, as well as cheeks but I would only recommend it for the cheeks. On my lips, it faded extremely quickly but left a ring of colour around the edge which looked odd. On the cheeks, it is a faint and glowy colour which I enjoyed. I didn't really enjoy the applicator but in a pinch its an easy portable solution.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First, letu2019s take a moment to appreciate the packaging! The compact and elegant stick applicator is very convenient to use, and it also comes with a brush on the other end, making it very travel-friendly.   The creamy formula glides smoothly  onto my skin and blends seamlessly. It blurs pores and covers small imperfections, while providing a soft matte-finish.   The tint is a beautiful nude shade with a hint of warm rose, it is pigmented but it looks very natural on my light skin tone once blended in.   I love makeup infused with skincare ingredients, and this blush is enriched with antioxidants from Vitamin E and Green Tea Extract.  I also appreciate it is a multipurpose product that can be used on eyes and lips as well!  5/5 recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the Nudestix Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blush - Nude Buff for free to review from BzzAgent. The shade is beautiful and the product is easy to blend and works as a blush, eye shadow, and lip tint. I would definitely buy this product again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loved that it was a cream consistency, made it very easy to apply. As a dry and sensitive skin this is definitely approved! The pigmentation stayed for an hr or so and did fade away. Iu2019d recommend this to users who want more of a natural flush to their cheeks! The only problem was the color did not match my skin tone but other than that itu2019s great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg! This blush stick is so convenient to travel with. I bring this around me in my bag and its perfect for touching up, especially with the brush on the end. And as always, love nudestix's packaging!

reviews.review_title: Very good product, wrong shade for me
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to try this product and I received it in pretty peachy. The texture is very smooth, has nice pigmentation and the packaging is AMAZING. However this particular shade didnu2019t work that great for me. The brush on the opposite end is a great addition, I think I would buy it in a more rosy colour in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the all over face blush and found it to be really smooth and colourful. It didn't last as long as I would have liked (was only vibrant for 2 hours) and didn't find that the colour went well with my pale skin but I would recommend it to anyone who looks good in peach! The other all over blush products I used didn't have a brush attachment and I really liked that this one did.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received the NUDESTIX Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blush Color in Juicy Melons for free from Bzzagent and NUDESTIX in exchange for my honest review.  I have previously tried the NUDESTIX All Over Face Highlight Color and I was so impressed with that product, so I was beyond ecstatic to try this All Over Face Blush.   I am always so impressed with the packaging from NUDESTIX, the product comes in a little matte black tin case with a mirror on the inside which makes it so convenient for application and touch ups on the go. The little case also acts as an extra layer of protection to make sure the product doesn't get damaged or get all over the inside of your bag just in case there's a loose lid or unclosed cap.  The formula of this blush is super creamy and smooth and just glides onto the skin like butter, and once you start working it into the skin, it turns into a powder and becomes matte which is so interesting! You can apply and blend this with your fingers or use the little brush on the opposite end of the product to help blend out the product (the brush is also SUPER soft, and it detaches for washing!). The colour is so beautiful as well, it's a nice coral colour in my opinion and gives a natural blush look that is coming from within.  Although this product is labeled as a blush, you can use this product on your lips and eyes as well, which I love as you get that cohesive colour and look throughout for your makeup, but it also means you can carry less makeup products with you for touch ups!   Overall, I am so impressed with this product and just the NUDESTIX brand in general and I absolutely recommend you to try it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product - really easy to apply and lasts all day!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colour is the perfect neutral pink for everyday. This is great to throw on before leaving the house. Though I prefer blending it with my fingers instead of the brush at the back. Definitely worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great color and blendability! Initially thought the color would be too orange and more like a bronzer than a blush but it applies and blends into a wonderful glow! Took a star off because it came broken in the package

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I love that itu2019s one product that is so multi purpose.  One product in your purse instead of three! Itu2019s so smooth and creamy while applying and the color(nude buff) i received is so beautiful and fits my skin tone perfectly!  I also love the case it comes in and how it has a mirror on the case it comes in! Highly recommend this product to anyone!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, I got sent this to try out and it made me go and buy all the other colours for my makeup kit (I am a makeup artist). These are so creamy and the pigment is great. I love how you can also use these on your LIPS as well!! I love using it on my cheeks and lips, also I have combo skin and my cheeks get really dry so I like the creamy, yet blendable formula ! I also love the brush it has on the other side, I donu2019t use that for my makeup clients but for personal use and in my own makeup kit I use the brush and itu2019s amazing !

reviews.review_title: I dont normally wear makeup but...
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is very natural. Firstly it comes with a brush and compact mirror making it my go to for work and travel. The colours are very natural and beautiful. They complement every skin type. The product lasts long both on a full face of makeup or just bare skin. It blends in so nicely similarly to the Anastasia peachy keen. I have both products and they are very similar. I would have loved to try the peach in nudestix to better compare the colours. Regardless I love this product, I would absolutely love to own more colours of it. I highly recommend it for on the go or for travel. It can be for natural look or a more dramatic look as well! Overall great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got my free #nudestix today from @bzzagent  I love the color of it. It matches my skin color and I also love the cute little brush in it and the cute little mirror on the box. So inlove!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is simply perfect. The packaging is luxe and it comes with a brush too. The color rosy posy is a soft baby pink that looks so flattering on tan skin tones. It is so easy to blend out and lasts all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Rosy posy is a really cute youthful blush colour. It is easy to apply and is blendable. The 4 stars is because it is not the most pigmented so you will need to layer it on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Not only is u2018Rosy Posyu2019 the perfect pink blush shade, but this blush blends seamlessly into the skin. It makes your skin look so nice, and it is so natural. Additionally, I love Nudestix blushes because of the brush on the other end! I couldnu2019t love this blush more!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So creamy and blendable!!! I also love the fact that it comes with a brush at the end

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in love with this blush! Itu2019s so versatile and I use it on my cheeks, lips and eyelids. I would totally repurchase. I highly recommend this to friends and families.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous blush perfect colour for the summer . Super pigmented( you only need a tiny bit) and very bendable . Looks amazing with a base and also without. One of the best cream blushes I have tried . If you love a cream blush , you gotta try this !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love everything about this blush ! From packing to formula everything is top notch! It comes with a dense round brush in the other end.. that makes it very travel friendly. The formula is super pigmented and blends seamlessly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Nudestix as a company because they always have reusable packaging  with a mirror attached inside so its perfect for on the go touchups and storage in you're purse. This is a wonderful and easy to blend blush. I love the color, its a nice light color that's perfect for day and night looks. It's a nude blush so it doesn't look greasy on the face. I'm usually someone that's a little scared to use blush as sometimes it can look cakey but this product comes with a buffer brush attached, that's perfect for toning down the blush and making it even on you're face. I love the brush as it soothes out the blush but doesn't mess with you're foundation like some other similar blush brushes. I love that the blush and the brush are attached because you'll never lose the brush and it'll always be there ready to blend.  I like this blush because its very versatile, I used it as a blush (of course) and also put a little bit on my eyes and some on my lips to achieve that monochromatic look that's very in right now.  I wanted to see how it would look on a different skin tone so I put some on my mom and it also complimented her well and she also has a little bit of combination skin and the blush still applied beautifully so its perfect for all skin types and all ages.   In conclusion I love, love this company and love this blush and will definitely buy it in the future.  Thank you to buzz agent for gifting it to me.  #gotitfree #lovingit #naturalblush #buzzagent

Tried this product as a free sample. I received the Rosy Posy blush and really like it. It goes on super smooth and blends in really nicely as well. It didn't irritate my skin at all and lasted most of the day. I found it easy to remove with a gentle facial cleanser or make-up remover. Usually I wear a different product, but found this one was comparable to the other product I wear. I would definitely buy this product and recommend it to others. The only downfall I thought was the other product I own comes in a lot more shades. I am excited to try the other shades in this product though. Overall, great blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love all the formulas of blush Nudestix makes. These new ones are a cool texture because they are a blurring matte. You almost canu2019t tell theyu2019re on your skin til the colour starts building up. I have dolce darlin. LOVE. They have amazing staying power and a great finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried the Nudies Matte Lux All-Over Face Blush in Nude Buff. It's really easy to use and it gave a nice natural glow. Great blush to use for a natural look. I've also tried it as a lip tint and it's perfect for the #MLBB days.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush so much! The colour looks very natural and gives a very nice sun kissed look. the brush and blush come attached which makes application super easy. My only complaint is that it does feel a bit dry on your skin and can be hard to blend. Once itu2019s on your skin it feels more like a powder blush than a liquid one. Other than that it was great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the nice package , perfect that include the brush you can carry easy , the color is a kind of orange brownish , the formula it's nice soft easy to blend, I really like this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really good product. Great for my  skintone. It blend well With the brush. Fast to use. The tin is a great addition.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is so creamy and so easy to use! I rub a bit of product from the actual stick to my hand for hygiene purposes and to also get the product to melt a bit before I put it on my cheeks. I normally just use the same beauty blender I did the rest of my makeup with to pick up the blush and omg it is so creamy and easy to use and does not disrupt or budge the makeup that is underneath. It gives your cheeks such a nice sheen and glow and it literally lasts all day. I love these blushes!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Ce produit est parfait , j'adore la texture, la couleur en plus de durer toute la journee. Il convient u00e0 la peau sensible . Je le recommande u00e0 tout le monde, un produit u00e0 avoir dans sa trousse de maquillage .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I want to try all of them. Love this on my lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really like this product! The colour is great and it blends very easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love products that can do it all, and this product is it! I thought it was pretty user friendly - it went on even better when I warmed it up on my hand (as opposed to just using the stick). Overall, the colour was great on my cheeks and eyes! Felt like I needed to reapply a lot for my lips, but thatu2019s most products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love how it comes with a stippling brush to blend out hard edges. The stick glides on creamy and smooth but not too heavy. Pigment is easy to adjust how strong you want it. The peachy colour is a perfect glow for my skin tone (light/medium with yellow undertones) Havenu2019t tried it on lips or eyes as suggested but it think itu2019ll work just as good! I received the product for free for review purposes only.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Fantastic formula. Itu2019s a great blush and itu2019s very easy to blend and apply. The stippling brush attached is a great feature as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think the packaging is really cute and I like the little mirror inside and the matte black color of the case. The brush applicator side is interesting I had to get a little used to it. It's a good product but not necessarily better than my regular powder blush. I personally think powder is easier to spread around than this but might just be me. I do like that I can use it all over. I sometimes used it on my lids and lips for a cute natural rosy look. Overall I do like this blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Wow! Iu2019m a huge fan of Nudestix but Iu2019ve never tried this Matte Lux version. Itu2019s SO creamy and smooth. Iu2019ve never been a big fan of using the all over matye sticks on my lips (I found it drying) but this texture is absolutely great for lips! And the colour Pretty Peachy is a super beautiful pink that is awesome as a lip colour! Love love love. Will definitely purchase the Matte Lux version of the sticks going forward!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really smart product. The packaging is great and easy to use. Great for travel with the built in blush. The color is perfect easily blends and is buildable. In the summer I love wearing it over my sunscreen for just a touch of color. I love that there is. I shimmer or sparkle just adds a natural glow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you for sending me this lovely product.  I tried it and really liked it very.  I just love this color.  Its my favorite.  I definitely recommend others to try this. I just love the packaging and   cute brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really gorgeous blush. I am south asian (Punjabi) and I received Rosy Posy in exchange for a review. This blush is SO natural on me - it looks exactly like my natural blush colour. When I wear it without makeup, I think it needs to have some setting powder put on top, but on a full face of makeup it lasts all day, no problem. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great Color and texture! Very convenient and comes with mirror, overall great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: There are many things that I love about this product: formula, natural finish, blends like a dream, weightless. But there is one that I dislike: doesnu2019t show up on my skin. The shade is so light that hardly can notice it. I recommend it for light skin tone.  I possess the Rusty rouge one and I just love it, so I was expecting something brighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received Rosy Posy from Nudestix to try and really love the packaging as well as the product! The formula is nice and creamy and I was worried it would be too creamy on my oily skin but as long as I set it very lightly with a translucent powder, it lasts wonderfully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like the new formula because itu2019s so lightweight and creamy. Nude Buff is such a flattering shade and Iu2019m definitely interested in checking out the others. This has been replacing my other blushes. I also appreciate that itu2019s a multi-purpose product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I'm genuinely so surprised at how it blended and how smooth and creamy the formula was. The brush made it so simple and i was able to really build up the colour if i wanted to. I created a really subtle blush look to compliment my bright makeup and I am just.. stunned. I've really only used powder foundation before.. and this has changed the game.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the fact that this blush can be used traditionally, as lip tint, or eyeshadow. The blush comes with a compact brush at the end of the tube and is all encased in a small, sleek metal tin. I looked into the NudeStix campaign and I love that they focus on natural beauty. I wish there were more options for colours, but I am grateful for the opportunity.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love how you don't need a whole lot to achieve that blush on your cheeks. A little goes a long way & the color is so beautiful. Applies and blends easily. Wears long. No tacky, nor shiny or greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The product itself comes in the typical stick packaging of NUDESTIX; product on one end, brush on the other. I own several different variations of the NUDESTIX face sticks/all over face colour (around 10 in total: matte, dewy). This formula was significantly different, as it felt more like a cream-to-powder formulation. It applied more sheer and slightly patchier than either the matte or dewy face colour formulations, but blended out nicely for a velvety smooth, non-sticky finish .I found the lasting power to be on par and it performed well through the day, but it definitely has less outright pigmentation and is far less tacky, and moves around less than the other products in the line. There was a plasticky, almost play-dough scent in the tube but dissipated on application.  This would work well on anyone who enjoys cream/powder formulations, but struggles with the thickness/stickiness of certain cream products. I found it wore well under a mask too and stayed on my skin, instead of sticking onto the mask as thicker cream blushes tend to do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift but I PROMISE that I love this blush more than anythingu2026 i will be purchasing it again when I run out. I cannot believe how much I love this product!! I apply it with a beauty sponge and it goes on seamlessly. The colour suits my complexion perfectly and Iu2019m not joking when I say it lasts all day. I use another higher end blush that has been very much hyped up and it does not last this long. This is so worth the price tag and there is a lot of product in the tube. I took off a star because Iu2019m not a huge fan of the brush but thatu2019s the only flaw in my opinion, and there are ways around that! Just apply it to a sponge and then to your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: the cutest color ever!! the product is super blendable and buildable!! i usually wear liquid blushes so i was worried about those issues but it worked out perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I always choose to go for a natural and effortless look when it comes to make-up (think nude, but better) so I was curious to give Nudestix a try!   For blush formulas, I definitely prefer cream-based products, so Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blush Colour seems like the natural fit.   As a multitasking colour stick, this cream-to-powder colour balm aims to give you naturally flushed cheeks, lips, and eyes.   I tried this Nudies stick in u201cPretty Peachyu201d. Not only is the colour beautiful, but its buttery-soft formula melts onto your skin with a simple swipe, with further blending done with the dual-ended brush, which blurs the colour even further for a soft-matte finish.  The colour balm comes packaged in a to-go-tin with a mirror, making it perfect for travelling. Plus, Nudestix is a cruelty-free and vegan clean beauty product, so you can feel good while wearing Nudies on your face!  Thank you BzzAgent for the complimentary products. I highly recommend Nudies to anyone in search of a pigmented yet easy to blend multipurpose colour stick!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been a longtime Nudestix fan, and this has quickly become a staple in my makeup collection. It has such a creamy consistency that blends seamlessly into a gorgeous powder-matte finish. Plus that colour payoff is just perfection (a little goes a very long way)! I love to wear this on my cheeks and lips for a monochromatic makeup look. Definitely planning on picking up more shades from this collection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this sent to me for a review in bzzagent and I was very excited because my fav blush of all time is the nudies matte in the nude, which gives the perfect sunkiss colour to the cheeks. I couldn't have gotten a better colour because this is very similar to that but a deeper terracotta shade that I love. Compared to the original matte formula this is much more weightless and not as thick, but it blends even easier, like air! It gives the perfect wash of colour that looks so flattering to the cheeks. I know this will be a favourite. Formula wise and colour ---- it's perfect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recommend buying this!! I got the pretty peachy color and it looks so beautiful on my skin (I have fair skin tone). I love how thereu2019s a blending brush that is on the other end of the blush color stick. The reusable travel to go tin with mirror is such a great idea!

reviews.review_title: I got Nudestix Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blus
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got Nudestix Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blush - Rosy Posy from bzzagent to try out for free. It was such a nice blush. U hadnu2019t used a stick blush in a long time and found it to be very hydrating on my skin. I tap my brush onto it and then smudge it on my cheek. I once put little bit on my finger and tap it lightly on my cheek and it doesnu2019t break my foundation. It is so much better than other stick blushes out there. As it is super hydrating on the skin you wont feel that your skin is dry or this is making your skin dry. It came in a little tin box in which u can put small brushes for travel. The stick has its applicator at the back that comes handy when i will be traveling. I will definitely buy this product again and i am thinking of buying the other shades. I will definitely recommend this to anyone who has dry skin like me. It is super hydrating and doesnu2019t make my skin look dry which happens when i use powder blush. I just love this blush. TIP: It is great on its own too without foundation just for that flush of color and for natural look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love using cream blush and this one is my new holy grail. I like the way it blends on my skin like butter and gives a natural glow. It comes in a tin which has a good quality mirror and comes with a brush on the other end which is always a plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from bzz agent for my honest opinion. Personally my first impression was okay as I soon as I opened it up, the blush broke off. In terms of pigmentation itu2019s a 10/10 as itu2019s almost like a lipstick only a layer needed! It really enhances your makeup look. The texture is creamy and it dries pretty quickly without leaving smudges or patchy spots &  Itu2019s sensitive skin friendly

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have honestly never seen a creamier blush than this. I I love the stick formula and the brush since it is super easy to use. This colour blends into my skin so smoothly and is very pigmented. My favourite blush from now on. 100% recommended

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this shade was perfect for everyday and works well on all ages as well, my mom and me love it! compared to powder blushes I much prefer the finish and pigmentation this has.  I got this product for free but would definitely buy again once I run out, which will be a while since these last forever!  I definitely think everyone should have a nudestix blush/bronzer in their makeup drawer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging was cute. It has a lipstick feel when applied but is easily blended out with the supplied brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: A everyday to go blush kit
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you are a fan of everyday use kind of makeup products,  you will love it. I received the product few days ago and since then, I'm applying it on my cheeks with fingers to give it a natural look. It blends super easy and it stays on your skin smooth and buttery. I LOVED applying it as a contour for my lips and applying lip gloss on it. The packaging is luxe and has mirror which makes it easy if you wanna drop it in your bag and travel. Overall, you will be fan of it if you love both natural and a makeup look by applying the product more or less.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Nudestix Nudies Matte Lux All Over Face Blush in shade Nude Buff in exchange for honest review , just in time for our local town weekend festival. This was the prefect time to put this blush to the test. Over the weekend I wore this blush for 8+ hours in 30 degree Celsius weather. This blush applied beautifully and looked very natural over foundation ( Mac Face & Body) and wore beautifully all day&night. Eventually I did get a little bit shinny but I did expect that especially with the heat. I then tried layering it with a light dusting of powder blush over and it still looked very natural & wore beautifully.  I would definitely recommend it to friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love that this blush is creamy yet dries down to a beautiful finish. I received the shade Rosy Posy and I love how versatile it is with any makeup look. I found whether I was wearing full makeup or not that it applied best if first swatched onto the back of your hand and then swirled onto a stippling brush to then dab onto the cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have received the Nudestix nudies Matte Lux all over blush in exchange for my honest opinion. I like to keep the natural looks and this blush fits right into my everyday use. It blends right in the skin and covers light blemishes, and provide the light blush to the skin. Its spreads smoothly and does not leave patchy smudges. It come with a brush at the other end and case has a small mirror, making it a perfect for carrying it in purse for touch ups.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: this is a must have! I love how it's easy to apply, blends beautifully and is buildable if you want more color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've never tried a stick blush before, but I can see why so many people use cream-based blushes. It's definitely less drying on the skin than powder and it's also easier to get a good amount of color with just one swipe rather than having to layer up to get the same effect. I like that it applies like a cream-based product, but finishes matte like a powder-based product. I got to try out juicy melons through bzzagent and the color really compliments my skin. I highly recommend this product! It also comes in a cute case with a mirror on the lid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: best blush ever. creamyyyyy so smoooth and stays whole day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received the shade Pretty Peachy and I was shocked at how much colour payoff I got with just one swipe on each cheek. I have a medium warm complexion and I tend to reach for darker plum blushes but this peach looked stunning and fresh on my face as well as on my lips. The formula of this stick is the same signature nudestix creamy consistency and it blends beautiful with your fingertips, a brush or a sponge! My favourite way to apply it is with my fingers as I find it allows me to diffuse some of the pigment and get more control of where I apply it. I have my eye on the u201cdolce darlinu201d shade and I think I will have to pick it up during my next trip to Sephora lol.
