I like that it comes in a little metal container so I can put in my purse for touch ups and it as a mirror in it. It's dewy but not too much. I took a star off because even though it is cute I don't know that I would pay full price for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm quite particular when it comes to blush - I look for something natural, that won't slip and will last all day as i'm at work for 8+ hours.   Found this blush and i'm very satisfied with the longivity and colour.  A little goes a long way and the colour blends flawlessly in combination with foundation or on its own. Would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love using this on my cheeks - it's not sticky, easy to blend (I use my fingers) and it lasts all day. It creates the perfect glow and then I use a lightener over top on days when I want a bit of extra glamour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve only ever previously used powder blush - not sure why I was afraid to try a cream or stick (I think I was worried about textures mixing but boy was I wrong!) This stick blends in beautifully and is one of the most natural blushes Iu2019ve ever used. I can use it with a full face of makeup or on its own and it completely enhances my cheeks! I want to try all the colours now!!!!  Unfortunately, this didnu2019t work for my lips. It just settled into my lines but maybe it would be better if I used a lip primer. It looks like it would be great as a quick eye shadow but the colour doesnu2019t work for me for that.  Iu2019m looking forward to trying new products from Nudestix in the future. Their packaging and product is near perfection!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: the brush I didn't know I needed ! the blush should be the shining star but I love the brush more than the blush! the blush is very bright for pale skin but it can easily blend in with the genius brush. I will use this with specific looks and not for everyday.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m loving Nudies Bloom! Such a great alternative to powdered blush. The stick allows easy control and I love the dewy effect that it makes. No more caked on powders, this is great. I also love that thereu2019s no fragrance. Super smooth and glides right on, plus easy to blend, would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was rather excited after trying the product. It blended well and gives good control of the amount of pigment. The little brush attached to the other ends was a fantastic touch. It definitely helps with applying on the go and it twists off for easier cleaning. All and all its a good product, but my only negative is that is doesn't really dry. It stayed slightly sticky even after applying setting spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product. I love the color. The product is very creamy and easy to blend. The brush that comes with it is super convenient. A little product goes a long way too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This stick applies smoothly and evenly for a huge pop of color! A little goes a long way which gives me confidence this stick will last for awhile. I love that there is an applicator built right in however it isnu2019t the easiest to use. It does blend well with some work though so a great asset for being on the go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The all in one applicator system is very convenient. It gave me a nice soft blush colour once fully blended into my daily makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all, I just wanna point out that I received this product for free thanks to BzzAgent in exchange for a completely honest review.   This is actually a really nice product! I was worried at first because the colour isnu2019t the most pigmented- but this, of course is the whole point. Itu2019s meant to be dewy and natural looking. And you can definitely wear this as a blush on top of bare skin, or on top of liquid and powder foundations. Itu2019s very versatile! I would definitely recommend cleaning and air drying the attached brush every time you use it, as product buildup might affect the blending and your skin overall. I will say, I do think I picked the wrong colour. Itu2019s a light shade of pink which doesnu2019t go well my skin shade. But I believe it was the darkest one they were sampling. So I wonu2019t be docking stars for that. The only downside is that it can get a little greasy as the day goes on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how versatile this product is! For reference, I am an NC40 at MAC. I tried the Nudies Bloom in the shade Bohemian Rose and it was the perfect everyday shade for my skin tone. I have been wearing it as blush to work five days a week, through eight-hour shifts, for the past two weeks and the product has performed beautifully. There were a few warm days when I felt like I was melting, but I was pleased to see that my blush was holding up perfectly! It looked natural on my skin, brightened up my face, and looked amazing even as it faded later into the day. There was no splotchy-ness. I recommend dusting your cheeks lightly with setting powder or another blush to lock it in because I found it lasted much longer that way. The balm looked and felt comfortable on my lips as well. I was happy to see that it did not exaggerate the lines or make my lips feel dry. Again, it was a natural flush of colour that was perfect for daytime, with the ability to apply more and amp it up a bit for the evening/night. The packaging is also simple but effective. I love the mirror on the inside of the tin and the brush on the end of the balm. It is a great product for travelling! Overall, Nudies Bloom is a great option to grab if you like cream products and if you like to keep your makeup minimal.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nudestix Nudies is such a versatile product! I used it for my blush, eye shadow, and lip to make a dewy look. It blended easily and the pigmentation is amazing. The only drawback is it didn't stay for more than a few hours. I suppose most cream products are like that. Overall, pretty happy with it :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this cream blush. Iu2019ve tried tons from drugstore to high end, and I would say this is one of the most long lasting ones Iu2019ve tried. I will say, the brush doesnu2019t cut it for me. Itu2019s too small to blend the product, however that didnu2019t bother me. Most products like this donu2019t come with a brush at all, so it was a nice touch nonetheless. A nice duo fiber brush from the drugstore did the trick. Blends like a dream, and lasts all day. Iu2019ll definitely consider purchasing other colours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have never really tried cream blushes before so I can't compare to others but I do love the fact how easy it was to use with the brush attached to the other end of this stick. It is very neat and compact which can fit in your handbag with ease.  The shade that I got was Bohemian Rose and I truly loved this color. It went on very easily on the skin and with a few brush strokes it blended in really well over my moisturizer with no trouble at all. The shade is a light but yet subtle pink with a nice dewy and glowy colour.  I wouldn't mind trying other shades to see what else suits well with me. I do recommend this product.   Received this as a free product from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love love love this colour. Perfect pink for summer. I typically use tiger lily queen so I love really bright/vibrant colours for blush. I use this on my cheeks, eyelids and lips for a perfect sun kissed look. I donu2019t really use the brush but typically will use my beauty blender or fingers to blend it in!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was lucky to be gifted this product for review. I love multipurpose makeup products for on the go and this one certainly did not disappoint. It is such a beautiful colour for both the face and lips. It goes on easy, blends well, and washes off just the same at the end of the day. I like how there is a brush on one end and the product on the other so I don't have to carry multiple tools in my bag for on the go. As an added bonus the carry tin has a mirror on the cover.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how compact the blush it, saves me space in my purse from packing a brush. There is enough pigment from a few dabs. My makeup is minimal but I do love that I can do a quick touch up after work by darkening my blush. No mess with application and the soft texture helps with blending.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to like this product but it wasnu2019t for me. It didnu2019t blend well into my skin and it looked dry. Lovely colour though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was really never a fan of cream blushes but yhis product was awesome. It doesnt leave your cheeks greasy. It leaves a lovely sheer tint which you could build up. Love that it has its own lottle brush attached. Super easy tontoss in your bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this product! It blends beautifully on top of my foundation, and itu2019s super easy to throw in your bag and take on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was just ok for me. It was difficult to blend and get even colour on both cheeks.

reviews.review_title: In love with these blush sticks.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Nudestix blush sticks. They're fool-proof, so easy to use and travel with. I have Cherry Blossom Babe, Bareback, Sweet Peach Peony, and Sunkissed. Really enjoyable to apply and user-friendly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed the All over Dewy colour in Bohemian Rose, it's a nice muted pink that's almost a bit mauvy. Goes on subtle and can build up. I like using it on the cheek to add a bit of natural colour, goes with all kinds of eye looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love This product it very natural and easy to wear

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very impressed with nudies bloom all over face dewy colour. It went on very sheer adding just a hint of colour without feeling caked on.  I was super convenient to have the brush attached.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bohemian rose is the perfect spring color blush. The product applicator is very easy to use and no messy fingers for applying blush. The case provided is very cute. The blush made me little greasy but overall I loved the product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect spring blush with its beautiful rosiness and dewy finish. I like how easy it is to blend this, whether it is with a brush or with your fingers. The only critique I have is the brush that it comes with, it tends to soak up a lot of the product rather than distributing it across your cheeks. But with that in mind, I don't think it messes with the quality of the blush itself, as I like to use my own brush anyway. Other than that, this blush has been my go-to recently.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am loving this Nudies Bloom All Over Dewy Color in Cherry Blossom Babe. It has a gentle, rose flush color that is perfect for my lips and cheeks! It provides a natural glow and is super buildable and blendable. The brush is so convenient and is helpful for on-the-go touchups! I love NUDESTIX products already and this one is a gem! I have been recommending it to my girlfriends and will be investing in new shades. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: In The Nude - neutral nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: so glad i finally bought this after eyeing it for so long! the color and finish is so flattering and natural. itu2019s super versatile which is also a plus! hoping to try more shades one day :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product and how it can be used all over. It blends so well on my cheeks. Definitely my fav spring.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the consistency and dewy finish of the product..it was quite long lasting and since it is a multipurpose product it is quite handy.. Loved the color as well..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: this is a nice cream blush, but I have oily skin so this is too heavy for my skin and doesnu2019t stay on long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a hydrating product. Great for cheeks or lips. I received this to give my honest review and I would definitely purchase in other shades

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product as itu2019s super convenient for throwing in a make up bag on the go. The packaging is perfection I love the soft brush on one end that you can actually remove to wash which is really good one of my concerns prior to trying this because I wasnu2019t sure how to clean the brush. The product itself is super gorgeous colour the bohemian rose shade is perfection. It blends at super nice I personally love it on my cheeks and I use on my eyelids and lips and it also looked super gorgeous all different ways. This will definitely be my summer go to product for a beautiful blushing look. I will recommend this so anyone who wants a convenient high-quality product in a convenient packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the shade! It is a pale rosy shade that is perfect for all skin tones as it is pigmented  (for reference I have a tan complexion). The formula is lightweight and blends smoothly and has a satin finish. I used this product as both a blush and a lippie and personally I prefer to use it as a lippie as I rarely wear blush. The only negative thing about this nudestix is the staying power - it is not long lasting so you will have to reapply at least twice in a day. Overall, this nudestix is a must have if you are looking for a versatile product. Will definitely be trying other shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this nude stick. The colour is similar to a coral pink, I use it on my cheeks and lip and it gives me a rosy glow. Great for summer and spring, super easy to layer with my everyday look. Also love the brush at the other end, super convenient to tuck in my purse for touchups throughout the day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this product - perfect for summer to get a rosy glow with a little bit of product! I loved how buildable it was!! Highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The picante shade is beautiful for summer! I never really use the brush end of the package, because I dip my blush on the stick to not make it too heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best blushes I have ever used. It is beautiful pink color; it would look beautiful on all skin types. I applied it using the bush that came with it. I had to dab the brush in it maybe 3 times and that worked for both my cheeks. After applying the blush, it immediately looks gorgeous; there's a pink glow that looks very natural and makes you feel radiant. I found that it lasted my 12-hour workdays. It wore beautifully on warm days. Overall, I am highly impressed by this blush. I will purchase more colors as this product is perfect for on the go and very easy to use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was ecstatic to have the opportunity to try out the new Nudies Bloom All Over Dewy Color face stick, courtest of BzzAgent. As someone who is constantly on-the-go and has a busy schedule, I love the convenience of this color stick. The Bohemian Rose color I received is a nice rosey pink shade which you can apply to your cheeks, lips, and/or eyelides to add a dab of color. The color blends in quite well with the brush applicator on the other end of the stick providing a nice, natural rosy color. The size of the applicator stick is perfect - small enough to carry around in your purse or your pocket, but mighty size to allow enough color use for several months and a brush for on-the-go blending. Looking forward to trying other shades and products from Nudestix!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved it.Its a great product which can be used as a blush or eyeshadow or on lips or all over the face for dewy look.The packaging is so good and comes with the brush to apply.Brush can be removed and cleaned for future uses.The box also has a mirror and it is so good.The product is well pigmented and loved it.I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the Nudestix Nudies Bloom All Over Dewy Colour. I received the shade Bohemian Rose. It's a nice pink that looks very natural on both my cheeks and lips. The texture is creamy and easy to apply and blend. It didn't last long on my lips, but it was a cute my lips but better shade while it lasted. It didn't dry my lips either. On my cheeks, it was a nice cream blush. I also liked the packaging. The metal tin is very cute, and the mirror on the lid is very handy. The other side of the Nudestix has a little brush for blending on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've only ever tried Nudestix skincare before and was extremely excited to try a cream product. The packaging is nice and sleek. The tin it comes in is cute because it has a mirror but I feel it to be extra and unnecessary. I like that it's dual ended - the cream stick on one end and the brush on the other. The brush is soft and dense, a little too dense for me personally, when blending this product I use my fingers. The cherry blossom shade is beautiful! Blends out easily. I use it alone on light makeup days (concealer, mascara, lipgloss). On heavier makeup days I layer this with a powder blush and highlight ontop of my foundation. This also makes a cute lip color! Versatile! Stays on pretty well for a cream product. Overall I'd recommend this shade and product - I just feel the price is a bit to high for me to personally repurchase. I'd still love to try more from this brand - I like the concept!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this formula and color.  This is now my go to when I have to get ready quickly for a zoom meeting without have to do a full face.  This at my cheeks, temples, and eyelids with some mascara and chapstick and Iu2019m camera ready.  I get a lot of compliments on how I look on camera

reviews.review_title: Bohemian rose - perfect pink for spring
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bohemian Rose on my skin comes off a cool toned bubblegum pink. I own 3 other nudestix in matte finishes (Sunkissed, Beach babe, Terracotta tan) and although this one is dewy, it applies no different. I like to pick up the colour with a denser blush brush and pat the color into the skin and build up the color in layers. The finish is definitely dewy but at the same time it dries down into a powder within minutes, no stickiness at all. I had this blush on from 7am-5pm (10 hours) with no setting spray. I had to put on a mask several times a day and where the mask rubbed against my cheek you can see a little bit of fading but overall the colour was still there! This is no different than the other nudestix that I own, they live up to its claim that they are longwearing. The packaging is perfect for travelling and on-the-go. I am so glad I have this new colour in my collection - it's perfect for spring!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: At first I was a bit hesitant with this colour thinking it might be too dark but I ended up really liking it! The blush comes in such a cute little tin and the blush itself is so easy to apply and blend. It doesnu2019t leave your face sticky which I really donu2019t like about a lot of products out there!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of my new favourite products!! I use it in my everyday makeup routine. It has no scent at all if youu2019re sensitive to fragrance and it blends so well. This shade was perfect for my fair skin. It created a pretty rosy glow on my cheeks and added the slightest colour to my lips. Thereu2019s a subtle sheen to it so itu2019s almost like an ultra natural highlight if placed higher on the cheekbones. It isnu2019t super dry or matte but more of a silky soft finish. I also like the included brush on the opposite end of the stick, itu2019s soft and more of a stippling design. I often apply it gently with my fingertips as well since itu2019s so easy to blend. I am in love with this! Nudestix packaging is also always so impressive. Highly recommend. Canu2019t wait to grab some other colours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! I have the colour Bohemian Rose and itu2019s just gorgeous. I applied it to my lips and cheeks and the colour is so natural on the lips. The formula is so smooth and easy to apply. I also love the blending brush it comes with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had the opportunity to test NUDESTIX Nudies Bloom All Over Dewy Color. The color I tried was Cherry Blossom Babe which is a rose flush colour. The product comes in a tube/applicator. One side is the product that is similar to a stick, the other side has a brush. You can apply the product anywhere on your face for a bit of colour or glow with or without other makeup or foundation. I applied the product on my cheeks, lips and eyelids after applying foundation for a pop of colour. You can apply as much or as little product as your want depending on how much colour you want. The product seemed a bit pigmented but when you apply it to your skin it actually is not that dark and blends really well. I really liked that it's a multi use product and simple to use as it makes my morning makeup routine efficient.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging of the product is very cute and the mirror was a nice and practical added touch that I did not expect. The blush comes with a brush on the other end, which makes it very easy to blend out the product and makes it stand out from other blush products on the market.  In terms of the product, it does blend out with a skin like finish and also adds a bit of a glow, which I like because I do enjoy more of a dewy finish.  Overall, I think it is a very nice product, the only con is the price range is a bit high.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the thicker formula on this blush, compared to my initial favourite, Cloud Paint. It's so easy to apply, build, and blend out. The attached brush is perfect too because I can take this with me on the go. I would totally recommend these blushes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Okay, so I received this free in exchange for my honest opinion. So here it is. Wow. I absolutely love it. I have since bought their bronzer and glow sticks. I love how much time I save with this product. Typically I am getting 3 kids under 9 ready in the morning, let alone myself. I love how this product give me a pop of colour so i don't feel so rushed and tired like I am. Immediately after my first use it went straight to my purse to keep with me at all times. Also the tin with the built in mirror is an amazing feature.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The color wasn't great for my skin tone but it is a beautiful dewy finish that lasts!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the nudestix bloom all over dewy color blush in shade #cherry blossom babe as a free sample to test out! Itu2019s my first time trying a stick blush and the creamy texture truly surprised me. Itu2019s easy to blend with the brush thatu2019s at the opposite end. This color is good for spring and summer and I canu2019t wait to try other colours. Would recommend this product to my others to try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! First off, the packaging is so nice! It looks high end and even comes with a cute little brush.   The colour is beautiful and the product is so versatile. Iu2019ve never had a product that I was able to use on my cheeks, lips and eyes. Itu2019s very easy to be blended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a sample to review in the shade Cherry Blossom Babe. It comes in a little metallic box, which is perfect to take on the go.  What I love most about this blush, is that is does not create a mess when you use it, unlike most powder blushes, which crumble when you use the brushes on them. Also, it leaves no sticky texture once you blend it with the brush, which is already included!  I do recommend this product, it is perfect to keep at home or to carry on the go, since it is compact and the blending brush is already included, not to mention a mirror! And the quality and pigmentation are amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color and it's formula. The product is versatile, which is always a plus. I highly recommend Nudies Bloom All Over Dewy Color and I will definitely buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a Nudestix in the shade u2018Bohemian Roseu2019. I have to say the shade is stunning. The formula is a cream base but itu2019s not heavy/ gross feeling, itu2019s very lightweight. I LOVE that thereu2019s a brush on the end thatu2019s removable to give a softer look and to clean. I love that itu2019s for your cheeks, eyes and lips-itu2019s so convenient! The packaging is all that! Itu2019s safe to say Iu2019ll be purchasing once this stick is finished :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the shade (cherry blossom) I received. It works really nicely on my skin tone and gave me a nice flush. It is very pigmented and the product can be built up or sheered out depending on what look you prefer.  This worked as well on my skin as other cream blushes do. Not very well. The colour lasted maybe 5 hours before I noticed that it completely disappeared off my face.  I love that it's very portable and has a brush attached. That way I don't have to carry a separate brush which can be bulky especially when travelling.  Cream products tend not to last on my face so no, I wouldn't buy this product. Not for myself anyway. Not because I wasn't happy with it but because creams in general just don't last on my face.  I would recommend this blush to people who like cream products and having the ability to decide how opaque or sheer to apply it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i loveeee the product, it keeps my cheeks hydrated and the best part is joined brush at other end. i always had to use fingers while travelling to use my powder blush, but this product is so helpful.guves amazing shiny and natural look on your cheeks. compact and easy to travel with. the brush works wonders. this shade is so perfect for my skin, it looks natural and doesnt break out my skin. 1000/1000 according to me. would surely suggest everyone to have atleast one of this in daily makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Bohemian rose color is perfect for summertime. At first i was scared the color would be too bright, but because of its creamy formula, it blends super easily and leaves a light natural tint andIm it is definitely buildable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve quickly become obsessed with this product and find myself reaching for it every day. I love using this as a blush to add a natural hint of colour to my face that makes it look like a lovely natural sun burn. It blends super easily and the coverage is blendable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this all over dewy colour so much. I primarily use it as a blush and it gives a perfect glowing colour that lasts all day and doesnu2019t dry out your skin. Im quite fair with neutral/pink undertones and the colour is perfect for me. The product blends well and I love the compact brush included in the other end. Its perfect for travel or at home and Iu2019ll definitely be including this in my day to day makeup routine.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for full face of make up or no make up day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary (#gotitfree) in exchange for my honest opinions. I have always used and still use Nudestix for my everyday make up routine as it's fast and effective. These blushes are some of my favourites as they blend on the skin and give a glow from within. The cherry blossom shade is a beautiful match for my skin tone. Sometimes I use this on my bare skin after moisturizer routine and it gives the right flush on my cheek and gives me the perfect no makeup makeup look. Also it stays on for a full work day (8-10hours) for me. I definitely recommend this to friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush as it provides a great coverage and glowing look after applying it. It was very easy to apply and I also use it on my lips and eyes to get the flowy look. I will definitely recommend to anyone who is looking for instant glow and would buy it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the tin container it is stored in because it has a cute built-in mirror on the other side of the lid. The colour I got was Bohemian Rose which is a nice pink. It glides smoothly onto the skin with the ability to build up for a darker shade. On the other side of the tube, there's a built-in soft round brush to help blend into the skin if you're using it like a cream blush. However, I used this on my lips instead of my eyes and face as I found it too sticky to apply to those specific areas. I also found that this rubs off easily as it has a glossy finish. It didn't last long and it transfer easily, so you have to reapply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So fun to use ! I love that i can build up color with multiple strokes and then use the brush for gradient looks. The brush is soo soft !

reviews.review_title: extremely versatile will purchase other shades
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: thoroughly enjoyed this product and like that it was buildable for a more intense colour but it also was easily diffused on my cheeks. I tried it as a wash of colour across my lips one day to have a more monochromatic look and it was stunning. I did not find this product to break me out or look oily after long wear.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this all over dewy colour balm because I have dry skin and this is perfect for my skin type because itu2019s super creamy and super blendable and doesnu2019t goes on or looks patchy on my skin like some of it hy cream products do on my skin and itu2019s also very long lasting and wear off very beautifully too.Iu2019m definitely going to try more colours as I love this formula so much and I definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a pretty, subtle and fresh shade and i really like it on my skin. Also very lightweight and gives a nice glow. Love also the entire packaging and the brush is my favourite, so convenient.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm impressed by the pigmentation of this product! It can be built up as much as you like, and the color selection is beautiful. I also like the brush provided on the end - it feels high quality and works well to blur the product out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really love the colour pay off and the natural beautiful colour on my cheeks. It gives off the perfect natural blush and is super blendable with fingers and a beauty blender. I appreciate the packaging which provides a brush on the other side, although to be honest beauty blender and fingers provide a better application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is my absolute favorite. I'm not a huge blush fan usually,  I find I makes me look older but this is like a summer glow in a stick. Everytime I wear this I get compliments, people tell me I'm glowing. I'll need this in more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tested the Nudies Bloom All Over Dewy Color - Cherry Blossom Babe and happy to say that this works really well. The product gives a natural pop of colour and works well with the everyday natural look. I've also tested using it as a lip colour for a MLBB look and it works fantastic.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this blush. The consistency and colour is gorgeous, and the convenience of having a brush on one end was really handy. Unfortunately the colour fades very quickly. I tried it on bare skin, ontop of foundation, with and without a primer and unfortunately after about an hour or two it fades away and blends in with the rest of my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the convenience of a portable tube that's also versatile enough to be used on eyes, cheeks and lips! The product itself is very creamy and moist and Bohemian Rose is a gorgeous dusty rose colour. I did find the brush slightly hard to use to actually buff out the product on cheeks; it ended up quite patchy so would probably just use my fingers to apply next time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for summer, I love the dewy finish, I have indian/olive tone skin and this colour is a great match. I also find that it has greater lasting power than powder blushes. But let me tell you about the brush on the other end of the stick! Itu2019s seriously genius. First of all, there is a brush - I love that in itself. Secondly, the brush twists off, so you can get product on your brush before applying to your face! This is great for hygienic reasons but also means no harsh lines or unevenness on your face, that you then have to blend out with the brush. They literally thought of everything!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this to #tryforfree and I really wasnu2019t sure how I would feel with a cream blush but always wanted to try! I was so impressed with how creamy the formula was and how easy it was to blend with not only my beauty blender but my brush as well, no blotchy ness!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how easy it is to use the nudies bloom & the fact that it can be used for not only your cheeks but your lips & eyes as well makes this product AMAZING!   The bohemian rose is a beautiful colour. It looks a lot darker then it is once itu2019s applied & I find that you only need a little as it blends really well. It left my skin looking & feeling flawless, definitely going to get myself a few different shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely color! Looks suuuper natural and the shade beach babe looks so good on my pale skin it looks like Iu2019ve just come home from vacation! This will be my go to summer blush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color gives such a nice natural healthy glow. Will definitely purchase more shades. Wish it stayed a bit more longer though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this product a few times and am really impressed with its lasting power. It blends in beautifully and lasts for hours, even through sweat. The shade blends out to a really nice natural rose flush - a lot less intense than the tube looks in the photos. Would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is the jack of all trades. You can do both a sheer or a vibrant pigmented coverage. Very easy to blend into the skin. It comes with a mini brush at the bottom but you can also use your hands. The shade is absolutely stunning. FYI: there is a light shimmer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is perfect for your cheeks and lips. I use it everyday before I go out. It is simple to apply and not messy at all. I highly recommend it if you like rose colour on your cheeks and lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My introduction to Nudestix was excellent because of this product. The packaging is really nice and sleek. The color stick comes in a black tin, that has a mirror in the lid and it's super handy for on-the go use.  The product itself is a great size, fitting in both my makeup bag and purse. The color is a beautiful rosy pink that will be so wearable for spring and summer. I have a fair neutral complexion, and wear golden tones when I'm tanned. I tested the color against both my fair and tanned foundations, and it was universally flattering.  The application was very easy- just roll up the stick and glide on the skin. I found that dabbing was better for since I was using full-coverage foundation and wanted to prevent my other products from moving too much. I chose to place the product on the top of my cheekbones for a lifted blush effect, as well as over my nose and eyebrows for a naturally sun-kissed look. I also applied it to my lips, and loved the creamy formula, shine and natural pink tint it gave me. The formula is creamy and well-pigmented. It can definitely be built up to a more intense flush. It blended nicely with a dense blush brush, as well as my Beautyblender. The color wore well over an 8-hour day, and withstood about 45mins inside a mask. I will absolutely be reaching for this product all spring and summer long for a warm flush! I would recommend this product for its use, versatility and portability. The only critique I might have is to add a brush to the other side of the stick, so it could be touched up on-the-go (i.e.: ABH blush stick). Otherwise, this is an awesome product and cherry blossom is a gorgeous skin tint!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I highly recommend this product.This blush is dewy and sheer but has a beautiful pink colour.It is super easy to blend but I would recommend to apply it to a brush first so that your foundation doesnu2019t move other then that I loved everything about it and will be adding it to my daily routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start of by saying I actually really like Nudestix and I own one of their other products matte blush and bronze.    First letu2019s start with the packaging. Cute tin with a mirror on the inside so you can apply the stick, either directly or with your fingers or a brush.  Tbh the tin is great but I personally wouldnu2019t carry it around with me as itu2019s a bit of extra bulk but good for keeping the stick safe during travel. The brush itself on the stick barely does much so I prefer to use my own brush or my fingers.    The product itself glides on super smooth like a dewy crayon.  Itu2019s really easy to blend into the skin for that flushed look.  Your skin actually looks plump when you blend it through and really dewy.  I will say that throughout the day I noticed it wasnu2019t as prominent as when I first put it on.  The colour I got is a really cute glowy pink.  It showed up great on my cheeks but not so much on my lids.    Overall I think this product is great for a very natural/summer look.  The stick is small enough to carry around with you on its own and it does have multiple uses.  I would buy it but just in a darker shade :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The purple shade is SO underrated. It turns into the prettiest pink flush but looks so natural. Itu2019s like a cool toned blue kinda pink! And it lasts forever and stays on under my mask.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first cream blush product Iu2019ve ever used and I really like it. I have classic combo skin, but I found this didnt increase oiliness or cling to dry patches. Iu2019ll definitely be purchasing in different colours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colour and formula. Itu2019s great that you can use it anywhere on your face. The little brush twists off so that you can wash it which is ideal ! Would definitely recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such a pretty colour!! Cherry blossom babe is kind of like a muted bubblegum pink, love it so much, canu2019t wait to try the other colours!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a perfect summer product, I use it on my cheeks and it definitely leaves a beautiful dewy finish. The colour is flattering for many different skin tones. Very happy with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: NUDIES BLOOM - BOHEMIAN ROSE , I like the product, easily take place in my purse, I like the color and effects

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in the mail and immediately had to try it. Upon first putting it on I noticed the coverage was quite sheer and light feeling. As a tinted lip balm itu2019s great, but as a blush itu2019s even better!  Itu2019s perfect for the summer because it wears beautifully as it fades. It can easily be tossed in your purse and brought with you to touch up throughout the day.  Definitely a summer staple!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I gifted this product in exchange fee for a review. The shades are great, the formula lasts all day, and I really enjoy the brush attached.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the fact that this is such a delicate everyday colour. I also love the fact that you can wear this as lipstick, blush and eyeshadow! Itu2019s definitely a 10/10 to me! Most products like this are super sticky feeling but once you blend this in itu2019s not sticky anymore! I also love the compact case that doubles as a mirror. I got this product free from #bzzagent

reviews.review_title: If your hesitant donu2019t be, but it already!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in shade cherry blossom babe for free. Iu2019d like you to know if you are thinking about trying it, just do it! You wonu2019t regret it. Itu2019s such a versatile handle little make up wrapped up in adorable packaging. Itu2019s comfortable to wear on eyes lips or cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, itu2019s so convenient and fits in my purse. The blush itself is not sticky, it doesnu2019t leave a residue which other products do, and it lasts all day. I love that it has a brush built in and I like that you can take the brush off to wash it. I love the colour I tried and would like to try other colours. My new favourite blush! I will definitely recommend this product and the price is great too.

reviews.review_title: Gorgeous colour, very versatile, buildable colour
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product; I got the bohemian rose and the colour is gorgeous. I am really into products that are multi purpose especially when travelling. I've used other brands before, and they were too sticky/balmy and did not blend properly.  I love that this is so versatile! I use it on my lips with a lip balm for that extra dewy feel, a touch on my cheeks for a nice glow and on my eyes. It is not sticky and not drying, it's just perfect. It came with the cutest tin box that has a mirror on the inside. Overall, it feels like a very high-quality product and a lot of thought went into it.   There is a very soft dense brush on one side that helps to blend it out on your face. I use my finger to apply a few dabs on my cheeks and you can build the colour on your eyes and lips from very opaque to a rich colour depending on what look you're going for. Love all the different colours available and will be buying more colours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Awesome product, the color fits my skin tone and the quality of the product is perfect! I would definitely buy it next time!

reviews.review_title: Moodie Blu is the weakest in the bunch
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Nudies in general, have owned 6-7 different shades of them over the years and have already reviewed several of those favorably. Moodie Blu was not a favorite. As intriguing as it was to rock a purple shadow and blush (I used it on both my cheeks and lids), it was a tad much for my light complexion (albeit still wearable). But the biggest problem with it for me was the fact that it stained skin even after removal. Then I noticed that the packaging listed u201cFaceu201d and u201cLipsu201d as application sites - u201cEyesu201d was conspicuously missing (while all the other Nudies do list u201cEyesu201d also). Nudestix CS assured me that the product can be used as eye color, but Iu2019m not so sureu2026 It must contain one those infamous purple pigments that stain skin. This just didnu2019t feel right to me, so I discontinued use and returned product. Canu2019t recommend.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Moodie Blu - cool, deep eggplant- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: the colour is gorgeous but it's a bit hard to blend and doesn't last long!! I got this as a gift so glad that I didn't spend my own money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect color for a summer blush. I just came back from vacation with a tan and this shade looks great on a medium skin tone. The little brush works well to blend the product too I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream blush! Iu2019m quite used to using powder blush (mainly MAC) but this made me convert instantly.  The formula glides on smoothly to my skin and I blend using my blush brush.  You could use the small brush attached but I find it doesnu2019t do a great job at blending out.  This is definitely for days where Iu2019m going for a more natural and relaxed look with a pop of colour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love my girl allanaramaa so I bought this to support! First of all I love the colour! For best application I'd recommend swiping the stick itself onto the back of your hand to load up the colour, then use a beauty sponge and apply it. I find there is a learning curve to using cream products, however if you're a pro then I'd definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love it! To me it kind of looks like my Nars liquid blush and Iu2019m here for it! The only Iu2019m not a fan of is the brush that comes with it, but to me itu2019s not an issue at all!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! It gives such a natural flush for my ultra fair skin which is hard for me to find as everything shows almost comically brightly on my face. Itu2019s blendable, itu2019s not too heavy. Perfect for no makeup makeup days, Iu2019ve found myself skipping contour now that I have this. I truly hope this is never discontinued because it is MAGIC

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dewy, pigmented, gorgeous blush! Easy to apply, buildable and blends beautifully. The only issue is that it doesnu2019t exactly last the entire day, especially with our masks on. But I have combo/oily skin in the summer and very dry skin during winter, and this is smooth like butter. It gives me that pop of color and a healthy dewy u201cglowu201d.  Plus, itu2019s very travel friendly u2014 cute chubby stick, dual-ended with product on one end and a brush on the other. Super convenient!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Highly recommend Cherie colour for fair skin tones, it looks like very natural light pink flush. I tried u201cneutral roseu201d colours in liquid blushes and often they look more like a tan than a blush on me. I also bought Bare Back colour, and it is more beige, although still wearable. Buildable colour, very easy to apply, stays all day. I hope they never discontinue it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: In The Nude - neutral nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I'm very fair skinned and this blush adds a perfect, natural color to my skin. I just use my finger and pat it into my skin, and it will last forever. I was afraid it was going to be too orange for me, as I normally stick to pink tones for my blush, but it wasn't. A great shade if you are looking for a blush that isn't pink but isn't going to be orange either. My skin looks like 'peaches and cream'.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First time trying anything from this line and I LOVE it!! Super easy to blend and layer. Doesnu2019t pick up foundation. Also really happy with the color (bareback), perfect nude/pink! I used it on my eyes and lips as well. Iu2019m definitely going to be getting more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have Deep Skin with golden undertones. I love how this shows up on my skin. Itu2019s a really nice blush and just adds a touch of colour. Iu2019m really impressed with the applicator.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this nudies bloom!! Love the formula and the color! Great for spring! Looks great on cheeks and lips!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful shade for cheeks and lips and it blends well however, mine arrived broken! Customer service was able to help me, but I donu2019t trust the quality of this product

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This, for me, is the perfect blush. I love the formula, itu2019s extremely user friendly; I swipe it on my face and it doesnu2019t disturb anything underneath.   All this aside, I am mostly here for the colour. It is the best blush colour for my skin tone that Iu2019ve ever found.  Brush is useless, I wish there was an option to purchase without.   Overall love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I didnu2019t feel like there was a lot of color payoff on this. I kept wanting to apply more and more and I think it would get very expensive if I wore it like that everyday. I returned it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I almost didn't try this product due to some of the reviews but the recent flash sale on these made me give it a try.  I picked 'naughty n' spice' and it is a natural brownish pink, sort of like Milk's 'Werk' color.  I wear CT's Hollywood Filter instead of foundation and this applied well over it and lasted all day for me, no problem.   I love the natural color it gives me and I applied this to my cheeks and down the center of my nose.  I did set with Anastasia's setting powder in banana.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s not as soft as imagine itu2019s really difficult to use without leaving make up patches on the face itu2019s a no for me !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really loving this color, getting me excited for a summer glow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: not the best ever but i see her she dose the job and she dose it well

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Holy grail alert! Iu2019m so surprised nobody else has written a review of this yet but this is my new holy grail cream bronzer. I am over 35, very pale, redhead with blue eyes and this is the perfect bronzer for pale girls. It is brown and red in the undertone, which when blended out looks more realistic than any caramel, brown, bronze, or copper undertoned bronzer ever could. It looks really scary in the tube, but it sheers out incredibly and it looks realistic. No fake tan ever looks realistic on a redhead. I hope they donu2019t discontinue this ever, itu2019s amazing. I layer Naughty and Spice over it or Cherie. I have the sun kissed too, but I feel itu2019s still a little too orange for very fair girls. Love this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: the best blush I have ever tried! the color lasts all day and a little bit goes a long way!

reviews.review_title: Poor Quality + over priced/Crimson Lover & Poppy G
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Don't believe the hype. I am terribly disappointed at some youtubers who are raving about it. I like nudestix's other products. But this line is sub par. Maybe dewy and long staying power dont go together. I ordered Poppy Girl and Crimson Lover. Terribly disappointed as both lacked staying power and it was hard to spread them. Crimson Lover had no pigmentation. Dont waste your money if you do not have an option to return.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gamechanger.  Peony is excellent.  I use it for the days when I'm on a hurry. I will definitely buy more.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Color doesnu2019t last long at all, barely made it to work with any color there

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A must have, such a pretty summer glow. Blends so easy. Last long & stays on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Blends pretty well considering I have dry skin. Comes with a brush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product. I find it doesnu2019t blend as well if you apply it directly to your face. Instead I warm it up on my hand and then use a brush to apply it to my cheeks. It is a beautiful shade for year round use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was going to take one star off for the price, but after wearing this all day, I can justify it. I love stick blushes and liquid blushes, but they have a tendency not to stay put, but this formula actually stays on all day. And I have to admit, the fact that it comes with a little brush on the other end is very convenient. It applies a lot nicer than patting it in with my fingers, which I do with most cream blushes. The color is gorgeous too, I would highly recommend this shade if you like Glossieru2019s Dusk. I have trouble finding a true nude shade like this, so thereu2019s another plus for me. It says matte, but I think it gives you a nice glow. Thereu2019s definitely no shimmer or anything like that, but Iu2019d describe it as a satin finish. I canu2019t wait to try some more shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Best purple blush ever for light skin. I love this blush so much. I reach for it daily. It goes on and blends out so easily and is really flattering.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Moodie Blu - cool, deep eggplant- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this blush honestly I never thought cream or liquid blush was for me always stuck to powder and pink blushes but when I tried the purple blush since tik tok made me buy it Iu2019m in love litterally compliments my skin tone

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love the colour and pigmentation just wish it would last longer on my skin as it fades p fast

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really blendable and gives a naturally sunkissed look. I look like I just returned from the beach whenever I wear this. Itu2019s my holy grail cream blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pleasantly surprised! I used 100 points to try this blush and the only shade available was bohemian rose. I usually don't like cool pinks or cream blushes to be honest. But this one looked great all day! It's a bit hard to blend but it lasted all day and looked nice and dewy (in a natural healthy way). I even liked this shade! Will look at buying other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first product I try from this brand and also in dewy finish.  I love the colour, It is very natural. I think is the perfect colour to wear all year. Itu2019s bendable, what I love because you can go from a natural make up to a full one.  As I said, the formula is new to me. I like how it looks, it gives a healthy/glowy appearance. But I find it a little sticky. I am not sure if Iu2019ll use it summer, because I have oily skin on that season (Iu2019m definitely gonna try the matte finish by then), but is working pretty good for me just now in winter and it lasts long.  About the application. I donu2019t like to use my fingers because when I grab something else it ends up dirty, but, so far, thatu2019s the best way to  apply this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: purchased this on whim, so glad I did. The colour and dewy finish is beautiful. Would def purchase this again. Now a fan of stick blush...who knew??

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nice warm color. Appreciate the efficiency of a stick product. Blends easily.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Received this as a sample in Bohemian Rose and immediately ordered a full size.  The color is perfect on the apples of my cheeks for a sun kissed, dewy look on my olive/tan skin, and it lasts!  It is exactly what I was looking for.  I am glad I got a sample as I probably would have ordered a different color since I did not see many reviews for Bohemian Rose.  It also looks great on the lips.  I use this with Nudestix Matte in Bondi Bae for contouring which is also amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product and amazing formulae. I love love love to apply this blush when I want a natural look. Bonus point, it doesnu2019t clog my pore or irritate my skin! Also very easy to blend and doesnu2019t leave a muddy effect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: a unique color in my blush collection but I always reach for it. It compliments my complexion in a way that typical colors of blush cannot do.

reviews.review_title: Light pink blush for brown skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the cherry blossom light pink shade soooo much. Itu2019s hard to find a light pink blush that looks good on brown skin tones; but this one melts beautifully on my skin and the colour doesnu2019t look out of place. Itu2019s a dewy light pink that makes anyone look cute (and that means a lot coming from someone who has large pores and discolouration). I docked a star off because it doesnu2019t last very long on my skin (at most an hour), I almost feel that the blush sinks in and vanishes. I wish it would last longer :(

reviews.review_title: i use this product every day!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: i love this product so much!! i impulsively bought the nudestix mini kit with sweet peach peony, sunkissed (bronzer), and honey highlight. sweet peach peony has become a daily staple every day since. i love the coral-orange shade. this product blends well on my bare skin, on primer-prepped only skin, and with tinted moisturizers and foundations (i use smashbox primer and nars for tinted moisturizer & foundation). my favorite thing is that it *stays* all day!! even when i am wearing a mask. i typically use setting spray on top which makes it like sleep-in-makeup stay, but the staying power is great even without the setting spray.love love love this shade. after buying the minis twice, I finally invested in the full size.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I adore the shade of this. Super bright coral that is somehow wearable, even on pale skin. The problem I have is that it is so difficult to blend! The formula feels very stiff and even on super moisturized skin, with a beauty blender, I had to really tug to keep this from looking like a giant orange stripe. The brush on the other end, though cute, was completely useless. Kind of a bummer considering this isnu2019t cheap, but Iu2019m trying to find other ways to make it work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the texture of this and the color is the perfect pink flush. Doesnu2019t stay on as long as Iu2019d like but I love the way it looks on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful color but didnu2019t last on my skin even with setting spray. Big no no! Also the texture is just way too balmy for any color to stay on your face, feels like putting chapstick on your cheeks.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Sunset Strip - soft coral nude- bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! It blends into your skin beautifully. It gives me that beautiful sun kisses/burnt kind of look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: gorgeous color! seems dark when you see it, but it's the perfect natural rosy glow on (and i'm very pale). so easy to swipe on and blend with your fingers. i haven't tried a brush yet, because i saw recommendations to use your fingers to blend if you have on foundation underneath. also a nice hint of color for eyelids. amazing, blendable formula!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great dewy color. Would buy again. Also looks great on lips

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this dewy product. I have drier skin and it performs beautifully upon well prepped skin. I dab it on then use the brush to distribute. It lasts through out the day for me but like I said I prep my skin for my cosmetics. I use a dabbing motion to apply and distribute on my face, not a swiping motion. Itu2019s also beautiful on lips. Itu2019s beautiful product and the more you use it the better you get to know it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product blends like an absolute dream. The shade Cherie is my new everyday, soft glam, blush. Worth it 100%!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Truly an outstanding color and formula Love it. I ADORE RUSTY ROUGE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Creamy like Very, goes on great. Needs to be set, blends out to a pinky tone, I was hoping for it to stay deep and cool. Pigment melts away if not blended out and set. Itu2019s a very cool product, just not for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the formula and the color Bare Back. I rub my brush over this, then apply it on my cheeks, and it applies very uniformly, with a matte/natural skin finish. It helps my skin texture look a bit more even, in terms of covering the pores a bit as well. On my medium, yellow under-toned skin, this is a very wearable, everyday color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not very long lasting by itself but a very pretty colour. I layer a powdered blush on top to keep the colour from fading and it works well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a little confused about this product and brand now. I was very excited to purchase this item as I heard so many great reviews online; however as a fan of liquid and cream blushes I found this not as good as others, especially for its price point. It blended out well but did not last long even with primer and setting spray, after a few hours my cheeks were also looking greasier than usual. I know I bought a dewy colour, but other dewy blushes do not give me a greasy look, just glowy. Overall, as someone who is in the marketing business, I can now see that this may be a heavily marketed item and brand, especially since the brand gets so defensive on any negative reviews. Not to mention that itu2019s sold in Target now (is this a luxury brand worth its price or not ???). Could be a good product for you, but in all honesty I would check out the Fenty, Rare Beauty, or Glossier cream blushes first, way cheaper too. Packaging is a little over the top too, and the brush does nothing. Definitely wonu2019t be purchasing again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Literally my go-to cream blush when I just want something that works easily, blends easily, and wonu2019t let me down. The trust level I have for this stick is phenomenal lol. On the days I donu2019t know what cheek product to wear and donu2019t wanna fuss, I turn to this one. It just glides on the cheek effortlessly & it blends so seamlessly. & It doesnu2019t cling onto any weird dry patches of mine. Nor does it lift my foundation underneath. If youu2019re on the market for cream blush and has never used any before, this is very beginner-friendly!  ps- The shade In The Nude is the perfect everyday shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Glides on effortlessly like a balm and isn't overly sticky. Blends very well with fingers or the brush on the opposite side. It does need to be reapplied throughout the day so dropped a star for that; however, it comes in the sweetest packaging that includes a mirror so yo could tote the  tin with you if you really wanted. Love that the sweet peach peony is the perfect mix of pink and peach to give a really natural looking glow.

reviews.review_title: Best  blush..and this is coming from an oily gal
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The best blush hands down! I am an oily girl saying this as well! I tend to stick to powder blushes but I wear this over my foundation/powder using a brush and it looks amazing! very natural. You can even go heavy handed and it looks amazing. Nudestix should never discontinue their line because I have 5 of these colors and it looks and feels great. The brush on the bottom is useless since it is very stiff, so please beware of that. I do not like dragging the face and I apply using my own brush that I pack with product and apply. If you are running tight on cash I suggest getting a versatile all around color such as sunset strip which is a good staple coral. Truthfully, all the colors would look perfect. I have tried many brands and nothing compares to nudestix when it comes to this formula. I swatched a MILK brand blush and the formula looked like runny vaseline with a hint of color. Nudestix all the way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is great. Easy to blend, long staying power. And if you already know you love this formula, this colour is the perfect u201cI spent time outside in the sunu201d shade. Especially on olive skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: In The Nude - neutral nude- blush

reviews.review_text: Best nude/peach/coral cream blush. Does not get oily or split in the summer. Adds an amazing glow and life to the skin. Would highly recommend!!

reviews.review_title: Great product but hard to apply
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like the color and texture a lot, but it is a little bit hard to apply to lips because the stick is chubby.
