Super blendable and easy to use, it lasts all day on my oily skin, and love the stick form BUT the product got stuck  on the cap and pulled everything out...my last resort is to use a stick to pick at it but then thatu2019ll ruin the shape...other than that, Iu2019d buy more colors if I donu2019t run into that problem again...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVe it for summer! this brand has amazing products

reviews.review_title: not the best multi use shade
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this shade as Iu2019m always in the search for a great sparkly crimson. I was intrigued by the triple use (eyes, lips, face), but find itu2019s only ideal on my lips. On my eyes, I use it as a base for powder shadows as the shimmer doesnu2019t translate as well as it does on my lips. On my cheeks, it looks very darku2014almost brownish black. Not opaque enough for a bronzer and a bit too muddy for a blush color. Overall, feeling disappointed that I paid $34 for a glorified lip gloss.

reviews.review_title: Pretty, subtle color for fair skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fair skin, and this product gives a great, subtle sun-kissed look that is not as dramatic as a bronzer. I use it on my cheeks and top of my forehead. Blends really nicely with the included brush. I have been looking for YEARS for a stick blush to replace a favorite from Clinique that was discontinued - this is it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the color- a soft peachy nude which glides on easily. Didnu2019t love the brush on the other side thus 4 stars and a bit pricey but I would absolutely buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great product. It comes in a tin with a mirror. There is a soft brush for blending on the bottom that is built in. The stick itself glides very nicely on cheeks and eyelids, and the color is very natural. Not for those looking for a heavy makeup look, but more of a sun kissed one.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Sunset Strip - soft coral nude- bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a wonderful cream blush. You can really customize the payoff and thereu2019s a wide range of colors. The reason I knocked a star off, and ultimately returned it, is because the packaging is awful. The brush on the end is pointless, the metal tin is wasteful, and the caps on the blushes donu2019t stay on. Iu2019ve owned about three of these and all the caps either have a gap underneath or they wonu2019t close completely. Itu2019s a hazard to a makeup bag or purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This has to be my favourite blush! Stays on forever plus this colour is just amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade is lovely, but doesnu2019t even stay on the skin for an hour, which is so disappointing. Also, the brush takes off most of the product instead of blending it. Wonu2019t be purchasing again.

reviews.review_title: Great product. I like it a lot after all.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I own all shades except Bondi bae. Also recently purchased new 5 shades from Nudestix website. The formula is good and it lasts about 5 hours. I found it gets a little oily over time on my DRY skin. People say they are perfect because of its cream formula. But I find it's best in winter. Otherwise, it gets oily. I don't use for lips. It's not the right formula to wear as lipstics. To be honest, many of these colors look the same once applied on the face (including Bloom Blushes line). I don't know why I keep buying. haha. They finally released new shades and they all look different from existed products. THANK GOD. They finally made some changes! Otherwise, great products.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So smooth, great color. The brush works well but prefer to use my fingers to blend it in as it looks more natural.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: In The Nude - neutral nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great cream blush! Can be built up quite a bit and still look natural. The color lasts all day as well. It comes with the little brush on the other end, but I prefer using my fingertips so that it blends more seamlessly. The color In The Nude works with most looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colour. Blends really nicely and you can build the colour depth. Love it

reviews.review_title: A so-so product... Sort of tacky finish
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So I'm a 40 something stay at home mom trying to put a little fun back in my life.  The color is rather peachy and looks orange when first applied. I think it layers well and you need to do this do get much colour. It's sticky when applied and can be difficult to blend. I use it over my moisturizer so I couldn't say how it would behaive over concealer and a foundation but I can imagine this wouldn't be a fun product. I find that even after a few, three, hours I can still feel it's sticky tacky presence on my cheeks. Not a fan. Powder blushes wear off enough in the days of mask wearing and I was hoping for a color that would melt into the skin a bit more to avoid mask transfer.  I've tried this on my lips just to see and it isn't an opaque coverage. It's smooth, not tacky but not enjoyable either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m 44 and was finding that powder blushes were accentuating little lines. Iu2019m colour 6 in CT light wonder foundation - and this colour of peach is absolutely perfect. Just the right amount of bright colour - not garish or over the top. It adds a flush of peachy brightness, with healthy dewy shine that does not accentuate lines. It does not completely dry down, but isnu2019t overly sticky. I find it applies best by swiping on to my face or tips of fingers and tapping in. Layers well over the meeting line with bronzer. Also applies well with flat diffusing brush. Very pleased with this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly do recommend this product,I use it as a blush and also on my lips.I personally love the one I chose bare back-cool nude color,but all of them looked pretty in the store.10/10,but it!
La brosse nu2019est pas assez souple du tout a mon gout se qui fait que la matiere est difficilement esstompable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Extremely creamy and long-lasting. I mostly use it on my cheeks, not on lips nor eyelids.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love these things! Bare Back is my favorite for every day mom life. I put on a barely there foundation with spf, then this on my eyes, lips and cheeks, and finally mascara. This stuff gives you the perfect pop of color to make you look awake and refreshed and is so easy! The eyes do tend to wear off after a few hours but it is so easy to reapply that it doesn't bother me. These are what lazy makeup dreams are made of!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Not really good as I thought not really pigment also when you apply ur foundation is removed I thought

reviews.review_title: Low maintenance + travel friendly + great color

reviews.review_text: I switch between Bare Back and Tarte Amazonian clay blush in Paaarty (lol the names), both have a similar color on my skin (I am fair olive) but I love Bare Back for when I'm rushed or traveling light

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was an impulse buy when it was on sale. I usually use hourglass blush, which is beautiful, but Iu2019ve been wanting to try a cream blush. The rare liquid blush was too much color for me so thought Iu2019d give this a try. It is so easy to useu2014 dab on and then blend with the brush or your fingers. It takes about two seconds. And the color is so natural looking. It gives that healthy, sun-kissed flush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bare back is the perfect shade for pale skin. Took me a while to finally purchase because the swatches are a bit misleading. But when itu2019s actually on the skin itu2019s a perfect subtle pink. I love it! I also have Bondi Bae and Hey Honey and they are all perfect. Amazing products that are easy to use, and donu2019t break me out. Solid 5/5

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Like the color and itu2019s easy to blend but after 5 min I donu2019t see any color. The blush fades away too fast.

reviews.review_text: love it  perfect colour   great for blush  stays on all day

reviews.review_shade_purchased: In The Nude - neutral nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love it! I have oily skin and most cream blushes didn't last. This lasts me all day even with the mask on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE everything about this product. Itu2019s easy to use, colors are beautiful, and it lasts long on my face. I got the in the nude shade and itu2019s a definitely a nude but it still has a red-ish undertone so it comes out beautifully as a blush. I used it as a blush and eye shadow and just looove how it makes the perfect monochrome look. Itu2019s a cream but it dries matte without looking too dry. I loved it so much that I picked up the sunset strip shade just after a couple weeks! The sunset strip is more on the red peachy side but not super bright. Iu2019ll be using it for my every day spring look so itu2019s still a pop of color without being too overwhelming. Overall so in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately the colour swatched on the darker model isn't accurate. This blush colour leans closer to a pink shade on medium dark and dark skin. I wish they would swatch colours on the models cheek.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Sunset Strip - soft coral nude- bronzer

reviews.review_text: Wow love this! Blends so easily and sinks in the skin! Sunset strip shade is gorgeously glowy and bright!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very pigmented & natural! Great for everyday looks!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my all time fav cream blush. The color the consistency, EVERYTHING! I got a Tavel size and used it up and bought the full size. Gives me u201cjust got back from vacation in the sunu201d look. Will be a staple forever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this online and was shocked when I saw just how tiny this was when I received it. (Same length as a MINI Nars concealer) I saw that it was .25 ounces but I still expected it to be at least enough to make it worth $34. Itu2019s not. The formula is ok, the color is definitely good (there is a little sparkle in it) but like many others said, the product broke right out of the container so when I opened the cap the whole blush fell right out. The formula isnu2019t good enough to make up for how cheap everything else is. A better cream blush option for this color I would say is the Flower Beauty blush bomb in Pinched.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Not bad especially if you are in a rush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect dusty rose shade. So easy to apply and blend and itu2019s buildable!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The dewy formula feels way too tacky/sticky on the skin and never sets. I understand that dewy is in the name, but there has to be a better way to achieve that effect without the tackiness. Because of the sticky formula, it likes to skip and does not blend easily. I tried so bad to like this because I generally love Nudestix products, but Bloom All Over Dewy Color was a flop for me and I had to toss it out after a year of trying to make it work.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this blush around a year ago and have really enjoyed it. I am super fair with very pink undertones and the color bare back really works for me and looks like a really natural blush tone on me. I think applying this with your fingers is the best way to go since the product works best when its warmed up with your body heat. I think the brush attachment is a little useless and just soaks up the product. I've been using this almost every day for more than a year and I still have lots of product left, so you definitely get your money's worth.   If you're wanting to buy this, I'd just keep in mind that its more of a stiff / less emollient formula, and if you don't like that in a cream blush, you probably won't enjoy this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: if you haven't been wearing as much makeup lately because #lockdownlife but you want something to elevate your quarantine look this is ITTTT.  So easily blendable and buildable on top of a light layer of moisturizer or tinted moisturizer... Not crazy about the brush? I used my own so NBD

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The perfect peach cream blush! Equivalent to MACu2019s peaches for reference. Itu2019s so easy to blend and very buildable. This colour is perfect for a perfectly flushed cheek! One of my favourite blush products!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have one in this color plus 2 others- one matte and another dewy. These are easy to apply, fun colors, and VERY long lasting. The color legit stays on all day. While the brush on the one end isnu2019t the greatest, itu2019s honestly really useful to have if you donu2019t have a separate brush handy or if you want to take it with you on the go/travel with it. So I appreciate the brush being there. I do not use this on my lips, I think itu2019s gross to put something on your lips that have also been on other parts of your face, but I do use it on both my eyelids and cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would not recommend this product for those who have pores around their cheek area, or those who wish to hide texture. I have the shade Sweet Peach Peony, and this blush has a balm like texture that is quite sticky upon application. This tackiness stays throughout the day and makes a cheek area look kind of oily through out the day. As a dry skinned gal, I usually don't have this problem, but this product emphasized my pores and left an oily texture that was just too much to wear. I also have a medium-tan skintone and this blush barely showed up on my cheeks.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Sunset Strip - soft coral nude- bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE nudestix!!!!! Everything Iu2019ve tried Iu2019ve loved! They blend out great and LAST!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: a cute and flirty colour for the cheeks to give them an extra little pop. I find that itu2019s easier/better when I apply it on a brush and apply it to my cheeks, it evens out the product and makes it less look less u201cclownishu201d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i looooove the nudestix nudies! if i could, i would have the entire collection. I own bare back, salty sirens, bondi bae and hey honey (the highlight). It last so long on my skin, this is easy to blend, i just love them so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice and soft color. Lovely glow on the cheeks. Itu2019s not too gluey. Blends well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought the bare back blush a couple months ago and I absolutely love it! It is just a tad too dark for my pale skin, but it lasts all day and I am able to blend it out. It also lightens up when used with translucent powder. I totally love this blush! I canu2019t wait to try some other products by Nudestix.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this during the Fall sale and I do like it. But I think it is overpriced. I like the product and the brush is fine but seems unnecessary. The color is good on my very fair skin and it doesnu2019t emphasize my dry texture. But I also have some dupes for this in my collection and I just donu2019t think this is worth the full price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: meh - too little pigment for such a heavy texture - not a fan - gave product away

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tiger Lily Queen is a natural dewy blush that blends beautifully with a stippling brush. I find that it wasnu2019t as sticky and balmy as the other color I own which is sweet peach peony and dried down immediately upon application. The only thing I donu2019t like is the color. On my skin it reads rosacea red, even with a light hand and buffing. The color just isnu2019t flattering on my peach undertone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This blush adds a natural, dewy flush just like advertised. It can be as sheer or as bold as you want depending on your application. I tend to like a heavier blush so I stipple the blush on with a brush. I just donu2019t like the balmy texture of this product on my face because for the first 20 minutes it feels sticky and like my makeup is going to slide off (it doesnu2019t), but I donu2019t like that feeling. However, the balmy texture is also the reason why it absolutely melts into the skin forming itu2019s skin-like appearance. I also find that unlike the other cream blush formulas it only plays well with other dewy formulas. I have oily skin so this is going to be a winter only blush since my skin is more dry and I donu2019t wear matte products. The summer heat and my oily skin will probably break the blush down to quickly, but I will see. The color is a soft, warm peach. Online swatches made it look like it had some pink undertones as well, but those didnu2019t come through due to my peach undertones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Fabulous product. Just Dewey enough. The colour saturation is subtle and natural. This is my first blush product in a long time and Iu2019m very pleased with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Oh yes!!! This is one of the best cream blushes I have ever used. It has pigment, blends so well and lasts. I have tried almost every brand and type of cream blush there is. This is a star imo. I actually love the brush too. I put a swipe on each cheek and then blend with the brush and itu2019s perfect. I use a small shader brush to pick up some and applied to my eyes and itu2019s the nicest and easiest monochromatic look. I wish they had more pink and/or mauve colors though. Going to try the dewey version as well.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Nude Peach - soft peachy coral u2013 blush

reviews.review_text: I love this one. It wasnu2019t Orange like some peachy things end up being. It went on smooth and lasted all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Was supposed to receive product complimentary of influenster

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Nude Peach - soft peachy coral u2013 blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Sunset Strip - soft coral nude- bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The issues: packaging, price, amount of product. Packaging: I know you can send the tins back to nudestix...but I paid a premium price that included a tin I don't need, and every product comes with one. The brush is also dense and ineffective. Again, I paid a premium for it--my fingers work well, ditch the brush & tin and save us some money.  Price: this is a prestige brand with prestige pricing. The product itself is beautiful and would probably last a few months with daily use, I'm sure lab costs factor into the price. That being said, the exterior packaging & brush are unnecessary. I don't even think these products need a unicarton. Just wrap them, get rid of the brush, and drop the price a couple of dollars or give consumers a lot more product.   The amount of product in every single item listed is kind of a joke compared to other brands in this price range. Food for thought.   Pretty blush, good formula, packaging makes it feel like a rip off.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Nude Peach - soft peachy coral u2013 blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it! It looks great on and itu2019s easy to apply! Would totally recommend.

reviews.review_text: I really like this blush. It's pigmented and very easy to blend. I would predict the pigment would be excellent for deeper skin tones as well. It is also pretty as an eyeshadow. I would recommend this product. I did receive this product for free for reviewing purposes.

reviews.review_text: The Nudies Matte formula is one of my favorite cream blush formulas! Iu2019ve purchased nearly every shade, but Nude Peach is my go-to summer hue. It gives the prettiest peachy coral wash of color to your cheeks without ever being cakey. You can apply a sheer wash of color or easily layer it on for higher intensity. The formula is so creamy and blends seamlessly to a velvety matte finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in my VoxBox and gave it a super side eye because all in one products never work. I was way wrong! This product is super pigmented and is perfect for an all in one and done face. I love that I can use it on eyes, cheeks AND lips and create a gorgeous and functional u201cno makeupu201d makeup look. I also love that I can toss it in my purse and use it to jazz up my face in a pinch. Would definitely purchase again, and have already got another color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. Nice texture and smell. I use it all over my face, for cheeks and lips and even eye makeup. Moreover, the brush is extremely useful and makes your life a lot easier! I would definitely recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this color! The brush is okay. I don't really use the brush unless I'm traveling, but I normally just blend it in with a beauty blender. Great color and lasts quite a while. Love it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Nude Peach - soft peachy coral u2013 blush
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t use stick blushes, but I was pleasantly surprised when I tried this! The color is really great and reminds me of the NARS orgasm blush (I have very fair skin). It is easy to blend and has a slight shimmer. I only gave it 4 stars because I tried it on my lips and you couldnu2019t see the color and it was very drying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This is a holy grail product for me! The color is such a flattering shade and it doesn't make you look like you have blush on  it gives you more of a tint from within. The packaging is sleek and the little brush on the end is so convenient, and easy to twist off to wash. I am definitely going to be purchasing this again when mine runs out, could be soon as I use it for my cheeks and lips!

The brush on the end is too short and stiff but in a pinch or on the go, it may be useful. I got this product for review from Influenster, which is a site that wants HONEST reviews. reviews.review_text: I love cream blush but the formulations are hit or miss. This one is a big hit for me. It's matte without being chalky or difficult to blend. It looks beautiful on the skin over both full coverage and light coverage foundation. It stays put and it's very pigmented. I loved this coral peach color, it gives a natural flush that looks great on my olive skin. I have acne prone skin and had no issues with break outs from this product which is awesome! I received this item free in exchange for review. I can't wait to buy the next shade... currently deciding which one to go for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: I got this product in the shade Nude Peach and it is like a burnt peachy coral color that is very flattering on my light medium skin tone. The shade is pigmented yet it is very easy to blend out the packaging is very well-constructed in that the opposite side of the blush contains a synthetic brush that blends out the product beautifully and you can untwist it so that you can wash and dry the brush. I see this being a staple during the summer and also on days where you don't want to carry or wear a powder blush. This gives a demi natural matte finish to the skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Easy for beginners. More of a natural look!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a cream blush formula that comes with a little brush on the end to blend it out. I would say this is more of a blush to wear on natural makeup days, because when you blend it out it becomes this gorgeous sheer veil of color on the cheeks. You can build it up too which is nice, however I find I would rather just use something more pigmented if Iu2019m desiring a more bold blush. Thatu2019s just personal preference though bc I hate spending time layering when I can use a product that just comes off stronger initially. This is definitely the kind of product you could literally put on without a mirror and it will always blend out softly, and effortlessly. This color is complimentary for me because I tend to lean neutral/golden. If youu2019re more of a rosey undertone Iu2019d suggest getting a color that leans a little more pink VS peach so Iu2019d keep that in mind. Additionally, I tried layering it on top of powder/underneath and didnu2019t notice a major difference so you can for sure use it under or over makeup. So taking all of that into account I think this will be a go-to for that u201cI just have to run to target real quicku201d type of makeup look! Quick. Easy for beginners. Effortless. Hard to mess up!

reviews.review_text: The best blush I've used so far. Easy application. Looks natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade is a little more orange than I expected - to me more like a muted coral.  To me the orange-ness of it makes it less neutral.  It goes on easily and stays.  I think it actually looks better on the lips than the cheeks.  It stays on til I take it off.  I hope to see all the shades in person some day.  I'm looking for replacements for Bobbi Brown cream blush - her site is down to 3 shades and mine are old.  I was hoping this In the Nude would be a good replacement for BB's Uber Beige.  The little metal case is a nifty little extra to have.  It goes on easily and the brush is a nice touch and keeps one from having to get it on fingers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted to apply this directly on my face like a crayon but it pills whatever is underneath. It pills my moisturizer or sunscreen and lifts/drags foundation. I have to use my finger to get some product then dab it on my cheeks. It does give a nice, sheer glow and I like how compact it is not having to bring a blush brush when I travel.   I tried wear this on my lips and it was horrible. I donu2019t care how nudestix wants to advertise this, the formula is not meant for lips. Itu2019s too heavy and waxy almost.   Also a warning that you get a lot less product than you would think from looking at the packaging. I donu2019t think I would ever purchase this at this price point again.   I do like the colour though it may be too light for anyone who is medium-tan or darker.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is a very flattering colour for medium skin tones and I like the packaging that comes with a brush side, however I do find that the blush works better when i am not wearing foundation underneath. For me it works better for my no makeup, makeup looks when I'm not wearing a full face and don't have foundation on, when i use it with foundation it can be hard to blend in

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Pros - you are definitely getting a very dewy colour with this formula, more so then the majority of cream blushes I've tried and liked (milk makeup sticks, glossier cloud, NARS). It is much dewier then the cream bronzers from this line. Cons - colour doesn't tend to last long although I do not set it with powder. The stick also picks up dust/lint etc quite quickly because the formula is so wet, and like most cream products does not last as long as its powder conterparts. I prefer the milk makeup cream blush sticks for better longevity.  Pro tips - the box doubles nicely as a bobby pin etc holder. The brush attached can be unscrewed from the base, which makes this product much more compact and sleek.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this color in general but it is phenomenal on the lips!!!!!!!! Esp for people that shy away from very pigmented reds

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Honestly great but I did not choose the right shade for me.  I received this product through Influenster for testing for free! I have olive skin and I am slightly fair for being a brown girl  but the shade that I chose was too light for me and looked more like a blush then a bronzer but the brush and the formula were great really easy to blend and stayed on for a long day

reviews.review_shade_purchased: In The Nude - neutral nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product and wear it daily. Itu2019s definitely my go to blush. Just be aware it is cream and doesnu2019t last as long as powder does. I had my original one for just about a year and noticed a very foul smell (despite cleaning the brush end). I had to throw it out and buy another one, which is a shame because I still had quite a bit of product left in the first.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the product, missing the samples again 5 Stars for Nudestix, 1 star for Sephora

reviews.review_title: Very pretty colour, kinda hard to blend when cold
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the colour! But itu2019s a bit hard to blend out! I think I just need to find a good way to warm it up, but other than that itu2019s amazing !!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this cream blush on March 15th and I've probabably worn it 10 times. While I love the look, the product stuck in the lid which makes applications a pain. Unfortunately with Sephora's exchange policy I'm stuck trying to dig out a brand new blush. It does blend well and look cute on though...

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Sunset Strip - soft coral nude- bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wanted to love this, but couldnu2019t! It was a splurge purchase, but when I received it the packaging seemed cheap and not durable. The color is really pretty and the texture is buttery, but the product doesnu2019t sweep on evenly. The brush picks up most of the product if you use it to blend and leaves behind a slightly different color on the skin. I would recommend Glossieru2019s cloud paint as a cheaper, more effective substitute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have this blush in sweet peach peony and cherry blossom babe. I can honestly say that it is the BEST cream blush I have ever used (which is why I went back for another shade). I personally like to apply with a stippling brush as I donu2019t like the brush that is attached to this- you could easily use your fingers to blend out however.  Colour payoff is really good - and it is buildable and easy to blend. Even if I over do it itu2019s really easy to go back in with the brush I used for my concealer to soften it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So easy to blend with fingers or a blush brush and gives the most natural looking flush. Great for a dewy summer makeup look! The shade I got was Cherry Blossom Babe.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great cream blush sets beautiful and looks so natural !! Really would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Donu2019t believe the hype that this one product u201cdoes it allu201d. The cream blush is meh, and colour doesnu2019t spread easily and then applying to the lips? Looks awful,. It comes off like a pastel crayon, the texture and colour when applied look so cheap.

reviews.review_title: beautiful neutral tone, easy to blend
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love the shade Bare Back. Been looking for this tone in a cream blush forever. It really is a cool nude, leaning more neutral than anything I would say, but a TRUE neutral...no orange tones here whatsoever. Looks so natural on my very fair neutral skin tone. Itu2019s very easy to apply, very blendable and lasts all day. The brush end is kind of useless to me but thatu2019s my only con. I would much rather this be more affordable without the extra gimmick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have purchased over 5 of these blushes and they're always fantastic. Last all day, buildable, flattering shade range. 'In the Nude' in particular can be built up to look like a rosy (fake) sunburn. I'm obsessed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So good! Super easy to apply and work with. Blends well with my skin tone which is fair. Gives a natural looking result. Also works great on eyes and lips as well if you are in a rush and want a monochromatic look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this colour, and I love that Nudestix all over sticks can be used on your lips as well - I like to be matchy-matchy. The colour does fade pretty quickly, as I have been finding with all my newest Nudestix purchases - not sure if they changed their formula or if the time of year just makes my skin super absorbent or something? I'm not sure I would buy again, just because of how quickly this product fades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Smooth application and very versatile. Love how creamy it is blends really nicely onto cheeks and eyes! Lots of great colours to choose from would definitely buy another.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: In The Nude - neutral nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the colour, however I have fair skin so i find it is more flattering when my skin is more tan (thank god for self tanner drops!) Super buildable and I find a little goes along way. They describe the colour as u201cneutral nudeu201d but I find it to be pretty peachy (like a bronzer peach??) It also wipes off pretty easily, but at least itu2019s easy to reapply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really good dewy cream blush for anyone who wants that glow from within look. works really well with my dry skin. The only downside that it isn't long-lasting but I still love the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: nice fresh color. like the brush applicator at the back. looks great on lips and cheeks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is really sticky and waxy feeling. Itu2019s hard to spread out and blend in as a blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: stunning colour, bright yet subtle. this formula blurs my pores and lasts long!
absolute fav, blends easy, dewy, very nice but it doesnu2019t last that long.  i wear my makeup for helllaaaa long so maybe iu2019m asking too much but i donu2019t know.

reviews.review_title: Stunning color on my light skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My dry skin loves the formula!  Does not go on patchy or thick. Perfect for days when you want a little color on your cheeks for a no makeup look. Build able to whatever look you want.

reviews.review_title: Great product, but not a lot of it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: A brand I have been eagerly waiting to try, but was disappointed at the tiny size when it arrived in the mail today. Beautiful colour and I like the product, but I believe potential first time buyers should be aware of how little product you receive for the cost. Ive watched plenty of YouTube videos and thought this product was bigger, I wish I had realized how small 25oz is before purchasing. I would still recommend but just know the amount of product you end up receiving.   See photo, it is about the same size as my thumb nail. To compare, it is essentially the same size as the Milk Makeup MINI lip and cheek product (only .04oz less) which costs $20.
This is the worst product I have ever used, cheap component and poor pigmentation. Save your coin and buy something better

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got this during the sale as Iu2019ve been on a peachy/orange kick lately, and was also missing cream blushes. Used this a couple of times so far: first time I bounced a wet beauty blender sponge onto the stick several times before bouncing it on my cheeks. Looked good, very subtle color on my fair to light skin and dewy, but I also layered it with another peachy blush to bring out the color more - was very nice. But my subsequent tries with either sponge, applying straight from stick to cheeks, or with fingers, I had trouble with my foundation being disturbed underneath. Plus couldnu2019t get color to be more vibrant as I wanted without fading my foundation too. Resorted to just using for my lips and have been loving it this way - also been searching for a fresh peachy color for lips. This is kind of pricey to just use for lips, but donu2019t wanna waste and like the color better there. As others have said, it is pretty tacky. Maybe not an issue for some, but I couldnu2019t work with it. But very nice as a lip color!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This performs well for a cream blush, I would recommend allowing it to sit for 30 seconds or so before blending it in or it will be patchy and doesn't stick to the skin well. If you do this it is a good product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am oriental, my CoverFX foundation is G+50 and Honeycomb for Bareminerals. Itu2019s the first time I am trying this product from Nudestix. I was on the hunt for a summer blush that would look natural on me. I could not choose between Sunset Strip and Nude Peach so I bought both of them! I am in love with Nude Peach! It leaves a very natural peachy suntan color that is buildable if I want more intensity. I did not like Sunset Strip as much on me. I had high hopes for it considering how popular it was on YouTube videos. It was more of a reddish-rosy color on me and didnu2019t feel like it was a natural suntan color. It would be a good color to wear for formal events or to wear on a girls night out. As for the formula, this is new for me and I think Iu2019m addicted to cream blushes now! Colors are great, buildable, easy to apply and blend effortlessly! I also love how compact these sticks are! Easy to travel with for reapplication when needed! I will be trying out more products from this brand.

reviews.review_title: Easy to apply and long lasting!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just got this and Sweet Peach in a week ago and love them both. Lots of pigment so a little goes a long way and it lasts all day. Colour was bang on what I saw online too! I am no longer using powder blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Just got this and used it a few times. Always used powder blush in past and this product has convinced me to switch. So easy to apply and lots of pigment so a little goes a long way. Didn't realize it came with the blender brush on one end and used a beauty blender the first few times and still worked great. Would highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I own 4 of these and I love them all! I have oily skin and these donu2019t slide off my face even when I donu2019t set it. Theyu2019re a nice balance of pigmented and blendable. My preferred method of application is rubbing the brush against the product directly and then stamping the brush onto my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've been looking for a cream blush product and I've finally found one I love! The color is perfect, easy to blend (I used a brush) and looks so natural! Buying the full size ASAP!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Super easy to blend so it looks very natural!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the colour but find it too sticky for a blush. Texture is like a thick lip gloss. Looks great on my lips so Iu2019ll keep it but now I have to find a new cream blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great overall, but i was expecting more of a dewy shine, like i got with tiger lily princess.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It's pretty and I can blend it but it is very, very sticky and it stays sticky.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Sunset Strip - soft coral nude- bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Blocked my pores badly and I got black heads on my cheeks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My friend bought this for me as a present and I love it!!  I havenu2019t tried it on my eyes but it is beautiful for lips and cheeks! Absolutely love the tint and texture. Recommend to all of my friends

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely disagree about the stickiness! It just needs to be blended! I recommend using a damp beauty blender as opposed to the brush. A little goes along way and it gives the perfect flush from within glowy look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I so desperately wanted to love this but the texture is awful. It feels like dragging lip gloss across your face. Tugs at the skin and doesnu2019t blend at all. Going back immediately.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really hate the sticky texture. It is so difficult to blend. Colour pay off is very little.  Returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Horrible texture. Feels tacky and sticky. Can't bear it on my face. Returned.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful pigment, perfect coral colour for summer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: New holy grail blush! I usually use powders and gravitate towards mauve-y pinks... but this color, just wow. So complimentary, and stays on after 14+ hours.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the tint of this product, and I love how natural it looks, both on cheeks and eye-lids. However, it seems to wear-off overtime and I end up needing to re-apply. Love the dewy look and love the feel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am absolutely loving this product! It is a great multi taker, I love it on my cheeks, lips and eyes. Would be great for someone that loves to do either mono toned makeup or Minimalist makeup looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I don't normally go for this color or formula, but I'm glad I went for it! This pairs well with a red lip for a monochromatic look. I find that I get the best results if I put some product on the back of my hand and apply it to my cheeks with a brush or sponge because she is PIGMENTED. It dries down to a nice finish, but it isn't the most long wearing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this blush! Gives you an amazing color that looks like you've spent some time in the sun.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: In The Nude - neutral nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Pigments are true to application. Not the biggest fan of the brush, I rather use my finger to blend. Has a nice creamy texture. I still like to put powder blush on top. Interested to see how it holds up to summer heat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Colour is amazing on my tan skin. Doesnu2019t have the greatest lasting power, relative to my mostly Nars powder blushes, but itu2019s great for a fresh and dewy spring look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is fine. I feel like it gives me an amazing dewy flush, but Poppy is definitely not for fair girls like me! And, despite its brightness, it seeps and disappears into my skin quickly. Ugh. This perhaps would look better on medium or deep gals! Not sure what I can do to get it to stay longer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wanting to try this product for a while and once I received it and tested it out I was so happy with it. Great formula and spreads easily. The colour is beautiful and you can't overapply it, also natural-looking. I have light skin with neutral undertones that is prone to dryness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m so happy this was recommended by a Sephora employee when I went in looking for a foundation. I absolutely love this blush! Itu2019s my first foray into a cream blush (vs powder), and I adore the finish and how the colour blends in. The colour is beautiful and natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this color - very peachy/coral but not in a tacky way. Very easy to blend with fingers or a brush and I love how using a blender can diffuse it for a more natural look. The tin it comes in is cute, but I can see why after multiple purchases it can become annoying. Overall an amazing product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product and the color. Iu2019ve used it as blush and as eye shadow for a nice all-over peachy look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed with the buildable color payoff and wearability. I use it mainly as a blush, and it stays dewy and fresh-looking all day, doesn't move around despite being a creamy texture, and looks super natural.

reviews.review_title: NEW STAPLE IN MY MAKEUP ROUTINE!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed! Iu2019ve never been one to use cream blushes or bronzers. But I saw a friend loving this product and had to give it a try. Firstly, I love that this is a multi use product (also not a gimmick I go for but it works here). Itu2019s great as a blush and a lip product. Secondly, the built in buffing brush is good quality and actually works well with the product. It comes with this carrying case that has a good sized mirror in it. I donu2019t use it, but if youu2019re traveling it could be helpful. The product isnu2019t too oily or shiny, it has a dewy/semi matte finish which is more natural. Give it a try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for days when I donu2019t want to wear any makeup, this gives an instant pick me up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: bought this blush on a whim and thought i was going to regret it because its so vivid. The red color is beautiful and flattering its just a beautiful pop of color and is surprisingly universal. whenever i don't know what blush to use i always lean towards this one and it looks gorgeous with everylook. additionally i struggle with acne and the red tone does not draw attention to it! the colour is still visible after powdering which i find an issue w some other cream products. 10/10

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! This is a product I have been using daily whenever I want a cream blush. It is very dewy and having dry skin I do enjoy that.  It blends out easily with fingers or a brush and leaves a healthy pop of colour, pigmented nicely so you donu2019t need a lot. It does remain a bit sticky but I personally donu2019t mind that because I like the u201cdewyu201d look from that. It looks u201cwetu201d almost. Itu2019s not very long lasting, which is fine, and the brush is kind of pointless - it actually gets pretty gross after a while so I donu2019t use the brush. Overall I love this and love that itu2019s a staple in my collection! I can always count on this to make my skin look glowy and healthy even if I am not having a good foundation day.

reviews.review_title: Youtube made me buy this LOL
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So many Youtubers are using this colour (Youtube definitely made me buy this, lol!) But, this colour is just not suitable for asian skin tones, it makes you look liver-failure-yellow. I really like the formula, packaging, and brush, and found the naughty spice colour to be a better fit for my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is probably my favourite find from Sephora, of all time! This colour compliments my face perfectly, it's easy to use, and versatile. A lot of people have said the brush is useless, and the packaging is excessive, but I actually like both. I use the metal containers for on the go jewelry, sewing kit, and a mini first aid kit. And I use the brush to quickly apply eyeshadow all over the lid (I have greasy lids, and don't carry brushes of any kind with me), or to smooth out any harsh lines on my face.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: In The Nude - neutral nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful product! Last through my 12-hour shifts!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loving this one. Bare back is such a perfect neutral pink colour - it's definitely pink, but a little muted and not too aggressive, just looks like a perfect natural flush on my cool toned porcelain skin. The formula is great, I'd recommend swiping a sparse brush lightly into the tube and applying from there (rather than dotting it straight onto the cheeks) for the most blended application. A definite favourite!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this product and the fresh-faced effect it has on skin. It gives a very pretty, natural flushed look. Itu2019s easy to use and blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry flakey skin and have tried other blush sticks before and they all showed my dry skin. But this stuff is amazing and blends into my skin so smoothly. l use my fingers and the brush that came with it and both work great. It gives a nice sun kissed look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The color is a perfect shade on my skin but the texture is tacky and hard to spread out

reviews.review_shade_purchased: In The Nude - neutral nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was exactly what I was looking for. An easy cream blush that just goes with whatever eye look Iu2019m wearing

reviews.review_title: One of my absolute fave products!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have several different shades of this product but this is my fave.  Goes on smoothly no matter where you are applying with no sticky feel.  Easy to blend and this shade adds a perfect flush to lips and cheeks.  So easy and quick.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Sunset Strip - soft coral nude- bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this color, gives a nice sunkissed glow and brightens up your face. Very pigmented so a little goes a long way. Much easier to blend out than the Milk Makeup cream blush. I want to try all the colors!!

reviews.review_title: Great but Prefer the Matte Version
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I will begin by saying I have very oily skin! This Dewy version of the Nudies blush did not fade at all. However, it did remain tacky. I only noticed it after I spoke on the phone and noticed my makeup smeared all over the screen. Overall, I thiink it works just fine on oily skin, but I mush prefer the Matte version since it stays put.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how handy this is. The color is a great natural cheek color and the attached brush is so convenient!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after hearing JuliaAdamsMUA rave about it. She was so right! It adds such a natural glow and radiance like you just ran around the block on a sunny day and you cheeks turned pink. I love how healthy it makes my skin look both with and without foundation. I donu2019t like it as a lip stain for my skin tone but itu2019s amazing on the cheeks. You can also unscrew the brush from the stick and wash it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color and consistency but after receiving my online order and reading the ingredients I am deciding to return the product. It would be nice if the ingredients were listed

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t use foundation and I love using this on my bare face. I really like Nudestixu2019 aesthetic and I especially love this color. It does fade overtime in the way I like. But it doesnu2019t disappear completely so it has great staying power. I do not like the brush, and I think the tins arenu2019t very necessary. I wish they would remove the brush + tin and add more product or just lower the price because I love this formula a lot. By the way, these are matt but not flat matt. It doesnu2019t look dead on your skin, thereu2019s the tiniest shine on it, but it is in no way dewy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product does the job, but it's just ok for me.  I'm not unimpressed, but I'm not impressed either.   It's easy enough to apply, coverage is fine and blendable... but I think there's something about the shape of the product that makes it awkward.   I just wasn't as wowed by it as I was hoping to be.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a pretty colour! It's really natural looking-- but you can build it up -- and it makes my cheeks look slightly dewy with a pop of colour. However, I do think it's a bit overpriced for the amount of product you receive, and I could also do without the brush. A nice tip I learned from my favourite makeup artist is to swipe the colour on your cheek, let it sit there; in the meantime, work on your brows or mascara. After a minute or two, the heat of your skin really helps to make the product even more natural and blendable. I then use my (clean) fingers to evenly spread it around. =)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Been using this for a week now and I just fell in love with this. Blends easily and it lasts all day unlike other cream blushes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great go to blush when I'm running late because I can skip highlight, so juicy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dewy pop of colour that looks so natural. I love the flushed look and this gets me there. Super creamy, super easy to blend and buildable. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I fell in love with this the first time I tried it.  Goes on smooth, easy to blend and looks natural.  Absolutely worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: the shade naughty and spice is a beautiful unique shade. it's a perfect medley of rose and brown, it truly gives you a rosey sun kissed look.  The formula is extremely pigmented so you only need the tiniest bit, but it is very easy to blend out.  overall this is definitely one of my all time favorite blushes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this is my first time using Nudestix and I am very impressed. The color I purchased is Cherry Blossom Babe and it gives me the most gorgeous pink flush on cheeks and lips. I apply it over my foundation without issue. I have also applied it after having powdered my face and it still melts into the skin without disrupting existing makeup. I will defintely be trying these in other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This wasnu2019t as pigmented as I wanted, neutral/yellow skintone neutralized a lot of the color. I have light skin , but had to put on three layers to get it to show up. Faded in an hour; in contrast, honest beauty creme blushes lasts for four and only requires one application. Also, not a fan of the unnecessary tin, and I wouldnu2019t use that brush because thereu2019s no way to properly clean it. It does have a very pretty, dewy sheen though, and comes in gorgeous shades. Will not be repurchasing, but might give the matte version a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: excellent formula, is one of my favorites, leaves a nice skin tone and very naturalu2764ufe0fu2764ufe0fu2764ufe0fu2764ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the colour, it is perfect for me! However, the product melted while sitting in the tube and was really annoying to apply after that.  It was just sitting in the tube in my normal temperature bathroom so Iu2019m not sure why that happened, Iu2019m really sad because this is my favourite shade of blush ever, and Iu2019m going to be returning it.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: In The Nude - neutral nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ju2019ai envie de tous me les procurer. Application facile, effet naturel et bonne mine. Je le porte toujours ! Plus question du2019utiliser mes blush en poudre !

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Sunset Strip - soft coral nude- bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this color! Use it for blush and my lips. LOVE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first NudeStix purchase and I love it. Cherry blossom babe is the perfect cool pink wash of color for my cool undertones. Iu2019ve always been more of a beauty sponge user versus a brush, but lately Iu2019ve gotten into applying my foundation with a dense brush, and I find the best way to blend this blush is to go in with the same brush. The formula is a bit tacky so it can be difficult to blend with a sponge. Iu2019m giving it four stars because I wish it would last a bit longer on the face. I donu2019t find that it moves around. It just disappears eventually.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great for travel. Really pretty colour and easy to apply. I love the slight glow it gives my face. Wish it stayed on a bit longer though

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing! I use this with my Nudestix tinted moisturizer or alone and it is perfect - again you can build on it to have more pink or use a little and blend it out. it is the best blush! i love it because it looks so nice on top of a liquid foundation/tinted moisturizer. it is also great on pale skin! i highly, highly recommend

reviews.review_title: Travel friendly - blush bronzer in one
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my 6th nudie stick.  I love them all but this one is just the perfect everyday natural blush.  I find that I don't need to bronze when I use this color, bare back.  I also use this on my lips.  Lovely for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ...and I am hooked. Bought the blue stick, a mini set of all over colors, the mini lip set, the brush.... want to try the foundation and mascara and an all over matte color. I love the all over colors because I am lazy. I'd rather have an all over, polished look than have to use multiple products and try to guess. Dear NudeStix, I love you. The End.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great daily product. I love that this stick is compact

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Love this. So easy to apply with fingers or a brush. I love taking these traveling and they have the most beautiful color and texture. I love that theyu2019re a multi use product and makes for an amazing monochromatic look on the eyes and lips. Please NudeStix get rid of the tin. Itu2019s such a waste!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush. I'm going to be buying another just in case I run out or it goes off the market. Looooove it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In comparison to Nars the Multiple, I do not like this formula nearly as much. When they say u201cdewyu201d, they mean sticky. While I love the light coral/peach color more than Narsu2019 Orgasm (too light) or Portafino (more pink), the only place this formula feels right is on my lips. On my cheeks and eyelids it feels tacky to the touch. So I guess Nars it is. Too bad, loved the color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! Love this shade! It definitely has a dewy finish, but it does not leave my face feeling sticky or gross. I like to apply it onto a brush and then onto my cheeks. Really nice as a lip colour as well!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This colour is so pretty, it gives such a pretty, feminine flush!! These blushes are so effortless and easy to apply. Lasts all day for me. Can't wait for Nudestix to release more colours!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm  in my late 50's and just wanted a nice natural buildable  blush and I have finally found it. I LOVE THIS BLUSH! I immediately bought another color.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I use this by picking up a little bit with my fingertip and spreading out over my cheeks. The result looks like it is coming from within. The color is too light to apply on my lips, but my lips are also super pigmented to begin with. The color lasts between 6-8 hours, but I do set it with a powder. This is the first time I've ever purchased a product from this line, but I don't think it will be the last. I wish I had purchased the kit for a few dollars more where it includes the same color I bought (naughty n'spice) along with the highlighter, but I think they only sell that online. I did try applying this straight out of the tube directly onto my cheeks but that just resulted in wasted product. You really do need to apply it in light layers and pat more than rub it into the skin so it melts with whatever you have on underneath. The container these comes in is also cute and convenient. There is a magnifying mirror the full length of the lid that you can use when applying on the go which is helpful. When I was testing out shades one of the SAs recommended that I use a brush over the stick, but I find that I don't need one, and again I've never used the brush attached.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are really pretty. The poppy girl shade is a great goes-with everting tone. While they blend well and look nice, there are plenty of cream blushes that are much less expensive when you consider how little is actually in this package. Iu2019ll use it and love it bit probably wonu2019t repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best matte cream blush that I have ever used! I use it every single day. It's really natural looking and easy to blend with the fingers. You will not regret buying it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best matte cream blush that I have ever used! I use it every single day. It's really natural looking and easy to blend with the fingers. You will not regret buying it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Product is great, but packaging is cheap and easily smudges the product into the cap. Because of that, not worth the price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: A beautiful cream blush. Packs a lot of color, so you can keep the color strong or blend it out. Blends out so well. It such a pretty corral color, a nice healthy flush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream blush!! I have always had a hard time finding a blush that doesnu2019t fade, but this stays on my cheeks all day long! Itu2019s a perfect flushed pink shade and just gives you a healthy glow. LOVE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I travel quite often, hence Iu2019m always on the hunt for decent cream blushes so that I donu2019t have to bring all of my brushes with me...especially products that multitask like this one...so that I donu2019t have to bring a bunch of lipsticks and eyeshadows with me too.   Iu2019ve owned the Nudestix eyeshadows for awhile now and really like them (for many of the same travel reasons and the great quality) so I was looking forward to trying this.   And wow, itu2019s even better than I expected! I bought the Sweet Peach Peony shade and it is THEE perfect glowy peachy pink, which Iu2019m always looking for since I found out that my favorite blush is made by a company that is no longer cruelty free. That blush is Nars Orgasm by the way. Itu2019s not shimmery like Orgasm, but it is an absolutely perfect peachy pink. Itu2019s dewy and more natural looking too. Iu2019ve read some reviews that say it lifts foundation, but I donu2019t have this problem, as I donu2019t swipe it across my cheeks or rub it in with my fingers. I dot it on and then stipple it with the brush. I donu2019t know if this method will work for everyone, as it could be that I donu2019t use actual foundation. I use tinted moisturizer with loose powder, but if it doesnu2019t move lighter products like that, I canu2019t imagine this method would move foundation. Looks beautiful as a lipstick too. I canu2019t wait to try more shades!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush melts right into your skin, it even blends over top of foundations also the brush on the bottom is good quality and dense. The tin packaging is also a plus including the mirror!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in a Sephora Play! set. OMG, best surprise ever.  I wouldn't have thought I would be into a stick blush, esp. bright red or coral, but this is gorgeous.  A little on my cheeks is cute - it looks lovely on my lids with no other makeup, and then it's gorgeous as a creamy lipstick/balm.  Took less than a minute to have a whole coordinated look from one little product. Fun!

reviews.review_title: A better version of Milk Lip   Cheek
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: IMHO, this is what Milk Makeup was shooting for with their Lip   Cheek sticks. Except Nudestix actually did it. Where Milku2019s stuff is sticky and feels odd on lips, sinking into every line (not truly a multitasker) u2013 Nudies are nice and matte, blend well (I apply with a damp sponge to cheeks) and can add a nice natural flush of color to lips too (I apply with my finger to lips). And fairly long-wearing. The only drawback is the price for the amount of product in the bulky packaging, hence 1 star docked. So I look for it in sets rather than individually.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Why has no one mentioned this product smells like chemicals?The packaging is also so unnecessary considering the consumer is paying extra for it. Who is really going to be blending a cream blush with that little brush and not her fingers?

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this as an alternative to powder blush, but it didnu2019t live up to the reviews or price for me. I have dry skin and wanted something that wouldnu2019t dry me out and last long on my skin. Neither happened and the color faded after two hours. I bought the NARS liquid blush after I finished this and it has been amazing! If you want to keep reapplying throughout the day, then this would work because the texture was nice and smooth but just not long lasting enough for my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love Nudestix in general and this color is Just gorgeous! Freshens up the face with a beautiful wash of color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like that I can put it on my lips, cheeks and use it as eye shadow

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: It took me a while to figure out how to use this, but Iu2019ve learned that it works best when I use my fingers to warm it up and press it onto the apples of my cheeks. It gives such a gorgeous dewy finish and the peachy color adds warmth to the face. Itu2019s also a great nude lipstick topper. For reference, I am a 2W2 in the Estee Lauder foundation and an NC 30 during the summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The color is very true to what it shows online, but it creases easily and I found that I have to reapply several times throughout the day.
