It has become my backup lip color to keep in my purse for days when I'm not wearing much else on my face but just want a little color on my lips so I don't look like the walking dead. haha!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fine cream blush and the color is pretty. It stays too tacky for my preferences. But there is such little product for how much you pay. It's about the same amount of product as a mini from Milk. They really should reduce waste and make the brush and tin optional, especially since the brush doesn't work well with this blush anyway.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The name has it--dewy and all over color indeed.  I can apply this to the apples of my cheeks for a natural, soft flush, or use it as a sheer, long-lasting lip tint.  I also love the peachy color.  Really a one-stop-shop for a natural, radiant, easy makeup look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: okay okay okay, this looks cute when you first put it on, especially if you do the cheeks, eyes, and lips look. BUT wow it lasts literally less than an hour on my cheeks (with powder settin it). It lasts a little longer on my eyes and even to my surprise- my lips. But I bought this as a blush, so it doesn't work for me for the intended purpose. I do have oilyish skin so yah I don't know. Also the consistency of the product is way different than I thought it would be. This lil ol sticc is thicc, and tugs on my skin when I put it on. Not creamy and smooth, but thick n sticky. I recommend as a lip product, but dats esspensive for just a lip product yikes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this blush. I was hesitant because I like a dewy skin look and debated if Iu2019d like the matte blush but itu2019s absolutely perfect. Such a pretty and wearable colour, and so easy to blend out so it never looks harsh (which a lot of blushes can as my skin is quite pale). Not sure the brush that comes with it is completely necessary as I donu2019t find it that helpful when blending, but the product itself is great. Canu2019t wait to get more shades!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I usually donu2019t care for these combo products because they often have a weird, greasy texture on the lips. This just feels like a lip crayon, though. Itu2019s nice and moist.  I like the Poppy Girl shade; itu2019s a bright coral pink, almost a retro look. I have to be in the right mood to wear it, but itu2019s a fun color.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Gives a nice dewy finish to cheeks without looking phony. Great color. Buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Cherry Blossom Babe - rose flush is the perfect colour for my cheeks and lips.  It is very creamy and goes on quite silky.  I love this product. It also has a brush attached.  What a bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My new obsession!!! Blends seamlessly and is the perfect pop of colour. Also loving the dewy finish it gives.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is everything u want in a cream blush: beautiful shades and color pay off, its creamy as heck so its easy to apply once u warm it and its long lasting too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this cream blush. Itu2019s a vibrant pop of color of you want to be bold, or you can blend it out and have a warm, flushed look. Easy to apply and lasting strength. I look to buy a cooler color next with more pink then coral.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is so fun! Iu2019m gonna be using this product all fall long! I like it better on my lips than on my face. When I did try on my face I felt that it make me look clownish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: gives a very pretty flush of colour on your cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The formula is so creamy. Warmed up with a finger, the color goes on smooth and blends out so well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wanted a stick blush and the associate at sephora recommended this one.   Love the colour, cream to powder finish with a dewy glow  Hate the brush on the end?? better then applied with a stippling brush but even still fades quickly and even when set with powder still slides around.   I kept it because it's the only stick blush I have and it's not terrible but I won't buy it again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this all over color stick. I use it for blush, lips and just anywhere a little color is needed. Easy to apply, mess free and travels well. I use it with the nudestix tinted blur stick for a fresh no makeup look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: With powder or without these blend AND LAST like a literal dream come true! These were recommended by a couple of youtubers I follow but it wasnu2019t until one of them said how well they work on top of powder but still lasted and stayed so pretty and dewy on the cheeks I was sold. I donu2019t even use any of my other blushes anymore. Nudestix PLEASE make more colors because I will buy them ALL!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I shouldn't buy this color. It's too simple. But it's good for dry skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Sunset Strip - soft coral nude- bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. Melts into my skin and wears all day.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Sunset Strip - soft coral nude- bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Looks great on cheeks, eyes, and lips. Great for travel!  Will definitely purchase other shades.  Did not find the brush to be very useful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect for mature skin- blends into your skin seamlessly, leaving a very natural flush. I live gently swiping on my lips for a natural flush. Definitely for a more natural look.

reviews.review_title: Soo AMAZING for summer LOVE it
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product wish I had all the colours. It's so easy to use. I wear it whenever I put on makeup, amazing product so natural

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A really nice product! loved it. Giving this a 4 star because it can make your skin oily! otherwise it gave me a natural blush which i was looking for, i use this on my lips and eye lids sometimes. Perfect to give you a natural looking glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love these blushes! They're very easy to blend and they're not too dry or too dewy, JUST RIGHT! I picked up sweet peach peony online but I wished I had gotten a brighter color instead too as this one is a little bit subtle. I don't really care much about the brush that it comes with as I use my own blush brush for blending. Nonetheless, I'm still keeping it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this for the summer because I love wearing bright corals when I'm tan. This is such a beautiful product that wears wonderfully on the cheeks, lasting well even when I was sweating and wearing a super dewy foundation. I'm going to pick up another shade for when I stop self-tanning, because this formula is absolutely going to replace any other cream or powder blushes I own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush!  It looks so natural, and the color is perfect!  I love that I have a lot of control over how much pigment goes on; I can do a bit of color or something more dramatic very easily.  The brush works well too!  It has become my daily blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a big fan of the matte blushes but this dewy version did not last on my skin.  Melted off after a couple hours vs the matte that lasts all day.  Colour payoff wasnu2019t worth it so I ultimately returned and bought another matte colour

reviews.review_title: Get rid of the brush, add more product.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this blush. It stays on all day, you donu2019t need a lot of it what so ever, beautiful colour, you wonu2019t be disappointed. I took a star away because Nudestix needs to stop with the ridiculous brush at the end! Most use their own brush or fingers, add more product and get rid of the brushes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colour is pretty and lasting powder is pretty good for my combo skin. However, I won't be buying any other Nudestix blushes due to the ingredients they use. They use Paraffin and quite a few other ingredients that definitely could be changed for better and cleaner ones. I'll continue to stick with my cleaner brands.  If ingredients don't bother you then give it a try.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m literally in love!! I use this everyday, super buildable. Doesnu2019t break me out:)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Porcelain skin tone, Dry skin
Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect Blush!  This is honestly the perfect summer blush; it gives a glow like you've spent the past week at the beach!  Plus it looks great on the lips and eye lids for an all over monochromatic look.  Does not disappoint.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: ok so i really wanted to like this, its my second time trying, the colors are so pretty! but i have oily skin and this increased the oil on my face and wish it was a bit easier to apply to the face i feel like it takes off my bb cream as i apply it. It is so so cute and i wish i could use it but not for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I didn't know if I would like this product, but it has really grown on me. you barely have to you use any, and it blends out nicely. I prefer to use it when I'm going for a more natural look with no foundation, as I feel like it does pull at my foundation a bit when I'm trying to blend it. however, on my moisturized skin with just some concealer on it adds a beautiful flush of natural looking colour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Long lasting and dewy look. Coral colour is great for summer. Also great for traveling since brush is included and the product is compact. Only problem is particle stick to it so it becomes a bit unhygienic after a while.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This will be the last nudestix product I will ever buy! I love the shade! But there was a small sharp plastic stuff inside the stick it scratched my cheeks. I sent the photo to nudestix and never heard from them.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! The blush is extremely blendable and smooth and gives you a really nice matte color that honestly lasts all day. The only thing holding me back from 5 stars is that this is not as long lasting or smooth as a lipstick, although it gives a really pretty lip color and is not designed like a matte liquid lip or anything of course.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Sunset Strip - soft coral nude- bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best cream blush ever!! The color is vibrant and creamy! My new go to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really easy to use, travel friendly and lasts all day! I also have this in Sunkissed and Naughty n' Spice. Great colours for caramel skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: In the Nude is such an effortless, easy colour to throw on when I don't want to do a full face of makeup but still want to look put together. Very flattering on my skintone, which is an NC20.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great cheek AND lip colour. I have fair, dry skin and the cherry blossom shade is a great pop of colour. It blends beautifully and lasts all day (on cheeks - less staying power on lips but it feels and wears nicely). Iu2019d definitely give it a shot if youu2019re interested. It is on the smaller side but Iu2019ve been using the product frequently and havenu2019t really made a dent in it. One note: I donu2019t get the brush! I tried it but just use my fingers to blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Sunset strip really just looks like youu2019ve gotten some summer sun. Itu2019s so natural and beautiful on my fair skin and my roommates darker skin. Itu2019s wonderful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lovely finish on cheeks. Very natural result. Good for oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My all time favorite blush. So easy to apply and so gorgeous on the skin. perfect for summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This was my first nudestix product and it wonu2019t be my last. A beautiful natural roses flush, a dream to apply and blend out on the cheeks, lasts through an 8 hour work day and also makes a great lip colour.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: In The Nude - neutral nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this! It looks so natural on my skin and easy to apply.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Sunset Strip - soft coral nude- bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm just not in love with this product- the colour might just be too dark/pigmented for my skin. I find it applies kind of patchy and makes my skin look sort of muddy. I actually really like it as a lip product though- so that's how I've been wearing it.

reviews.review_title: Great for eyes lips, not lasting on cheeks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful color designed, largely marketer as designed by some decently famous makeup artist. Very summery, bright and unlike their usual sticks, a dewy look instead of matte. Love it on lips and eyes, but find it way too sticky and not lasting for cheeks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've tried a number of cream blushes but never liked any of them, mostly because I felt they looked too wet and shiny on my cheek. Not this one. This blends like a dream and has this perfect, natural finish that is just stunning. You can do a no makeup-makeup look with this or build it up for something more special. And this color is so, so beautiful - gives the perfect flush of rose-pink. I'm really fair, but I can see it working on a wide range of skin tones. Nudestix, you hit it out of the ball park with this one. Can't wait to try more colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after I saw a few beauty influencers use it, and I'm obsessed. It's the perfect dewy coral, and you can do a light wash of colour or really build it up. I specifically love it for a glowier look, it adds such a lovely flush. Big fan. I have tried it on my eyes and it looked nice for 4.5 seconds until it creased, though I have heavily hooded eyes so I'm sure that doesn't help.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the bomb dignity! Perfect for those no make up days and just to give a little glow. Love the brush applicator, it makes the blending much easier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Buy this one for when you aren't wearing much makeup and powder.  the matte one when you're going for a full glam beat

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect color but very expensive for the amount of product in the tube. They should look at how much product Milk gives you for your money. Good product but poor value.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019d say this product definitely give a nice flush of red however it doesnu2019t last very last long, probably due to the fact I have oily skin. but I still enjoy using it...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Stunning! Seriously the perfect natural, flushed colour! I don't like to wear bronzer all the time in the summer and this looks great on the skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of cream blushes in general and this is one of my favorites. I donu2019t love it on the lips, but itu2018s beautiful on the cheeks. I like it on the eyes as well for a monochromatic look and can see it working for all seasons. I blend it out with my own brush usually or my fingers and itu2019s super quick and easy. Not sure Iu2019d call it u201cdewyu201d but it does give a nice natural looking glow. I am excited to try some of the other colors as well.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful, pigmented and lasts all day on me.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is gorgeous and lasts all day on me. I wore it days where I was sweating tons and at the end of the day I was still blushed up. Itu2019s a bit finicky in the application as I have to use certain techniques but it always ends up looking great at the end. I have porcelain skin and the pigment can come off a bit strong initially but once everything is on looks beautiful. I would recommend to everyone but I do have normal, sometimes dry skin so cannot speak on the longevity on combo/oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great pigment and application, wears for hours in the day and was my favourite piece of make up to wear in the evenings while on my honeymoon. Great product, easy to use, would purchase this repeatedly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super convenient and clever tool, that has simplified my life, that's why I called it a Game Changer. I love the way the product looks on both my cheeks and lips. On cheeks -- product goes on easily but does not over apply, and is easy to blend out with the brush. I really like the way it lays on my lips too -- reminds me a bit of the Melt lipstick products. It's a soft textured mat application on me.  I also really appreciate the availability of coral and warm tones -- it seems some lip and product lines really tilt to the berry and cool side. I felt that the colors were true to my expectations. The packaging is excellent -- the little tin box that the product comes in, includes a mirror -- very helpful, and the tin keeps the product from getting banged up in your purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The color looks pink on me, in pictures it looks more on orange side. Its sticky, my hair keep sticking on my cheeks, it transfers. I think nudies matte is much better option. Its like applying a creamy lipstick on your cheeks, sticky, not long lasting, transfers! Picture shows transfer on my white top!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this color (Tiger) and the formula. I have the original formula, which needs warmed up some to apply/ sheer out over the cheeks, and wanted to give this a try. At first I didnu2019t think I wanted this as it seemed really gel-like in finish (kind of gooey and wouldnu2019t dry down) when I applied it in-store using my fingers, but I decided to give it a go and once I got my own I felt the product wasnu2019t as u201cwet/ gooeyu201d and I apply it directly to my face and sheer out with my fingers (much easier and faster than the original). It has a bit more color impact than the regular (but those are all nude shades), and itu2019s way easier to sheer out/ apply. I find the product dries down fine, I like my (curly) hair around my face and I never have it stick when using this product. I will say, like all blushes on me, the color does fade thru-out the day but leaves enough color for dimension.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally gravitate towards peachy blushes but my daughteru2019s name is Poppy so I had to try this and I have to say Iu2019m in love with the colour! The shade is beautiful, not too red. Itu2019s super pretty on the lips too. I donu2019t fine the brush on the end is super helpful, but I just blend with my fingers and itu2019s really nice. Big fan! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the shade in Bare Back, itu2019s the perfect flush colour for my skin tone. The formula is so blendable and has a really nice skin-like finish. The one thing I would hope they would add to the line, is a cooler-toned bronzer. Bondi Bae looks extremely orange on me, as I have very fair skin with blueish undertones. I love the formula, so a more taupe or rose-toned bronzer would be fantastic!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: TEXTURE: very soft and creamy and easy to blend with just the fingers! leaving the perfect amount of pigmentation for the CHEEKS. I like to dab a few small dots or lines on the apples of my cheeks and blend it out. WEAR: it gives a very natural flush and melts into the skin throughout the day, lasts all day (12  hours). INGREDIENTS: relatively short list, Dimethicone, vegan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this product looking for a bright multi-purpose cream product for the summer. Overall, this is exactly what I was looking for. My only complaint is that the brush on the other end is very small, making it difficult to blend out over your cheeks easily. Additionally, when I went to wash the brush for the first time a chunk of bristles (probably ~1/3 of the brush) popped out. It would be simple enough to fix but I was disappointed that the brush couldn't withstand being washed especially given that this isn't a cheap product. All in all, I do love the product itself - especially when blended with a beauty blender - for the summer time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a cream/stick blush and came upon these. The colors (especially tiger lily queen) are just so beautiful. Very easy to apply and blend. Looks amazingly dewy. I do have to admit that it is slightly tacky but it doesnu2019t bother me. The color isnu2019t as long lasting as I would have liked but reapplying does the job. Very much in love with these and definitely a permanent step in my makeup routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have two of these (poppy girl and cherry blossom) and absolutely love both. These are exactly as they say, dewy color. I primarily use these as blush but you can definitely wear these on your lips as well. I apply this directly on the cheeks from the stick and then blend with a beautyblender. These blend out really easy and look so dewy and pretty on the cheeks. I sometimes put a powder blush on top and it looks great as well. I would say these fade after about 4-5 hours so when I put a light powder blush on top it helps the longevity a bit. I am taking a star off for the same reason as the other sticks like this from nudestix, the amount of product you get for the price is a little steep but I'm more okay with it when it comes to a blush because you don't use nearly as much as you do with a bronzer. I also find the brush on the other end is useless, it is too stiff to properly blend and not disturb the other makeup you are wearing. Other than that I love these and will probably buy more and I hope they extend the range in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colour of this is beautiful, and the product is quite pigmented. When you first apply, it can be a little intense if youu2019re new to cream blush. However it naturally soaks into the skin creating a natural, sun-kissed glowy blush. Very healthy looking. You can also detach the little brush (if you want to use that - personally I used another buffing brush) that comes with it for cleaning purposes which I thought was cool. The reason I gave 4 stars instead of 5 is because I find the top of the blush gets a little lint-covered. Every little hair, fuzzy, piece of lint gets stuck to it. I think this is probably common amongst cream products, but it wouldnu2019t deter me from buying another.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I saw this in one of Allana Davisonu2019s YouTube videos on sweat proof summer makeup and I was intrigued. Love the color, such a universal peach/coral for summer. It looks so pretty on cheeks and lips! It was sold out in store so happy I got it online! Iu2019m trying to travel light with makeup this summer and love dual purpose sticks (they are also carry-on safe). I sampled the Milk cheek/lip tints but the color was so sheer and shiny I couldnu2019t imagine wearing that on my oily skin not to mention on darker skin tones those barely show up. Go with the Nudestix! Also such a big fan of their lip pencils, perfect nudes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice creme blush, all really gorgeous colours. Just find it slightly hard to apply, especially if you apply it right on your face (as I did the first time trying) because it picks up your foundation. My preferred method of applying is just getting some on my finger and then dabbing evenly on my face. Blends out really nicely and is really nice for that dewy summer look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The colour Poppy Girl leaves a healthy fresh glowy look to the cheeks. Unlike some other cream blushes, I find this one lasts throughout the day really well. I also don't feel the need for highlighter when wearing this product because it gives a sheen to the cheeks. I prefer to apply and then blend with my fingers, rather than the brush, as it seems the brush sheers it out a bit too much. Will likely check out the other colours too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this stick. It melts on so so so natural. Perhaps it doesnu2019t last that long or I should apply it differently. Love to have all of the colours, but they are a little pricy. I think itu2019s worth trying one; as a blush stick is a great travel concept

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this color. If you are familiar with the Nudestix formula and love it, like me, this color will not disappoint. it is the perfect cherry/coral color that will give you a natural blush from within. Perfect for summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I purchased the shade Cherry Blossom Babe. I would not recommend applying straight onto the face, because it caused my foundation (Estee Lauder Double Wear) to lift. If you blend with your fingers, it can look splochy. The BEST  application Iu2019ve found is running a brush over it and applying it that way. Other than the intended application being less then perfect, it is a beautiful color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in the Tiger Lily Queen and am very impressed. It is extremely pigmented, so you only need a tiny bit (especially for my super fair skin). I use a brush swiped over the product to apply it. I found that, when swiped/dabbed directly onto the skin or even when patted on with fingers, it can lift up the product underneath.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Tiger Lilly is a great color. I find that when I use the attached brush the color dissipates too much. I am going to try other application methods...but overall I like it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Such a great product ! literally so amazing I use it on my lips and cheeks! Such a nice satiny feel. Very buildable but a great amount of pigment

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stuff has serious staying power! I have oily skin and wasn't if this would hold up or if it would skip and slide all over my face. It is super pigmented and by the end of a 11 hour day, I still see the color just as bright as I did in the morning. I have worn it both on top of my foundation as well as under my foundation (the reverse foundation technique - check it out on YouTube if you haven't seen it yet) and both ways it has looked incredible and lasted. I just purchased it in another color because I cannot get enough of it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect cream lip   cheek product. Usually these products only work well on EITHER the lips OR the cheeks. But this creamy formula has both the pigmentation and staying power to stay dewy on the cheeks and last on the lips without looking crusty. This is one of my staples for a fresh, juicy face.  Will probably purchase the other colors.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Sunset Strip - soft coral nude- bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am in love with this!!! it blends out super easy and it makes me look like I have been sun bathing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are hands down the best cream blushes I have ever used. I also prefer the look over my powder blushes. They are so beautiful and glowy, and they are definitely are much more dewy than the original cheek stix! They apply well over or under foundation/powder. I like to apply after my foundation but before I set with a light powder. The powder holds them in place so they last all day, and they are so dewy that you still get that beautiful glow either way. They wear perfectly for 8  hours on me.   If you have dry skin or just love a glossy cheek, you need these!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great if you want a long lasting blush that shows up great too. It is super easy to build up on cheeks. I don't prefer putting it directly from the stick onto my face, although it still works fine. I prefer picking it up on a brush or putting some on the back of my hand and apply with my fingers. It works well over powder too and doesn't ever look cakey. The price point is a bit high, because I could use a pinky cream lipstick to do the same thing, but if it was cheaper I would pick up every shade. Overall been obsessed with this product and have used it for every makeup look since picking it up. Makes me glow and look like I have glass skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: In The Nude - neutral nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I prefer cream blushes and this one had a decent consistency and full-color finish, although it was a bit thick for me and just couldn't find a good match in the shade range (the nude one was too deep, pink was too pink, etc). An added note is the product stuck to the cap and broke off completely, so be careful. The blending brush on the end is a nice bonus though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this fresh color and the brush on the other end to help with application. Favorite blush Iu2019ve gotten. (Color is Poppy Girl)

reviews.review_title: for the person who wants easy, natural and pretty
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: perfect colour for the coolish skin ladies. i dont use the brushes it comes with i like fingers or a fuller brush. i now only travel with 5 things and this is one of them. LOVE

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product. I use it every single day and it has replaced every other blush I own! I was scared the color would be too dark for my complexion, but itu2019s the perfect color making it look like youu2019re slightly sunburnt if you like that look. Itu2019s very natural and blends in seamlessly, just apply it to your finger first or youu2019ll end up with too much product. You need the slightest amount so I believe this product will last a long time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! After hearing and reading so many positive reviews I decided to give it a try and it is by far my favourite blush. It goes on so smoothly and is totally buildable. Once it's on it stays put and looks gorgeous all day! I would recommend it for anyone looking to try a cream blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not my favourite I was quite disappointed actually. For one the colour does not stay on for very long also after two days the product fell out of the tube. I was able to put it back in but let's just say I won't be repurchasing. I will stick with powder blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love most of Nudestixu2019 lineup but this is one of my faves.  I donu2019t really like wearing a lot of makeup when I have a tan so I usually reach for this instead for my eyes, cheeks and lips!  Super easy and travels well so you can touch up!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice! It does what you want it to do: extremely natural flush, endurance through the day and naps, dewy colour, easy blend and application, clean no break outs.  My first time trying a cream blush after having some hive troubles with liquid blush, this does not disappoint!!! Only concern initially might be the price for the amount, I am using this everyday and I am afraid I might get through it pretty fast. I don't think so! Maybe 2 or 3 times repurchase a year because you only need to tap the stix and the pigment just drenches the skin.   (I will update on the lasting length). Recommended by GinsMakeup (ytube).

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These Nudestix products are AMAZING!  I have a few of their nudies and lipsticks and absolutely love them!  Highly recommend, you won't be disappointed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this blush!!  It is such a vibrant and happy shade, and just perfect for the summer months.  The color does look a bit intense in the tube, but it blends out beautifully on the skin.  I like to swipe it a few times on the back of my hand, and then go in with a stipple brush to apply it on my face.  I find that swiping it directly onto the face is a bit too much color.  It's dewy, long-lasting, and gives my face a very youthful pop of color.  I think Mary Phillips did an amazing job on this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely beautiful, a sheer wash of color. Perfect for summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These are a beautiful constancy, I use the bareback for a blush, and the Bondi Bae as a bit of a bronzer. They are creamy and blend out beautifully leaving you look naturally blushed and sun kissed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Grey eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought all four of these and I love them all. My fave is poppy girl. I am fair skinned but I like a little bit of a brighter blush. The soft dewy look this gives is amazing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first Nudestix product and I can already tell that this is the beginning of a lifelong infatuation. I have such sensitive skin and this product almost soothes my skin while giving me the most gorgeous flush. I love to wear it on my eyes, cheeks, and lips at the same time for a gorgeous monochromatic look. It does crease a little on the eyes if itu2019s not blended super well, but thatu2019s not out of the ordinary for my hooded eyes. Ordering new colours as I type this. I love it and everyone needs at least one stick.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So versatile! Love that I can use this on eyes, cheeks and lips for an easy monochromatic look. I think this product gives you a really natural flush, great for summer and the colour lasts all day.,

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect if you love the glass-skin look, this product gives the skin a fresh, dewy, and glossy glow without any shimmer or sparkle. This can be applied to look incredibly natural or built up a little for a pop of color, the formula is super easy to work with! This blush has me wanting everything from concealer to lipstick in this dewy formula, itu2019s just so gorgeous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have poppy girl and Tiger Lilly Queen and I LOVE them. They give your cheeks such a beautiful flush of color. Poppy girl gives me the perfect red flush, similar to a sunburnt effect, looks gorgeous on the cheeks. Tiger Lilly Queen is a gorgeous flush of coral on the cheeks, it brightens up the face so much! Definitely thinking of picking up sweet peach peony as well, as I heard it's a toned down version of tiger Lilly.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Not my fav but not bad. I have to use a sponge to apply it or it takes away foundation coverage. The color is a bit deep for me but I use it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this colouring and the fact that itu2019s a multi use product.  I use it on my lips and cheeks (havenu2019t tried it on my eyes yet) and it blends out beautifully with the right amount of brightness.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing creme blush. It blends like a dream, and the brush on it is actually super good at doing that which is a plus. I have oily skin and I donu2019t find this to look shiny or greasy on me, just a natural glow. The color is vibrant, blending it makes it more natural, more would make the color pop, so works out great no matter your preference. This is such a great easy product for summer, thereu2019s nothing bad I could say about it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Didnu2019t show up on my face. Bought this as an addition to my summer routine and figured it would be just the right amount of color for every day. When I received it I immediately tried it on and sadly it added zero color to my face. This is going back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This brand never disappoints me. This cream blush is so gorgeous! Not sticky on, very comfy, feels light, and blends great on top of powder. Even though it does have a dewy effect, it's not overwhelming. There are other cream blushes that are my glossy but I think this adds just the right amount. I highly recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this to try because I love the Nudies Matte and I was interested in owning a brighter shade but this does not blend as well as the matte version. I also didn't love the color on my medium to tan skintone. So I'm returning it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Favorite product ever! Your skin looks so good and you can easily layer it. You can apply it with your fingers, beauty blender, or brush and it will look beautiful either way. It melts into the skin so beautifully.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This stick is the perfect natural blush for my skin tone.  When I looked at it in the tube I was very skeptical because it looked too dusty to be a natural flush but after it warms on my skin, it's absolutely perfect.  I can even wear it alone with no other makeup and it looks great.  The attached brush isn't great - it's pretty stiff but it's convenient for travel and touchups.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful product! I love the nudies mattes and I have dry skin so this was a winner. Very dewy and creamy - definitely feels tacky when you first put it on, not something that may feel comfortable for many but works great for me as I live in a hot environment and dont like powder products melting off. Color pay off is natural and pigmented. Recommend these if ur looking for a natural blush to just throw on especially on a tropical vacation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very beautiful and luminoso product. I bought all four thatu2019s how beautiful. I highly recommend any of these.

reviews.review_buyer_description: brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE the nudies! Probably my most used products. I have three of the matte blushes (Naughty n Spice, In the Nude, and Bare Back) I also have one of the nudies in bloom which I also love. the color looks like part of your skin and easy to take around with me. I prefer to use them for a natural monochromatic look but these can also be built up for drama. These have great wear time as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this, I got the shade cherry blossom babe. Its great especially if you love a more dewy look. if you are familiar with the nudestix highlighter, specifically illuminati, which has a more thick ointment like texture...these blushes are not like that they're a perfect blend of the matte formula and the highlighter formula.

reviews.review_title: Helps create a warm, dewy look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: When I saw Nudestix was releasing these Nudies with a dewy, glossy formula, I knew I would have to try it! I love to create soft, dewy looks and have been impressed and so happy with the results that I can achieve using the Nudies Blooms.  The Sweet Peach Peony shade is a beautiful peachy tone that offers a plump, glossy color to the skin. I especially love this shade for Golden Hour looks since it complements the orange and yellow tones to help acheive a warm vibe.  The Cherry Blossom Babe shade is a lovely pink that blends out to a natural flushed look on my light toned skin. I love to apply this to help my face look vibrant and to add some more dimension to my complextion.  The Nudies Bloom make it easy to add a pretty pop of color to any look from natural to glam.

reviews.review_title: Matte nudies are better, but great lip color!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous bright poppy color, I'd say more of a red coral than an orange one. Definitely very pigmented and even a bit too intense for my pale skin, so I'd go in with a light hand or stipple on with a brush. I have a bunch of the matte blushes from nudestix that I swipe from the apples of my cheeks to the top of my cheekbones for a more contoured blush look, but when I tried the same look with this there was just too much pigment and it was not flattering on me, so I had to blend it out quite a bit. This is actually the first time I've found use for the brushes that come with these, but they're actually quite nice for stippling and blending. These blushes also are noticeably stickier than the matte versions, so they pick up more makeup when you swipe them on directly. I'd say just use these on the apples of your cheeks and apply with a brush if possible, this will give you a very summery dewy cheek look. The one way that this product really hit the mark for me was as a lip color. It is the absolute perfect juicy red coral lip, and with the same color on the cheeks (and eyes if you don't have oily eyelids and can figure out a way to make these set down) it creates a gorgeous monochromatic look that is very in these days. However, I do have to say that the matte nudies are in my opinion just as glowy on the skin when applied with the fingers, and just have a better formula in general that doesn't really remove base product underneath, so I'd opt for those unless one of these shades speaks to you in particular. I've heard the sweet peach peony and cherry blossom shades are similar to shades in the matte line, so I probably won't be buying any more of the dewy colors. This will definitely be a staple summer lip color and I'll keep playing with it as a blush, but beyond the great color I do feel a little let down by this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy using this product. I love everything I've tried from this brand. It has good quality and ingredients.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love that it is creamy and then can be diffused by the brush. Looks more natural that power blush, IMO. I used to use Cloudpaint by Glossier, but I prefer this because I don't have to apply with my fingers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Got the vivid glowing coral, my skin is olive tone. I LOVE the color on my cheeks and on my lips, i only wish it was a lasting product. Did not last for more than 2 hours. Weather wasnu2019t hot and my skin type is combo.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very fresh and dewy for fair skin! The colour is a sheer wash, it look very natural on lips and cheeks. Perfect for fair skin for spring and summer! Does not highlight texture of breakouts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loooove the nudies matte, and when I heard that they were coming out with dewy formula  I was so excited. The collaboration with Mary Phillips was amazing, I totally believe these products are great for makeup beginners because of their easiness to apply, nonetheless I do think this formula is more balmy than the matte, which makes it sometimes feel sticky.

reviews.review_title: Nice sheer glow, but not long wearing at all.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I like this for a natural no makeup look. It doesnt last long and sheers out easily. The attached brush moves my foundation so I use a beauty blender. I think its perfect for a almost no makeup day when u want to add some color. Maybe for the pool or summer day but not out when you need your makeup to last or if you are wearing a med full coverage foundation underneath.

reviews.review_title: Use this! Much younger men will ask you out!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ladies find your shade! You you need to buy this! I stopped into my Copley store and picked this up in Sweet Peach Peony, along with the tinted blur stick in #2 (already own and love). I had just come from a haircut and yoga and only had Revision TruPhysical sunblock on and my brows done. I patted a bit of this on both cheeks... immediately fell in love with the sheer light coral balm and soft shine! So natural! It's too light for my lips, but stunning wash of color on my cheeks. I left and didn't think anything of it, then struck up a conversation with a guy on the T. 20 minutes later, after mentioning he was 25 and asking my age (40 - which I did not mention but told him I was much older than he was), he hands me his card and says, Text me. We should meet up some time. A friend who saw me a little later described my skin as lit from within. Thank you Bloom! My new love from NudeStix!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I watched a review on Youtube for Tiger Lily and thought WOW that looks pretty. I would NEVER pick this bright orange blush ever.  But ... it looked pretty on her, so why not.  Gosh, it is amazing.  So natural looking, easy to apply.  I'm now purchasing other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019re a glossier skin tint kind of person this is a gorgeous addition. Theyu2019re so dewy and glowy, I love cream blushes and havenu2019t tried one like this yet, Iu2019m going to pick up two more colors

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is definitely more dewy than their original formula. I got it because I fell in love with the color poppy girl. Itu2019s such a vibrant coral and it looks great on the cheeks and lips. Love this shade for spring. When I apply it with a brush it sets down to a demi matte finish, but when applied straight to the face it remains dewy

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical but super drawn to this blush. it is gorgeous on the skin, exactly as the description by the brand, of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start by saying I'm a huge Nudestix fan (I own their Sunkissed blush and Hey Honey highlighter). I was excited for the new colors and formula, esp because I'm all about looking dewy. I received the color Sweet Peach Peony as a present, and it is BEAUTIFUL. However, I am NOT a fan of this new formula. I find it way too tacky, difficult to apply, and having ZERO lasting power. While there is a beautiful color selection, i'm overall disappointed in this new launch. I'll stick with their matte blushes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: So easy to use and the color really does give a dewy glow. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: hands down. will forever buy again and again. dewy, not tacky. leaves a beautiful dewy look on your skin. beautiful on 30+

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Opened up the tube all the way to see how much product there was and itu2019s barely any at all. Put it in my cheeks and returned. It stays balmy. Color fades quickly. Itu2019s a nice lip tint... but thatu2019s not why I got it.  I am in love with the Ilia new duo color, so I got two of those and let this go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wowowow this product is everything!! I tried out the matte blush u201csunset stripu201d in store but thought the texture was a bit too sticky to blend out easily. This formula is what I was looking for!! The color is beautiful and really flattering for my yellow light medium skin tone. And itu2019s super easy to blend out and very long-wearing!! I donu2019t wear foundation everyday and this is a perfect no-makeup makeup to add to a quick routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a huge Nudestix fan so naturally I had to pick up all four shades.  I am absolutely in love with these.  They do stay slightly tacky on the face, so if that bothers you, maybe opt for their matte shades instead.  I've had this on for over 12 hours today and it is still going strong.  Still looks dewy, fresh, and true to color.  i'm so happy i picked these up and I cant wait to get more use out of them.

reviews.review_title: My new favorite product to play with!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Naught n' Spice is a PERFECT MLBB (my lips but better) shade for me. I love using this on my lips, cheeks and eyes. This product blends into my skin so beautifully and it really gives the a great u201cno makeupu201d makeup look. I feel like I have a healthy glow with this on.  I think the blending brush is amazing. I would actually purchase a full size brush with these bristles if they sold them by themselves. I love that it's removable for easy cleaning as well... they clearly put a lot of thought into the design.  I have applied this directly from the stick, with my fingers and with a brush. I like all 3 ways. This product is really fun to play around with.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Sunset Strip - soft coral nude- bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: My first time trying their products. Highly recommend. You can even use it on your lips and eyes. Perfect color for summer, when youu2019re a little tan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Normally Iu2019m all about powder blush, but I love this cream so much. I have tiger Lilly queen, which looked so bright at first but once it was on my face, it was the perfect pop of color. The formula seems tacky, but I just kept tapping it on the cheek or eyes and it sticks to the skin all day, which is good for my combo/oily skin. Also, I like to apply with my fingers more than anything and used the brush on the end to soften the edges.

reviews.review_title: Best 3in 1 product u can ever find!!!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As a super picky person with combo to dry super sensitive skin, I love love love this product!!!! The color is ahhhhmazing!!! I used it on cheeks eyes and lip, work perfectly and the color is just soooo beautiful!!! On me, it lasts 6-8 hours. Will totally repurchase again and again and again!!! Will recommend to anyone!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought all 4 shades when these came out on Sephora online because I like to swatch products like this to see which one looks best. Itu2019s been a week and Iu2019ve decided to keep all 4 because I seriously love every shade. Theyu2019re buildable, long wearing, and allow me to look perfectly flushed. I use my own brush to blend - but seriously my favourite. They are exactly what theyu2019re described as - dewy. If you donu2019t like that look and prefer matte powders, this is not the product for you. Iu2019ll be wearing these all summer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shade, so beautiful! I have a lot of Nudestix products but nothing of this colour. It isn't tacky on me at all, it's just more dewy than the nudies matte's. Tap the product in lightly with your finger for best result. I use the Nudestix double ended brush  too for blending after (you can also use your own blush brush).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was excited to get this after seeing it advertised on Instagram. The colours are pretty but i am overall underwhelmed by this product. It goes on skin kinda sticky like a lip chap almost. I used the brush on the end which seemed like a cute idea to include but it just ended up removing a bunch of the product and made it look streaky and blotchy. I found it faded rather quickly so I reapplied with my fingers. It is a pretty shade but for the price and what youu2019re getting I really wouldnu2019t recommend. Iu2019d sooner find a lipstick in that shade and just use it instead.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Okay first off, these are SO easy to work with! The color is gorgeous and it lasts all day! I love the brush too! I find it perfect for blending out (stipple dont swipe) the product on your cheeks and gives you a healthy glow that lasts all day long! Dont walk run!

reviews.review_buyer_description: auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best lush blush and nice eye colour . Apply after foundation and set with loose powder. It lasted 6 hours,without powder about 3.5 hrs. That's okay who going keep makeup overnight. At work touch alittle that's all you need it's not oily and vegan why not try other colours too. Any way is luminous and healthy looking skin. On lips okay I have different particular brands Overall very gd.

reviews.review_title: A nice addition to my cream blush collection.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been excited to play with these since I saw a sneak peak on NUDESTIX's insta stories a few weeks ago, and I ordered these as soon as they launched on Sephora's site. I ordered both Sweet Peach Peony and Cherry Blossom Babe - the swatches here don't do them justice, so I've included a picture in natural lighting below (Cherry Blossom Babe on the left, Sweet Peach Peony on the right). This formula is different from the matte nudies, as it stays dewy on the skin and gives more of a fresh, plump look. These also blend beautifully and seamlessly into the skin, and both of these shades look absolutely gorgeous on the skin alone or over foundation. The pigmentation of these is also great - the swatches below are one swipe, and I can get a perfect amount of blush by dotting the stick on my face about 1-2 times on each cheek. However, I find that these stay a little tacky and don't really set like the matte nudies do - if you're not down with things being tacky on your skin, I'd play with these in store when they launch before you commit. I do feel like these last as long as my matte nudies and don't move around on me throughout the day, but I do have pretty normal skin - I'm not sure how long these would last if you've got oily or combo skin. As for the multi-use claims: I don't particularly like these on the eyes as they don't completely dry down, which sometimes leads to creasing or more product movement than I'd like, but they do look lovely on both the lips and cheeks. I do think these colours and the dewy finish are absolutely beautiful for spring and summer, so I'm happy to add these to my cream blush collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s pretty but doesnu2019t wear long at all. Unless you set it with a powder blush I wouldnu2019t recommend wearing alone. If you want a natural flush of color that lasts up to 2 hours than this is the product for you

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this when it came out on the Nudestixu2019s website. Itu2019s more of a balmy texture but itu2019s not sticky, feels light on the cheeks, and long lasting. Absolutely would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my latest and greatest find this year! The colors are amazing and I had trouble choosing just one. The formula is very blendable and you can build the intensity. I chose coral which gave me the most gorgeous and natural flush of color and was the perfect lip color. I have to get more colors! I love the blending brush and how easily it pops off to clean. This product is perfection!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Poppy girl is beautiful. I especially love it on my lips. Itu2019s the most perfect coral pink color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for a blush in pinkish shade for my brown skin tone. I bought it in color- Naughty n Spice and it is just the best blush out there ! It is creamy and well suited for my dry skin. It lasts for 3-4 hours and the best part is you can blend it using your fingers. Just a tip- Do not blend it with the brush on the back if you want it as pink as I do ! I have tried Tarte blush before, but this is clearly the winner.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing! This new blushes are so nice and glowy. I love applying this with a small stippling brush. Adds a nice flush of color with a glow, perfect for summer.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Sunset Strip - soft coral nude- bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect coral color.  product is really easy to apply and stays all day.  doesn't lift makeup below and really easy to blend.  the brush is a little dense but i think it works well enough/

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Sunset Strip - soft coral nude- bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to blend out with either fingers or the provided brush, looks very natural. I've never been much of a blush person, but this bright coral actually looks more natural on me than other colours I've tried.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I actually own all the colours now and Sunset Strip was my most recent purchase.  All the colours work well with my skin tone which is a pleasant surprise! I was worried the cream blush would smudge or be blotchy or move my foundation underneath. However I have found that the trick is to remove the brush from the bottom of the tube and dab it on the stick, then stipple it lightly over your cheek or wherever you want the colour to go. This application allows you to be in complete control of the intensity and also blends the colour in perfectly! My only problem now is choosing which to use everyday. This is really a great product and coupled with their eye and lip pencils, my morning makeup routine has gone from 30-40 mins to a quick 10 mins, and everything lasts all day!  Also, after purchasing these from Sephora I went directly to the Nudestix site to see all the other products they have and have also purchased their new NUDIES Bloom Stix and am excited to try them as soon as they are delivered!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this. Great for eyes, cheeks and lips. For a quick fix I just use this and foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love everything about this blush. Lasts all day. Buildable. Perfect for travel. & The colour is totally unique. I have nothing bad to say about it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the Nudestixu2019s magnetic eye stix and thought Iu2019d love this- products slides around as day goes on, clogs pores and broke me out. Honestly the worst face product for colour. Do not buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give it more stars, I would. I am pale-skinned with pink undertones and this shade is so stunning on. I wear it on my cheeks and lips and it is the perfect natural look. Blends like a dream. I will buy this forever.

reviews.review_title: Why are more people not talking about this
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently started using blush but I wasnu2019t loving the powdery look it left on my cheeks. I wanted to try a cream blush and I saw on IG that Mary Philips (Kendall Jenners MUA) loves Nudestix, so I decided to give it a shot. I LOVE this product so much! The colour is amazing, the cream goes on easily and has an effortless blend. It stays put all day! I apply it by putting the cream on a fluffy synthetic brush and blending it on my cheeks. If youu2019re debating purchase it, I would highly recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Exeeeded expectations!  Gorgeous colours, beyond blendable for cheeks, eyes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really awesome product. For me itu2019s the best of both worlds as it has the pros of both a cream and powder blush. It applies easily and blends like a dream. It wears well throughout the day and even on my super oily skin, it doesnu2019t get shiny, even when I donu2019t set it with a lot of powder. The brush on the opposite end is actually great with the product, I know often brushes that come with products arenu2019t good, but this one works super well with the product. Any skin type I think would be happy with this product, in addition, the color range is great and suits many skin tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the most amazing blush and lip stick product I've ever used. I'm a makeup junkie and this is one of the few items that stays in my makeup bag at all times. The color is perfect for my fair/light skin. It's so easy to use and a little goes a long way. I've been using the same one for months and there is still months of product left. It lasts forever and is well worth the price. One tip is to brush powder foundation over it right after you apply it and it makes the blush blend even better and practically melt into your skin with a spritz of setting spray. It looks great as a wash of color on eyelids as well. This particular shade is sold out often for a reason.

reviews.review_title: great formula and easy to use!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! The formula is very blendable, but also easy to build up if needed. The colour is perfect for my skin tone (medium tan) and I use it all year round. I love that it comes in a stick form because its compact and easy to take travelling. Super quick and easy to use, I just blend it in with my fingers and I'm good to go!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Best blush ever, my cheeks look naturally flushed.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Sunset Strip - soft coral nude- bronzer
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing cream blush, so easy to put on, blends out wonderfully with fingers or brush. Such a natural finish. I am fair, a red head with brown eyes. Would definitely recommend and would buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I use sunset strip as a beautiful blush and sunkissed as a versatile bronzer. My base makeup has never looked better! They make it so easy! Will be re-purchasing both. Also wrote a separate review for Bondi Bae, which I use as a bronzer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Totally love this product. Excellent quality for the price, considering you get a blush, an eyecream and a lipstick all in one. Just the perfect level of glow and the perfect texture, not too heavy, not too light. If youu2019re going for a no-make-up make-up look, this is it. Plus easy to grab n go and fix your look later on. Ordered the duo and cant wait to try it on!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product works nicely on top of powders. It blends out nicely and stays on all day. It does dry down so if you are looking for something more radiant it won't be this product. I will be buying more colors. This also works nice for oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product lasted all day for me and I work 9 hours straight at an active job. The color bare back is a nice neutral-cool pink that is more suitable to light/medium skin tones. I wish this product came with less packaging and maybe even the price would then drop as well. The brush is soft but VERY dense but it actually came in handy for on the go makeup. Overall, good cream blush and would recommend to anyone looking for something easy and quick. Plus, all these colors are very wearable and theres one for all skin tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Considering this is a stick I have found it to perform fabulously. It blends nicely. I find the brush it comes with is ok in a pinch but I prefer to blend with a normal size brush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: gray hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the colour and the way this cream blush blends out. It's the perfect coral and not too orange on my neutral skin tone. Lasts all day which never happens on me so this is a winner!... Now I want more!! Will be the perfect shade for summer if it ever gets here...I also like the fact that it is multi use... Wore it as a lipshade out for lunch and it did last as like a bit of a stain, but a little drying for me so will stick to the cheeks and eyes. All in all these are great products and have been recommending them to everyone... It's hard to find a blush that looks natural on dry mature skin... This is my new fav!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most natural flush of colour I've ever put on my face! I've always been skeptical about cream products because I have very oily skin, but this stuff doesn't budge. I took a star off because there is so little product for the cost, but it's so beautiful!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect formula and shade. It makes you look like you've got some sun on your cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So I purchased the Jetsetter Kit from the Nudestix website. It was my first Nudestix purchase ever! Fell inlove with it the second Iu2019ve tried them all on. Literally the best! If youu2019re not a fan of heavy eye makeups like me especially for everyday wear, this would be perfect for you too! It just looks so natural! For the blush, I first got the In The Nude from the Kit which has a nice nude tone. I was afraid to ran out of it so I ended up buying this- Naughty N Spice from Sephora. Planning to purchase Sunset Strip next! I just hope they would sell most of the Kits here. Please!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE this blush. It goes on super easily, and provides a beautiful natural flush. I usually dab the product directly on each cheek, and then buff it out with the attached brush. It's very quick to apply before work, and pretty much fool-proof. I don't have much experience applying blush, and this makes it easy and looks perfect every time. Cannot recommend this enough!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm going to try writing this again b/c Sephora didn't post my full review last time. I purchased this in the shades Sunset Strip (bold coral) and Sunkissed (bronzey like you just got out of the sun). Pros: super blendable, the shades are pretty, multi-use. Cons: not long lasting, could apply patchy, pricey for the amount of product you get (I think it's pricey because of the brush and the tin it comes with, and i don't use either). I couldn't justify the cons so I unfortunately returned Sunset Strip since coral is a popular shade for blushes and it could be replaced. I kept Sunkissed because it's such a unique and beautiful color.

reviews.review_title: GIVES U THAT FLUSHED NATURAL BEAUTY LOOK!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE THIS!  Itu2019s the perfect natural flush of color, provides a youthfulness to every look.  Itu2019s become my everyday blush.  I like to use my fingers to apply, patting it in lightly, and then my beauty blender to blend out.  I found i had better control of pigment that way. I tried warming it up on the back of my hand to dab in with the sponge but it took more product and more time than placing it directly with my fingers.  Fingers help to blend and pat lightly as to not disrupt your foundation and then boom...this stuff is gorgeous and long-lasting.  Sometimes I top it with a blush topper or a deeper blush to add dimension.  Canu2019t wait to get more colors !  But donu2019t use the brush that comes with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colour and pigment of this blush is beautiful and really suits my olive skin tones but much like others have noted I found it to be super patchy once applied on top of foundation and a bit dry in formula. Perhaps would be great on bare skin as it blended so well on my hand when in store but on top of make up the consistency is a no-go. Itu2019s like trying to blend in powder blush with your fingers, unsuccessfully.
