reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I returned this product along with the shade Bondi Bae, for similar reasons. They swatch beautifully on the hand, but it's an entirely different story on the face. It's extremely difficult to blend and the effort you put into it rubs away any foundation I've put on underneath. If you manage to get it to look good, it does stay put for a good bit of time. Too much fussing though and I'd rather just use a powder blush and go to town with setting spray.
Great product! Lasts a long time!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy this product, I was surprised that I liked this product so much. Even though it is a cream product, if you have foundation/concealer/powder on your face already and you swipe the stick over your cheek, it blends BEAUTIFULLY and seamlessly. I am impressed that it did not mess up my base. The color is also very pretty and overall a good universal color! The brush is good, not necessary though. Great product, creamy, blendable, and flattering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is awesome!!! Itu2019s easy to do in a hurry and I love that it includes a brush! There is nothing wrong with this product at all! No complaints!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Subtle colour, easy to blend for a novice. Was loking for something sheer and dewy and Iu2019d say this is sheer, though more matte. Still, itu2019s not powdery, which is what I wanted to avoid.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: such a pretty colour and nice formula! I use a beauty blender to blend it in instead of the brush, but the brush is good too.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: In The Nude - neutral nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The most gorgeous blush on EVERY skintone. I have this in my freelance kit and for my own use, I love using this as a cream blush and shadow and it blends like a dream. OBSESSED!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this product! Iu2019m all about the natural look and this definitely gives me the perfect blushy glow. It blends super well and is extremely easy to apply. TRY IT OUT! So worth your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Luv this blush sooooooo much!!!! I can use it on my lips , cheeks and eyes and I will definetly look more awake. This is an awesome natural blush, which is buildable.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: In The Nude - neutral nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Looks beautiful and feels so silky smooth! I love applying this as blush. The reason I took off one star is because if you use it on your lips, it has a bitter weird taste. If itu2019s for all over use, they shouldnu2019t make it taste bad

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush!! I have the most sensitive combo skin   eczema and this product doesn't irritate or clog my pores at all. The only downside is it doesn't stay on through the day so well but it's so easy to reply and carry around it doesn't really bother me.

reviews.review_title: Easy to use and blends like a dream
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Looks great on my fair skin. Blends beautifully with a brush or beauty blender and I love to brush into my crease for a monochromatic look using the attached brush. Havenu2019t tried on my lips as I prefer non-matte lips. Just ordered the naughty n spice to add to my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush colour!! I'm usually not a fan of cream products because they can be hard to blend out and look too intense but this colour is perfect and it looks natural even if you apply too much!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this intending to only use it on my lid to give it that subtle rosy hint. I have redness in my cheeks so I tend to stay away from any pink products on my face, even over my concealer or foundation, but I figured Iu2019d give it a swipe. So glad I did! It blends out so nice so it just looks like a natural bit of color. I ended up forgoing my usual contour shade because  this brought glow and dimension to my whole face. Canu2019t wait to try the other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm so glad I bought this. It's my go-to blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall a nice blush. The color is noticeable but not too pigmented. You donu2019t have to worry about over-applying. The color seems to last many hours on the face, and it is convenient to carry in your bag. I havenu2019t tried the brush though- I think itu2019s to dense and would rub some of the foundation off underneath.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: works great! easy application

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily combination skin and this stuff stays on all day. I have very sensitive skin and this product didnu2019t break me out. I love u201cin the nudeu201d. Itu2019s a great shade for a monochromatic look. I use it on my cheeks and lips! I would definitely repurchase.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this and I absolutely love it! All shades are actually really nice but this one stands out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got my makeup done at Sephora and this was one of the products used on me after requesting multi-tasking products. The Naughty n' Spice is a beautiful dusty rose color perfect for my light tan skin - it gives a great pinkish sheen on the eyes and cheeks (I haven't tried on the lips yet).  Only downside is it's lack of lasting power, especially on the cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is exactly what I wanted it to beu2014a great shade in a creamy formula that gives the perfect flush. Itu2019s super blend-able and easy to use, this is actually my first cream blush and Iu2019m obsessed. I bought naughty n spice and I was nervous itu2019d be too dark looking at the swatch online, but it glides on in a nice rosy-mauve tint that looks very natural. I apply it by rubbing my finger on the tube and dabbing it on my cheek, dabbing in an outward motion, and blending it out. I also use it as eyeshadow and love the tint it gives my eyes. My only gripe is that the brush on the other end is useless, itu2019s super stiff and not helpful for application. Overall, I would highly recommend this to anyone looking for a multipurpose cream blush!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: In The Nude - neutral nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product! Easy to blend on skin with your fingers or with the brush that comes in the product. Im tan olive skin toned and I got u201cIn the nudeu201d. Its a peachy tone and it looks really good with my skin color. There is not a lot of product but you only need a little bit so you can make it last. Definitely gonna repurchase it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gorgeous color and blends well. Love the stick format for travel.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: looks very natural and lasts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s hard to find products for neutral skin, this is the first cream blush Iu2019ve found that actually looks good with my skin tone! Truly looks like I just got a bit of sun! Wish they didnu2019t have the brush and cut the cost a little bit bc the brush isnu2019t helpful at all but whatever

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colour - very subtle and a perfect nude. I used it on my lips and cheeks. Never collects in creases and always looks smooth and even. Iu2019m definitely going to order another colour (or 4).

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got a very generous sized DS (w/o brush) of the Naughty n' Spice shade. At first I was thinking to give it away as a stocking stuffer since I have plenty of stuff already. But I accidentally dropped it on the floor so the bullet itself falls to the cap/lid and made it non-giftable anymore. So I just tried it myself and OH MAN, it's GOOD. I tired it as shadow, blush and lipstick. It appears matte when blended out on eyelid and cheek and left a natural matte (a bit satin) finish on the lips which is non drying at all! For my conbination oily skin with oily eyelids, it last about 6 hours on my cheeks

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first cream blush I have used that doesnu2019t mess with my foundation. I saw Emily Ratajkowski show how she uses it and I thought ok i know I wonu2019t look exactly like her but Iu2019m stoked to give it a whirl. It lasts so long and it seriously doesnu2019t move my foundation. It gives you a fresh faced looking flush of color. I want to try all of the colors now.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very blend able-color is subtle, but can be layered. A great all over color!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After recently getting into cream over powder products, I have been trying out pretty much any cream/liquid blushes I can find. This is a really nice option! The color is beautiful and it blends really well into skin, plus the stick format makes it super easy to use and travel with.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely LOVE this!  I am over 40 and there are just some days where powder blush looks so awful and dry on me, this stick is SO amazing that I will keep repurchasing for as long as they make it!  I apply it by first putting a small amount on a flat topped brush and then I dab it on my cheeks and blend.  The finish is so skin-like and natural, it's exactly what I've been looking for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: In my 50s and I like to let the years of good skin care shine through without too many products. Less is definitely more as you get older. This product is perfect. Find your best color and use on cheeks, eyelids and even lips. It enhances your natural beauty. I use  it over my tinted moisturizer with no foundation (not a fan of foundation) and my adult daughters say it looks great. Blonde, brown eyes, medium skin tone. I bought Bare Back.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is hands down the best formulation of creme blush Iu2019ve used. The color - neutral nude - is fabulous and can be used alone or with powder blush to set it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty good product! The colour is gorgeous and it's nicely pigmented! It has a really nice natural matte finish. The only problem I have is that I find it hard to blend; it moves around my foundation and concealer when I go to blend it, especially when using the brush it comes with. If you use a lighter touch and a fluffier, less dense brush it's a lot easier to blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it's creamy and melts into my skin very nice. I m a medium 4. It is nice on my cheeks but I did not like it on my lips. I like to use my hands to melt the product. I did not like the brush. It s so small and not that gentle.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Some of the product broke off and was stuck on the cap... when applied it was just u201coku201d and then wore off within an hour. Returned after a week of having the same issue

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This may be my most surprising product of the year so far.  I got this in a set, and wasn't sure if it was going to flatter my skin tone (light olive), but I love it!  The consistency is smooth - even over powder foundation.  The color is very flattering.  It's a peachy nude, with a hint of reddish berry.  It does not stay tacky on the skin, but you have maybe 30 seconds to blend it out (read: do one cheek at a time).  While I like it as a cheek color, I actually have been wearing it more as a crease color/eyeshadow base.  Overall, great product and I look forward to trying more colors.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice product for my easy or none makeup style - if it's work to apply, I don't bother. I wanted a compact travel option so I love the attached brush which means I don't have to carry a separate brush when I go overseas. I bought Naughty N Spice and followed it shortly by Bondi Bae as a contour. I'm pretty new to blush application/contouring so I'm still figuring out the best way to apply, but I appreciate the cream formula (Bondi Bae goes on smoother and blends easier than Naughty N Spice). The brush takes some practice to blend it without removing it, and the staying power isn't quite a full work day on bare skin (I don't wear foundation). Perhaps this would be improved with a setting powder or similar. Naughty N Spice is a nice shade for my fair/medium freckled skin and Bondi Bae is great for summer contouring. 1 star removed for staying power and not the easiest blending for the NnS colour.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: New favourite blush! I love the idea of being a casual, on-the-go, make up wearer - this helps me believe I am, when in reality I am not! Easy to apply and blend with fingers, beauty blender or stippling brush (not a huge fan of the brush included - too stiff). Beautiful colour too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was recommended this shade when shopping for a cream blush that isnu2019t too shimmery and it certainly delivers. Itu2019s a warm nude matte shade that blends well and still looked fresh after several hours. Itu2019s a nice change from my usually pink blush colors. I tried the brush on the other end and it works ok, but prefer to use my Sephora #47 brush. I also tried it on my lips but prefer to use it as a blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this on my eyes and cheeks! Great to give me a natural sun kissed look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This has made my morning routine time cut in half. Itu2019s such a natural flush of color that I love. I get so many compliments! Lasts all day in 80 deg Florida weather

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product. I only wish I would have gotten a shade or two darker. Bare back is a little too light for a medium complexion. Product goes on easily, blends well and has a matte finish. Nice to have the brush end for blending; makes the product simple and quick to use. A must for my beauty routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Not the easiest product to apply after liquid foundation. Every time it is applied it feels as if Iu2019m removing foundation. Really wanted to love it after trying it on at the store.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first cream blush. Iu2019m looking to simplify my make up routine and this is super easy to grab and dab on. The color bare back is really natural yet buildable. I like how this comes with a little brush on the other so I can leave my makeup brushes at home and just toss this in my bag. Might melt in the summer heat but for now I love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great color. Doesn't cake.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super easy to use and great colour payoff. I love using this on my eyelids and it surprisingly doesn't crease. I find the brush a little useless though so I'm nixing one star for that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This a very cool pink color for blush. Not too bright a pink though. It blends really well using the attached brush too. It is a nice shade for my light skintone.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: In The Nude - neutral nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty decent crean blush. The texture isnu2019t too creamy but it blends well. The color isnu2019t my favorite but eh.

reviews.review_buyer_description: blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great product! I was skeptical about using this color on my eyes in addition to my cheeks and lips, but it actually looks really good. Looks so natural and blends out SO well. Only took off a star because it seems to wear off a bit throughout the day. Overall I really do love this product, it's an everyday go to for me

reviews.review_shade_purchased: In The Nude - neutral nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can't rave enough about these! I have bought three colours: Bare Back, In the Nude, and Naughty n'Spice. Probably the best stick formulation ever because it does lock and set, and doesn't fade on skin. It's easy to blend out with the brush end or with your fingers. Honestly the most flattering shades. It melts into your skin without making you look greasy or anything! I wear this with a light layer of bb cream and it looks flawless and natural. Highly, highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product even more than I thought I would. I apply to the apples of my cheeks and swipe back towards temples. Then, I use the brush to gently dab-blend the edges and my god, it's perfect. It has a true satin finish of my skin/skincare products, and it's really a muted petal pink/nude. I swipe it on my eyes and cheeks (over Amore Pacific cushion and Tom Ford Traceless stick foundation), and top my cheekbones and center of eyes with the glossy , subtle RMS luminizers- I have the quad. This heavy-hitting multitasker provides all the color I need save for lips, as it is actually slightly lighter than my natural lip color and I prefer to go a tad deeper. But for a nude glow, this enhances your natural beauty with a look that's ephemeral and youthful. It's also a convenient time-saver.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was looking for something to wear to work when Iu2019m too lazy to go through my full routine. This worked really well and lasts all day. The brush is really dense and can be too rough on my skin. This causes my skin to become even more rosey, so I try to wait a few moments before deciding whether Iu2019m happy with how much Iu2019ve put on and adjust accordingly. Overall Iu2019m happy with the purchase and would be willing to buy again.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Naughty n' Spice - dusty rose nude- blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of those products where the idea is much better than the execution. I had every intention of having these replace my powder blushes and my brushes because of the built-in brush. All I can say is that the product is convenient and the brush is soft but this product doesn't apply well at all. When I'd blend it out, it blends completely unevenly with the brush picking up and lifting away colour from some parts of my cheek so I end up with a very patchy application. So patchy, in fact, that I had to wipe my cheeks off. Too bad...

Bought nudestix- in the nude because I love the idea of a multi use product I can toss in my purse for on the go. This product exceeded my expectations! The color is so beautiful (especially as a blush) it melts into the skin for a beautiful natural look! I stared at myself for 10 minutes in the mirror because I could not believe how beautiful and smooth the blush looked on the skin! Definitely see more nudestix products in my future!

It's very hard for a pale girl with my exact skin shade to find bronzing products that do not look ridiculous (Orange being one of the most obvious makeup product sins). I have Bare Back and the Maple one, and cannot believe how well they blend in with bare face or other products. I particularly enjoy using the sticks in all three areas, with a magnetic eye colour added to increase definition. These feel so effortless on, and I appreciate that they actually are just an natural enhancement to your real skin tone (we're talking eye circle flaws and all).   I knocked one star off for packing. Having a huge collection of the tins is illogical, and it's wasteful to have to continually recycle/throw them out. I love having the original sized tin from one product to carry a few sticks, but it really doesn't make sense for the Nudies. The tin is much smaller, unable to hold any other Nudestix products, and unable to hold more than one of the Nudies. It really makes me sad to think of how many of these tins are likely being wasted.

reviews.review_title: NOT for girls with dark skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I contour my face 1-2 times a week on average. I love matte products for the darker places because my skin is already dark, and strobing is my thing. I would say my complexion is comparable to Mindy Kaling's. Having said that, this product doesn't go dark enough if you are not fair or medium toned. I run into the same problem with Nars concealer (and so many others!). I want to use it to contour, but the darkest color matches my skin exactly, so no Nudestix for us:(  Sidenote: Just to be clear, I have dark skin, but I'm not as dark as most that would consider themselves darker toned, and if I'm having a hard time, I can't imagine what it's like to try to find something even darker. just saying

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Bought Bondi Bae to use as a bronzer on my pale skin and it works great! Always have a problem with bronzers looking to orange or just unnatural, but using with my beauty blend it blends out soooo great. I finally have that natural bronzy look using this! However, I don't use the brush attached to it, I don't care for it.

I have light med-skin and use bondi bae for contour/bronzer and naughty n spice for blush. I know these are multi purpose but I haven't tried it on my eyes etc. I love that they are so easy to blend and last about 8-10 hours. Naughty n spice is great because it's a nice neutral pink color that doesn't have shimmers. Bondi bae is not red toned or cool toned. It's more golden brown I feel like. It is kind of small but I think it's worth trying.

These are my fist Nudestix products.  I purchased In the Nude and Bondi Bae over a month ago and have worn every day since!  They blend so nicely and last on me all day.  I have combo skin.  Also easy to toss in handbag.  I wear bondi bae on eyes, cheeks and contour.  Wear In the Nude eyes, cheeks and lips!  Such an easy product for people like me who don't like to fuss with a lot of makeup and prefer natural looks.  Am going to pick up Bareback, Naughty N Spice and Maple, eh for the fall!

I got the shade Bondi Bae and I'm really loving it. I'm a face-sweater and cream products just disappear right off my face. But this blends to easily and beautifully and it stays all day. It looks so natural on and gives me an amazing glow. It's def warm toned but not at all orangey. I blend it out with any kind of synthetic brush or a beauty blender (the brush it comes with is too stiff and wipes the product right off). Happy to find a Cream Bronzer that works for me

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I left this review but apparently Sephora deleted it so take 2!  My experience with Nudestix products has been pretty disappointing and this product does nothing to change my mind, most multi-use products tend to excel at one more than the others because formulation and use are both mutually dependant and this is no different.  On my face this product is frustrating to apply because the product is quite stiff and swiping pulls and moves my foundation either way blending is very difficult, it tends to just stick onto your skin and despite trying to blend with my fingers or a brush or a sponge (all damp or dry) the product is difficult to move once it's on without irritating my not-particularly-sensitive skin.  On my lips the product is fairly dry but as a colour it's not bad, it doesnt' work with my skintone as it's very warm like a dark orange terracotta colour but it may for other skintones.  On my eyes I learned from trying to apply it as a blush to pat the colour on using my fingertips and that seems to be the best possible use for the product so far.  I'll let you know right away the brush is awful and borderline abrasive on my skin, it looks very soft and dense right up until you try to use it and looking at the bristles from the top it's very clearly short bristled that are not dense enough to move or apply any product, I tried using this on the much much softer Nars Multiple formula and the problem remained the same with the added disadvantage of the brush pulling product off my face and into the brush.  The tin as usual is gimmicky is useless, I immediately took the product out of all the packaging and threw everything else into recycling because it's just excessive tacky packaging in my opinion.  Overall I think there are far better multi products out there and this one certainly isn't worth the price tag. I will continue trying to use this over the summer maybe as a bronzer and mixing it with different primers to make it easier to use but I completely regret picking this up at $33 pricetag. I would not recommend this to anyone.
I own Bare Back and Bondi Bae and I can't stop using them. They blend so well but really it's the colours, Nudestix knows how to make flattering colours for all skin tones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, lightMedium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Color: Naught & Spice  I LOOOOOOVE this product. I have been trying a number of multifunctional stick products to find my favorite such as pixi (which is also good), nars, etc and I have to say that this one is the best one so far! I love the natural rose hue and it is creamy easy to blend formula. I enjoy the fact that this has brush but I mainly use my fingers for application because I never sure about brush cleaning when its attached to the product. I just ordered the in the nude color because I loved this soo much! I use it over my eyes and on my cheeks. I dont really like as much for the lips because I think its a bit drying for that part of my face. RECOMMEND PURCHASING.

I have all shades and I have very fair skin. I love how easy to use and blendable these are! They are great for creating the no makeup look and perfect for summer! I love that I can this one product for eyes, cheeks, and lips! Highly recommend!!!

I got both in Naughty n' Spice & Deep Maple eh! Both colours were amazing and gave me that natural everyday no makeup glow. Naughty n' Spice gave me more of a pinkish natural glow, while Deep Maple eh, gave me a more natural nude look. I am a huge fan of Nudestix's products and this is an absolute love!
Pretty colors (In the Nude and Bondi Bae) but they are patchy and don't blend well. Huge disappointment :(

I got this on a whim for a trip to Hawaii as something I could easily swipe on for a no makeup look before and for touch ups after swimming.   It's amazing! It's creamy blendable and lasts. It looks really natural and the tips from the video helped give ideas for placement. I got two colors in the nude and naughty and spice. In the nude is a great natural with a hint of coral. And naughty has a bit more rosy brown color - a little dressier   I'm Asian with fairly pale skin.    I've kept using it since being back and it looks great with my tan!

reviews.review_title: Nudies All Over Face Color Matte
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this product very much BUT not in love with it . It's creamy and yes, it's matte . I used it on my cheeks,eyes and lips and it seems to work best on my eyes . I bought the nude which isn't a neutral. It's more of a  warm  muted  nude w/ what looks like a peachy undertone  . I was going to try the Naughty and Spice but I don't love this product enough to go any further with it .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I bought this after hearing about it from Samantha Ravndahl on YouTube, her skin is lighter than mine (I have medium skin in the summer) but thought I would try it anyway. So glad I did!!! Super smooth and easy to blend out even over foundation. Lasts all day, I am frequently have 16 hour days; on a 6 am flight (so up at 3) and work until late in the afternoon... this product doesn't quit! Highly recommend!! In fact I am going to order Naughty n 'Spice as well!!

I'm bought Bondi Bae and In The Nude to stash in my summer makeup bag. Both blend out super nicely with your fingers and last all day without being set with powder or spray. I'm very pale, and the Bondi Bae shade is a great bronzer for me, and it adds a lot of very natural looking dimension to my face. I've been using both pretty much every day for the past month or so and I've barely had to roll it up. There's a very decent amount of product as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this because I was looking for a nice cream product for summer, as well as something that will travel well and help me cut down on how many things I need for an every day look. I am very pale and ordered Naught N Spice. I really like this! The texture is smooth and silky and it blends so nicely! It lasts all day also. It adds natural color that gives your face a glow without being too much. I am really pleased with this and think it was a good purchase!

My endless search for the perfect multitasking stick is finally at an end.  This Nudestix all in one stick in in the nude is perfect on cheeks, lips, and eyes!  And I never use them on my eyes!  The brush makes blending so easy and the look is natural and LASTING!!!  I'm definitely getting a second color, I can't wait!

This is great for traveling when I want a natural look and don't have space for an arsenal of makeup in my carry on or in my purse for touch ups. It blended beautifully with its attached blended (BTW I love that it comes with its own blender-ones less thing to pack) and isn't greasy and stays put. As a lipstick it is very moisturizing and creamy but doesn't have amazing staying power. As a blush and eye shadow it is perfect. Also love the tin it comes with - I'm using it to stash my little bits of Bobby pins and jewelry when I travel.

I don't usually write reviews but I love this product. I got the colour in the nude and I'm obsessed with it. If you bought a blush, lipstick and an eyeshadow it would cost way more than this so the price is reasonable.

I bought bondi bae before it was released on the Sephora site, and let me just say how perfect this is! For all my fair skinned ladies, don't be afraid of this, it blends out beautifully with a beauty blender and it doesn't crease on the eyes either. It's great staple to travel with and easy to carry since it's in such compact packaging
